Search for gold and crystals in military installations, nuclear reactors, refineries, temples, and other locales. Unfortunately, the automated defense systems in all of these environments are still active, and they can complicate matters quite a bit: laser turrets, drone ships, and tanks want to keep you from the goodies. If that is not enough, other scavengers also want part of the action. Luckily, you have lasers, guns, flamethrowers, and a variety of rockets to dispatch these menaces. If your friends think scavenging is for them, challenge up to three of them to a Deathmatch. In FORSAKEN 64, your only goal is to grab the loot and get off the planet.

title: Major League Baseball Featuring Ken Griffey Jr.
description: Major League Baseball featuring Ken Griffey Jr. was one of the most anticipated titles for the Nintendo 64. Ken Griffey Jr. baseball is an arcade fast paced form of baseball that emphasizes the offensive aspect of the game. Both the MLB and MLBPA licenses, full stat tracking, and hi-res graphics make Ken Griffey Jr. Baseball the perfect title for the baseball fans that dig the long ball.

title: All-Star Baseball '99
description: Acclaim adds to its N64 lineup with its newest sports title, All-Star Baseball. With hi-res graphics, it raises the question: Does it play as wonderful as it looks? Features include, all 30 MLB teams, all 700 players, create-a-player, full management options and more than 500 motions throughout the game.

title: Bust-A-Move 2 Arcade Edition
description: As demonstrated by games like TETRIS and PONG, people love games that appear simple on the surface but which soon become all encompassing. At first look, BUST-A-MOVE 2: Arcade Edition resembles nothing so much as a preschooler's game. The goal is to shoot different color bubbles up at a descending ceiling of bubbles; connect three of the same color and they vanish with a "pop." Things become more interesting when you have to select from three game modes. Pick between a Puzzle Game, where it's just you against the oncoming bubbles in a variety of clever patterns; Single-Player vs. Computer Player, where things get interesting because every time one of the increasingly odd cartoon opponents connects three or more bubbles, they pop and then appear on your screen; or Single-Player vs. Human Player, which is fun because while the computer plays with more precision, humans can be sneaky snakes who will send you over a batch of bubbles at the worst possible time.

title: Aero Gauge
description: AERO GAUGE for the Nintendo 64 gives you racing with a futuristic twist.  Choose from up to 10 aero-machines to pilot through six different courses.  In Grand Prix mode, you'll have to qualify and race through four courses against computer-controlled vehicles.  The Single Match mode lets you race one track against the computer, while the Versus mode matches you head-to-head against a friend.  In Time Attack mode, it's just you against the clock, racing for the best time.  You'll have to be alert though, because you'll be twisting, flying and avoiding obstacles and other racers at speeds of up to 1,000 miles per hour.  You also have to remember to stop to repair damages and replenish energy.  Put your trays and seatbacks in the upright position and take off with AERO GAUGE.

title: Bio F.R.E.A.K.S.
description: In the world of BIO F.R.E.A.K.S., the United States has been split into warring regions, with a different corporation controlling each one. Naturally, each corporation would like to control all of the former United States. Rather than wage war, these companies have developed flying, robotic, enhanced, armored, killing synthoids, or Bio F.R.E.A.K.S. These synthoids have weapons fused to their bodies, and have only one purpose: they must destroy the synthoids of every other corporation to allow the their company to dominate. These battles are not for the squeamish, as fighters have been known to lose limbs. All the fighting takes place on land and in the air. Do you have the guts and the skill to take on the F.R.E.A.K.S.?
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

title: Bio F.R.E.A.K.S.
description: Midway Entertainment's MORTAL KOMBAT popularized a style of arcade fighting that will probably last forever. Each time a new game comes out it, tries to do that vaunted series one better. For example, BIO F.R.E.A.K.S. features a cast of genetically mutated warriors who have their weapons surgically bound to their bodies. And there's enough hard-hitting action, carnage, and wanton destruction to keep even the most die-hard fans happy and coming back for more. The mega-corporations that own and operate the world in the future each have a BIO F.R.E.A.K.S. (Biological Flying Robotic Enhanced Armored Killing Synthoids) warrior protecting their territory. When a fighter wins a battle, his corporation takes over the other's territory which does NOT go over well back in the home office. The level of action escalates until you think you can't take it anymore but somehow you manage! This game is not for the meek or for game fans that still need their mothers to cut their meat for them.

title: World Cup 98
description: "Goooooaaaaaa-lllllllllll!" With stunning attention to detail and a full license from the actual World Cup, WORLD CUP '98 might well be the most realistic soccer game on any platform. The EA Sports game will take you right back to the fierce competition of the World Cup itself, with all 10 active stadiums from the event portrayed in full-detail. Since the game features 32 teams from as many countries, you'll be able to try on the personalities of all sorts of squads including Italy, Brazil, France, and the United States. WORLD CUP allows you to play in five distinct modes, including World Cup, in which you guide your favorite team through the grueling tournament; World Cup Classics, which lets you relive some of the best matchups in World Cup history; Friendly; Penalty Shootout; and a Practice mode, which gives you the advantage of practicing your offense, defense, shooting, passing, and more. The game's deep, varied audio commentary, flashy replays, and lush graphics make it much like watching the sport on TV. Add to that a long list of options and play modes, and you've got a total score.

title: Breath of Fire III
description: In ancient times, there was a creature named Ryu who was part boy, part dragon. In his struggles to figure out his troubling past, Ryu encountered many an adventure some good and some horrifyingly bad. In Breath of Fire III, you take on the role of the troubled hybrid as you encounter character after interesting character each with unique traits and personalities. Journey through a lush, detailed 3D world in this role-playing game of epic proportions, as you learn and trade spells and try to figure out the great mystery of your past. Unusually immersing, Breath of Fire III goes where few games of its kind have gone before, adding a personal, involved storyline to an impressive set of environments and backgrounds. The character animations will have you floored, as each movement and characteristic resembles human behavior. There's a hilariously fun bonus mini-game included, which allows you to catch fish. You can trade the fish for more practical items in the game, or just fish for diversion if you get stuck in the main game. The game is for one player only, but you can always trade tips and tricks with your friends.

title: Hot Shots Golf
description: Toss some grass into the air to see which way the wind is blowing, address your ball, and give it all you've got in HOT SHOTS GOLF. If you are new to the game of golf, you will want to start with the lessons menu, which takes you through three in game lessons and teaches the basics of golf and the game controls. Those players already steeped in the nuances of the sport will want to jump into the play game menu, where you can choose from a number of different options including stroke play, match play, and training. Anyone looking for a challenge should try the Tournament and Versus modes. Tournament mode puts the player in competition with a grid of computer controlled opponents, while the Versus mode is a one-on-one match if the player wins, the opponent becomes a playable character. HOT SHOTS GOLF offers enough options for both novices and experts to enjoy the game of golf.

title: Kobe Bryant in NBA Courtside
description: Developed by California-based Left Field Productions,marked the beginning of Nintendo's short-lived sports division, which also includes Angel Studios'. Nintendo acquired the endorsement of Los Angeles Lakers star guard Kobe Bryant.plays moderately fast, has a number of signature and special moves and a finely tuned combo-system. Players can, for example, spin, dribble under the leg and then shoot with a relatively simple combo. Likewise, players can call picks, alley-oops or change positions on the fly. Controls are intuitive (B for shooting, A for passing, L/R and camera buttons for positioning and specials), and logical. All of this comes together for the best basketball gaming experience yet seen on Nintendo 64.
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older

title: Theme Hospital
description: Running a hospital is no easy task, and as an administrator you're well aware of this. All of your "customers" are sick and want to feel better immediately, while at the same time you've got to run several departments at once: emergency rooms, surgical units, and pharmacies. In THEME HOSPITAL you have to design a new hospital so that patients can get in, get cured, and then get out as quickly as possible. Furthermore, you must research cures for unique diseases such as bloated head and invisibility. If you can keep the death rates low and the profits high, you will gain a reputation and the opportunity to run bigger and better hospitals. See if you can come up with a solution to the problem of health care with THEME HOSPITAL.

title: MLB '99
description: Go out to the old ballgame in MLB '99. Players can choose from modes like Quick Play, Playoffs, Season,  and Home Run Derby. The Spring Training mode allows you to create and develop your own player, who must prove himself in a short minor league stint. If he's good enough, he'll be called up to the Bigs, but a lackluster performance will result in a trip back to the minors. Another cool feature is the Total Batting interface, which allows you to guess where you think the pitch is going. If you guess correctly, you'll probably end up with extra bases. On the other side of the coin is Total Control Fielding, which allows you to make home run-robbing catches and barehanded plays. And of course you can take on a friend in Versus mode for intense head-to-head action.

title: Blasto
description: It's BLASTO time! Fire up your trusty Blast-O-Matic, strap on your rocket pack, and get ready to go head-to-head with some slimy, alien slugs. You'll span galaxies and cross planets as you endure in your quest to save the universe. In this free roaming 3D world, you'll have plenty to do and plenty to see. The 3D world is also fully interactive, adding a whole new level of gameplay. BLASTO doesn't follow your ordinary story line; it's full of twisted humor, absurd characters, and fairly devious situations. To save the world, however, you'll need to master all of BLASTO's many moves, each with their own dynamic animation. This game will completely immerse you with more than its graphics and gameplay, though. It has a wonderfully composed soundtrack and hilarious sound effects. People of all life forms will enjoy the full BLASTO experience.
rating_content: Animated Violence, Mild Language, Suggestive Themes

title: Newman Haas Racing
description: If you're looking for an authentic Indy Car experience, get in line for NEWMAN or HAUS RACING. This game offers unprecedented depth and customizability, with an unbelievable variety of options, including 16 real-life Indy drivers, 11 tracks, and four levels of difficulty. All of the cars can be customized to your specifications you can select your transmission type, front and rear wing heights, tire pressure and compound, gearing and spring settings, and more. NEWMAN or HAUS RACING is a hardcore sim geared toward Indy Car fanatics, and is a must for anyone who's ever spent a Sunday afternoon in front of the TV watching a real Indy Car race.

title: Point Blank
description: This invigorating light-gun shooter is equal parts sharpshooter and RPG, with plenty of absurd splashes thrown in. For starters, the two lead characters are a pair of gun-slinging mercenaries by the name of Dr. Don and Dr. Dan. You'll take on their quirky identities throughout the Single-Player and Two-Player Head-to-Head score-battle mode. POINT BLANK sends you out on a series of intoxicating missions that vary in degree of difficulty and ammunition: you may find yourself in a room full of gunmen and you only have enough bullets to activate the code on a keypad door lock; or you'll have all the ammo you could ever want, but you're in a room filled with equal parts gunmen and innocent bystanders. These challenges are incredibly fun and will have you thumbing the "continue" button until you either succeed at a challenge or get a red flag. And while Single Player and Head-to-Head mode is fun, getting up to four players to compete in turn-based rounds is a blast.

title: Deathtrap Dungeon
description: Baron Sukumvit rules Fang, the City of Lost Souls, with an iron fist. Being a rather paranoid type, he builds a dungeon and fills it with traps and monsters; if someone should be able to get through the dungeon, a red dragon awaits the hero. Every year, he issues a challenge: whoever can slay the dragon at the end of the dungeon will free Fang from the Baron's rule and earn 10,000 gold pieces. Seventeen warriors have taken the challenge, and all have failed. Take the role of either Red Lotus or Chaindog, Fang's final hopes, as they accept the Baron's challenge. Travel through 20 trap filled levels and battle over 50 different monsters with swords, hammers, flamethrowers, muskets, and even your fists. Will you be able to survive the dungeon and free the town? Play DEATHTRAP DUNGEON and put your survival skills to the test.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

title: SWAT 2
description: In SWAT 2, you control a SWAT team through a series of connected missions. You must protect innocent by-standers or hostages in order to be successful. Carefully executed tactics are required for success. Build the ultimate SWAT team and engage an enemy designed with unparalleled artificial intelligence that allow them to pursue their own criminal agenda while reacting to your every move. In addition to commanding the SWAT team, players can also become the head of a deadly terrorist organization -- keep the peace or wreak havoc on the streets of LA. Former LAPD Chief Daryl Gates, a pioneer of Special Weapons and Tactics operations, consulted on this game to lend his technical knowledge of SWAT approach to handling civil disorders and terrorism.

title: Batman & Robin
description: Based on the 1997 film, BATMAN AND ROBIN starts with Mr. Freeze robbing a museum of a valuable gem, which he wants to use to turn Gotham into a giant ice cube. Take control of Batman, Robin, or Batgirl each with individual moves and abilities as they try to stop the frigid assault. Drive the Batmobile, Robin's motorcycle, and the Batsled to explore a fully 3D Gotham and gather clues. With the information in hand, have the Bat-computer figure out where Freeze will strike next, and then try to beat him there and foil his plans. But Mr. Freeze isn't the only bad guy in Gotham City; other criminals are afoot and Batman would never let crime go unpunished. Can the trio of Caped Crusaders stop Mr. Freeze before time runs out? Find out with BATMAN AND ROBIN for the PlayStation game console.

title: Fox Sports Golf '99
description: Never fear, faithful PC owners. The world of golf comes to your living room with the addition of FOX SPORTS GOLF '99 to the PC library. Create a golfer by choosing appearance, clothing, and name. Once you have a golfer, play on one of the six 3D courses: Forest Downs, Orange Rock, Sunny Green Country Club, Kiawah Island, Oxfordshire in England, and Carnoustie Golf Links. Play in eight different game modes including Practice, Stroke Play, Match Play, Skins, Foursome, Fourball, Amateur Tour (32 golfers competing on 18 holes) and the Pro Tour (48 golfers competing in four rounds of 18 holes each). Either legendary announcer Peter Allis or Fox Sports Net's John Walls can comment on all of the action on the links. FOX SPORTS GOLF '99 will take you on a world tour of golf without having to leave your couch.
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older

title: Army Men
description: Army Men follows the exploits of Sarge through a campaign through the desert, mountains and swamps. Missions take place on huge maps, have multiple solutions and can be of many types from reconnaissance to search-and-destroy. Using various weapons, vehicles and supporting troops, Sarge must defeat the evil Tan Army.

title: Dominion:  Storm Over Gift 3
description: The gaming community has been eagerly awaiting releases from the much-hyped Ion Storm. Ion Storm has answered with Dominion: Storm Over Gift3, certainly a very slick production. Dominion is just chock full of scenario and mission movies (over 95,000 frames of animation) as well as story line trailers. With four races to choose from, gameplay itself is typical, yet adds some new features to the genre.Dominion offers a lot of play value through 48 single-player missions (12 per race). Players will find themselves driven to complete the missions so that they can see the movies for the next scenario. In addition, the AI is challenging for even the most adept RTS player.

title: Addiction Pinball
description: A two-table pinball title themed after the characters and arsenal of the strategy series,as well as the Team17 racing title,.

title: F-1 World Grand Prix
description: In the role of one of 22 (fully-licensed) drivers from all over the world, you compete in one of five different play modes. Drive an authentic 1997 Grand Prix season on 17 tracks. Maneuvering the hairpin turns and twisted tracks of Monaco or Suzuka is not an easy task, so be sure to drive a few practice laps, then qualify for the race, warm up, and finally battle against 21 drivers from 11 teams. Make pit stops at key points in the game to change your tires or refuel. A special challenge mode gives players the chance to jump into the midst of a historical race from the 1997 season and try to finish a set task. For example, you're Michael Schumacher trying to catch up with David Coulthard in the last lap on the Nuerburg Ring -- can you do it?

title: Mystical Ninja Starring Goemon
description: Mystical Ninja Starring Goemon (known as Ganbare Goemon: Neo Momoyama Bakufu no Odori! in Japan) continues the gameplay style found in Goemon 3: exploration-based action, very similar to Zelda (the first two Goemon games were basically sidescrollers at heart). As Goemon and his friends, explore ancient towns, haunted castles, and mysterious bamboo groves in polygonal 3D and solve puzzles to advance. The game never takes itself seriously -- whether you're talking to the ghost of a wise man in a Hamlet-inspired seance (complete with laugh track) or smashing tiny mechanical armies in your Goemon Impact robot. The gameplay offers mainly platform jumping and exploration, but there are of course plenty adventure elements and you can talk to everyone and everything.

title: Mission: Impossible
description: Based on the hit movie, MISSION: Impossible brilliantly captures the suspense of a spy simulation. Your mission, if you choose to accept it, is to explore the various stages in the game and attempt to figure out the next step, all the while trying to evade capture. With a large selection of weapons and items, the pace is deliberate and ample time is available to make the right decision for the next stage. Other gameplay features offer white-knuckle thrills, including a daring escape from CIA headquarters. Trigger-happy fans will not be disappointed, as you can blast away at your enemies with massive cannons. An impressive collection of cutscenes and excellent sound engineering conspire to make this game a hit.

title: World Cup 98
description: If you can't wait until the next World Cup, then get your hands on WORLD CUP '98.  This soccer game features numerous gameplay options, and plenty of available tweaks to customize the game to your liking. The Exhibition mode allows you to practice your skills until you feel ready to challenge the computer in the World Cup. The game contains most of the teams and players from the 1998 seasons, including athletes from around the world. There is a huge list of moves that can be performed during the game by utilizing different button combinations, so if you've seen it in real life you can probably do it here. There are literally hundreds of player animations, resulting in realistic and fluid movement on the field. There is also a Two-Player mode for those times when you want to test your skills against a human opponent. WORLD CUP '98 offers many options and modes that other games don't, and it has a great look and feel that brings you closer to the action than you ever thought you'd get.

title: NFL Xtreme
description: NFL XTREME isn't your typical football game. It offers five-on-five, NFL BLITZ-style gameplay. You'll get plenty of options to extend the gaming experience: Exhibition, Regular Season, and Playoff modes, each with variable difficulty and game-speed levels. You can also trade and draft players, and you can even track their statistics in a huge range of categories. NFL XTREME is bases on the NFL GAMEDAY engine, resulting in a game that is both fun to play and nice to look at. This game also allows you to go at it with your friends in the Multiplayer mode, for the ultimate trash-talking experience.

title: Granstream Saga
description: The floating continents you live on are slowly sinking into a black abyss. In order to slow the sinking, parts of the continents have been cut loose. However, this is a temporary solution. You take the role of Eon, who was found at the foot of a shrine as an infant. Eon must travel to the each of the floating continents and collect the precious stones that will save the world. When Eon encounters an enemy, he can hack, slash, block, and counterattack in real-time. As the action becomes more intense, use magic spells and special attacks to dispose of enemies in a more efficient manner. All of the action is captured with full 3D environments and character models. You better hurry and find the stones, or your home will sink into oblivion in THE GRANSTREAM SAGA.

title: Forsaken
description: The Earth is in ruins. However, there is enough stuff left unbroken to make salvage operations profitable. You take the role of a scavenger on a hoverbike whose only goal is to get as much stuff as possible and leave the planet. Search for gold and crystals in military installations, nuclear reactors, refineries, temples, and other locales. Unfortunately, the automated defense systems are still active and complicate matters quite a bit. Specifically, laser turrets, drone ships, and tanks want to keep you from the goodies. If that is not enough, other scavengers also want to put a stop to the competition. Luckily, you have lasers, guns, flamethrowers, and a variety of rockets to dispatch these menaces. If your friends think scavenging is for them, show them what the competition is like with the two-player mode. In FORSAKEN, your only goal is to get rich and get off the planet.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

title: Grand Theft Auto
description: Try to become a crime lord in GRAND THEFT AUTO. You start out as small time hood, where all you have to do is answer your beeper and complete the tasks that the boss assigns to you. Tasks include delivering stolen cars, dropping off drug money, or completing contract hits. Every mission requires stealing cars, but every car in the game handles differently, so pilfering the right car is important. If a mission calls for you to break roadblocks, a lightweight sports car is not a good idea; you'll want to steal a bus or a truck. Stealing the right car for the situation should not be too difficult, since every car in the game can be stolen including police cruisers. Will you be able to climb the ranks of the underworld, or will you be underwater with cement shoes? Try to stay alive in GRAND THEFT AUTO.

title: Crime Killer
description: In the near future, the streets will be taken over by criminals, and the government-run police department is powerless in the fight against crime. That is why the URIEL consortium buys the department. URIEL gives the police department three new patrol vehicles: the turbo patrol car, the bike, and the wing. Each comes with a vast array of weapons; including a vulcan cannon, machine guns, cluster shells, and others to use on various crime fighting missions. Your job is simple: keep the streets free and clear of all criminals. If your friends start to look like the bad guys, challenge them to a holotag or weapons test match. In holotag, test your driving skills and try to collect all of the holograms scattered throughout an arena, while blowing your opponents into small pieces is the goal of the weapons test. Do you have the skills and courage to take back the streets? Play CRIME KILLER and find out.

title: Off-Road Challenge
description: Take CRUIS'N USA, add bumpy dirt tracks, heavy monster trucks and off-road dune buggies, and you've got the arcade-inspired port OFF-ROAD CHALLENGE for the N64. Step on the gas and blast through some mud in a variety of hardy vehicles and race on various tracks in tough locales ranging from El Paso and Las Vegas to the blistering heat of the Mojave Desert. OFF-ROAD CHALLENGE is all about smashing and dashing, so take out your gaming aggressions on fences, trucks, speeding trains, bouncing tires, and even falling boulders and UFOs. Bump and thump your way to victory in hard-driving Single-player mode, or take the challenge to a close friend or chosen enemy in some Two-Player excitement. You can watch the intense action go down in three camera views: Chase, Close Chase, and Inside-the-Cab view. OFF-ROAD CHALLENGE will have you shredding tires and eating dirt with the best of them.

title: Banjo-Kazooie
description: You are Banjo, a honey bear on the hunt for your kidnapped sister, Tooty. By your side or actually on your back is your trusty friend, the red gull Kazooie. You'll have to travel through 10 different worlds, but to unlock the doors to those worlds, you'll need to find jigsaw puzzles and musical notes. Banjo and Kazooie each have different abilities to help you on your quest, and you can switch between the two in order to get the job done.

title: Mortal Kombat 4
description: The fight for your life is on! Enter the realm of Mortal Kombat. You are in a fight to save Earth from the deadly hands of Shinnok, and to save your own skin too! You must fight your way through a score of other fighters and then face Shinnok himself in a deadly battle that will decide who is the supreme champion of Mortal Kombat. Choose from 15 characters, including the legendary Liu Kang and the mighty Scorpion, each with their own special moves and fatalities and weapons. Fight in several locations in 3D, with interactive backgrounds, which can be used against your enemies. Move in 3D to dodge projectiles and enemy attacks. Choose to fight through the Single Player mode and defeat Shinnok, complete with several difficulties and unique endings for each character. Take on a friend in the Two-Player Battle mode or see how long you can last in the Endurance mode.

title: Mortal Kombat 4
description: MORTAL KOMBAT 4 has gone polygonal, meaning you can expect to see new moves, holds, and characters. Weapons have also been thrown into the mix, as each character possesses a sword, club, or staff to use to his or her advantage. The plot of MK4 ties together the loose ends of MK3 and MK Mythologies: Sub-Zero. With Shao Kahn out of the way, Shinnok assumes the role as Public Enemy #1. Returning characters include Scorpion, Sub-Zero, Liu Kang, Johnny Cage, Sonya, and Raiden. Most of the old characters retain their old moves but there are also some new ones thrown in as well. You'll also find all of the fatalities and combos available in this arcade port. If you're looking for multiplayer action, take on a friend and see who is the real king of kombat.

title: Jeremy McGrath Supercross '98
description: The look and feel of motocross and supercross racing comes to the PlayStation with JEREMY MCGRATH SUPERCROSS '98. Use the Single Race mode to lean the ins and outs of a particular track and work on your racing technique. When you feel comfortable, play the Championship mode and try to become the best supercross racer in town. You can also have your friends join the action with the split-screen Two-Player mode. Those who prefer more solitary pursuits will enjoy the Time Trial mode, where the race is against the clock. If the standard tracks don't offer enough of a challenge, you can create unique and original tracks with the track editor. All of the bumps, jumps, thrills, and chills of motocross and supercross racing can be yours with JEREMY MCGRATH SUPERCROSS '98.

title: N2O: Nitrous Oxide
description: N20: Nitrous Oxide's gameplay is pure shooter, reminiscent of the arcade classic TEMPEST. You're stuck on the perimeter of a tube and you job is to shoot at everything in your way. If things get too hectic, you can slam on the brakes, which stops your forward movement for a few seconds and gives you time to change your direction or clear a path. Once you've destroyed all the level's eggs, your next task is to take on the game¿s huge bosses.  Graphically, the game is very bright and colorful and definitely exhibits a techno influence. The soundtrack is done the techno group Crystal Method, who supply some remixes as well as older tracks, which helps put you in the groove.

title: Chopper Attack
description: A terrorist group known as Guren-no-kiba has stolen weapons, kidnapped American scientists, and plans to build an unstoppable android soldier. Your elite special-forces team has been called in to eliminate this threat to mankind. Your team specializes in helicopter attacks, so first you'll want to brush up on your piloting skills and check out the eight unique choppers available. Some offer enhanced speed, while others have extra armor or are good for aerial acrobatics. While you're at it, check out all the offensive armaments available to you: you have your choice to arm your chopper with air-to-ground and air-to-air missiles, cluster bombs, and an assortment of homing missiles. Once you're confident with your machine and your skills, it's time to rocket into Mission mode where you'll fight your way through eight incredible levels of destruction. When you're not busy following your mission goals you can track down hidden power-ups and earn cash for chopper customization.

title: C: The Contra Adventure
description: The second Contra game developed by Appaloosa Interactive, and the sequel to Legacy of War. The Contra Adventure brings the series deeper into the 3D world than ever before. After the initial side-scrolling stage, the game switches to a behind-the-shoulder view, as the commando hero Ray shoots and jumps through fully 3D environments.

title: Dune 2000
description: Strategy game based on the series of successful sci-fi novels by Frank Herbert and long-awaited sequel to the strategy game Dune (for Mega Drive and Amiga). The game boasts good design and playability. There are high-quality mini-movies incorporated into the game (John Rhys Jones is among the actors featured).

title: Future Cop: L.A.P.D.
description: Los Angeles is not always a nice place. In the 22nd century, criminals overrun the city, and Los Angeles is declared uninhabitable. You take control of a mech (that can transform into a hover bike) and try to clean up the streets. Use flamethrowers, plasma bursts, mini-shockwave mortars, and many other weapons as you battle through eight action packed levels by yourself or with a friend. For those who like a little more strategy, play the Precinct Assault mode, in which both players (you can challenge the machine or another human) start with bases and construct combat units. However, building the units cost points that are earned by destroying the enemy's equipment. The first to capture the opposition's base wins the game. With its multiplayer options and a choice of two different games, FUTURE COP: LAPD offers action and excitement for every gamer.

title: M.A.X. 2
description: Futuristic strategy game featuring MAX (Mechanized Assault and Exploration). Unlike the first game, it combines turn-based and real-time combat. The game consists of four campaigns, each divided into nine missions. You control some of the forces of an inter-planetary alliance through the missions with varied battle scenarios and specific objectives. The multi-player mode enables games to be played via LAN or on-line. The game boasts good design, effective graphics and an easy-to-use control system.

title: Mega Man Legends
description: In MEGA MAN LEGENDS you take control of everyone's favorite blue hero, Mega Man. At the beginning of the game you find you've crash-landed on the island of Kattelox, and your ship is in need of repairs. While attempting to find the necessary parts to fix their ship, our fearless trio discovers that the island is under attack, and Mega Man, being the hero that he is, must stop it. You'll have to guide him through a fully polygonal 3D world composed of brightly colored towns and huge landscapes, and along the way you'll meet a large cast of characters who will help the story unfold. Keeping you company are Mega Man's sister Roll, their Grandpa Barrel, and their wacky pet monkey Data. The actual gameplay is a departure from other titles in the series, mainly because the focus is more on role-playing and exploration rather than straight platform action.
platforms: PS PSP PSP PS3 Vita N64 PC Cell

title: Parasite Eve
description: A fateful night at the opera house triggers in one woman the power to cause all those around her to spontaneously incinerate, and in another woman an innate resistance to the attack. You assume the role of the second woman New York cop Aya Brea as she comes to realize that the fate of humanity will be determined by her actions. PARASITE EVE offers an intriguing storyline in what Squaresoft has dubbed "the cinematic RPG." Its gameplay blends action and horror with traditional RPG elements, resulting in a game that is best described as an amalgam of FINAL FANTASY VII and RESIDENT EVIL. PARASITE EVE uses a unique combat system where you must maneuver Aya on the battlefield as she prepares for her next attack. The end result is that combat plays out more like an action game than an RPG.

title: MechCommander
description: MechCommander is a strategy game set in the Battletech RPG universe. Far in the future during a conflict federations of different planets, you serve as the commander of the 'Federation Suns' charged with ridding a planet of the forces of the evil 'Smoke Jaguars'. The game can be played against the computer or human players on-line (either in battles or co-operative games).

title: Pro Bass Fishing
description: Your cast breaks the stillness of a picturesque lake. Movement underwater ripples the surface. Is it a Largemouth, Walleye or Muskie? Suddenly, there's a tug on the line! What a fighter! Do you have the skill to bring him in.
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older

title: WarGames
description: Futuristic real-time strategy game based on a movie of the same name. The game is premised on a conflict between a human group (NORAD) and a group of mechanized warriors (WOPR). The single player game offers two campaigns consisting of 15 missions, one for each of the two sides. There is also a multi-player mode for games via modem or serial connection, LAN or on-line. The game incorporates a variety of unit types covering air, land and water based units and numerous types of specialized weapons. The battlefield and units are rendered in good 3D and the control system is effective.

title: High Heat Baseball 1999
description: The first-ever version of this popular MLB series for the PC, HIGH HEAT '99 brings real-life baseball to the table. All of the players, managers, teams, logos, stadiums, uniforms, and other goodies are packed in here, and the game features one of the most advanced hitting systems ever. The computer is extremely intelligent, using double switches, sacrifice bunts, and infield shifts when the contest gets tight. Play an entire season, a single game, or test your power in Home Run Derby. Options abound in this champion of baseball titles.

title: Flesh Feast
description: When you and a group of friends get trapped on a Caribbean island with no means if escape, it seems things can't get much worse. That is, of course, until swarms of the undead find out you're there. A co-operative effort, the game lets you team up with other online players giving you three new teammates to begin each round of play. The object is simple enough (beat the zombies to death), but the high AI and grueling circumstances are going to push your survival skills to the limit. Oh, one more thing don't even think about going in the water.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

title: Rally Cross 2
description: RALLY CROSS 2 brings all of the action and excitement of off-road racing to the PlayStation. You can choose from 20 vehicles including 4X4s, trucks, and Sport Utility Vehicles and hit one of the more than 24 different racetracks. All of the courses have been widened, and the learning curve is much more gradual than the original game. You can completely customize your vehicles everything from color to rim styles can be changed to your liking. The biggest change is the inclusion of the Edit mode, where you can create a track layout and choose from a range of attributes, including weather and terrain type. This feature gives the game almost infinite replay value. Do you have what it takes to master the challenges of off-road racing in RALLY CROSS 2?

title: Return Fire II
description: Return Fire II is a combat/strategy game featuring a selection of military vehicles. You control these vehicles, including a tank, PT boat and helicopter, one at a time on capture-the-flag missions whilst blasting a variety of enemy units and protecting your own bases. Major improvements have been made over the original, it boasts better graphics, improved gameplay and a new selection of multi-player options. New vehicles and weapons have been added. The single-player game consists of 30 well-designed battle scenarios and there are three multi-player game types, allowing for both competitive and cooperative action. Two people can play on the same PC or up to 16 people via modem connection, LAN or Net. The game incorporates a good diversity of terrain from deserts to the arctic. The control system is simple and effective.

title: Hedz
description: Odds are, you've never played an adventure game quite like HEDZ. A departure from the standard shoot-or-be-shot fare, this unique title challenges you to travel the galaxy in search of other life forms. Of course, as a member of a vicious (yet curious) bunch of aliens, your aim is to decapitate your discoveries. Once you've done that, you'll want to mine their brains for knowledge previously unknown to your race. A tongue-in-cheek science-fiction original, HEDZ is out of this world fun for everyone.

title: Mike Piazza's StrikeZone
description: Get ready for the Big Leagues with MIKE PIAZZA'S STRIKEZONE. There are updated rosters for all 30 major league teams, and 1997 rosters are also available. The action can take place in any of the 30 big-league ballparks, with statistics from the 1997 season encompassing 50 categories. You also get realistic weather conditions that correspond to the ballpark's location and time of year. You can opt to change league names, team names, team abbreviation, uniforms, city names, and manager names or give a player a new identity by renaming him, assigning him a new number, and maxing his abilities. The GM function allows drafts, trades, and free agency but don't try to pull a fast one, because the game will not allow unequal trades. The players are fully polygonal, which results in a more exciting presentation. Take full advantage of the responsive gameplay and vicariously experience the excitement of a live-action ball game with MIKE PIAZZA'S STRIKEZONE.

title: Virtual Chess 64
description: With a game engine that actually beat Deep Blue (the computer that took down Kasparov), VIRTUAL CHESS 64 offers a full range of both tasteful and goofy options for players of all skill levels. You can choose to play with animated pieces that battle one another in cartoon sequences when a capture is underway, or you can play in either 2D or 3D views. You can rotate the camera to view the board from any angle you'd like, and you can play against the computer or a friend. If you choose a computer opponent, you'll love the 14 different skill levels; beginner levels allow the computer to slip up once in awhile, while advanced levels have the computer calculating 3,000 moves per second. If you're new to the game, there's an interactive tutorial to take you through all aspects of chess strategy, and a convenient display marker to show you all of your possible moves. The computer can be forced to move immediately, or allowed to think for a bit. All this, and you can save your preferences and unfinished games.

title: Metal Gear Solid
description: Players slip into the role of Konami hero Solid Snake and set out on a government mission to regain control of a secret nuclear weapons base from terrorists' hands. On his quest, Snake must rely heavily on stealth to avoid being seen, but he also has more than 30 different weapons and 20 different items and gadgets at his disposal, such as night vision goggles, minesweepers, explosives, gas masks, and more. An enemy radar display at the top of the screen helps pinpoint the locations of the opposing forces, both human and mechanical. Designed by Hideo Kojima. A separate VR Missions standalone pack was also released.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence, Mature Sexual Themes

title: NASCAR 99
description: Real-life NASCAR action is in your hands, as the popular sport makes its way to the N64. Auto racing announcers Bob Jenkins and Benny Parsons call all the action, lending one of many authentic touches to this ultra-realistic game from EA Sports. Choose from 37 different NASCAR drivers including Jeff Gordon, Dale Earnhardt, and Richard Petty as you take to the 17 licensed tracks. Each driver's car is replicated in perfect detail (right down to the decals), and each is configured exactly as it was for the 1998 season. The 17 tracks including Sears Point, Atlanta Motor Speedway, and Michigan Speedway are all accurate replicas as well. Featuring smooth, solid controls, NASCAR '99 also boasts some of the most incredible collision and damage effects the gaming world has ever seen. You can make lots of modifications to your vehicle, and "NASCAR Options" allows you to make the action more or less realistic, depending on your preferences. Whether or not you follow NASCAR, you're sure to love the detailed racing excitement of NASCAR '99.

title: Kagero: Deception II
description: The Timenoids were once human. However, they chose immortality over humanity. As a result, they are unable to exist in the human world. Fearing attack, the Timenoids kidnap a young girl named Millenia. She would become the Timenoids emissary and protector in the upcoming battle with the humans. You take control of Millenia as she defends the Timenoids' castle by setting traps to dispose of the human intruders. During the 30 levels, Millenia will encounter thieves, barbarians, soldiers, ninja, knights, and sorcerers. In order to get rid of these pests, Millenia must set traps, and then use herself as bait to lure enemies into them. The enemies catch on eventually, and Millenia will have to build complex death machines that chain several traps together. Play KAGERO: Deception II, and help Millenia protect the Timenoids.

title: Xenogears
description: Xenogears is a turn-based RPG with a combat system that unifies the Square's Active Time Gauge feature as well as a newly created combo system.  The game chronicles the adventures of a young reluctant warrior named Fei, who, after three years of residing in a small, remote farming village begins a long, tortuous quest to uncover his mysterious past. With no memory of his life before being placed in the village leader's care three years earlier, Fei makes a violent and tragic break with his peaceful life and sets out upon a journey. Along the way, not only will his own past be discovered, but he'll also unravel the mystery of the planet's past and humanity's role in relation to it.
rating_content: Animated Blood, Mild Language, Suggestive Themes

title: Deadly Arts
description: Konami delivers a frantically fun 3D fighting game for the Nintendo 64: DEADLY ARTS. In this beautifully rendered collection of backgrounds, you can face off against challenging opponents with your own virtual character, using the unique Create-a-Fighter option. You create your challenger by choosing from various body shapes, heights, hairstyles, and faces. Once your gladiator is ready, you pick one of the game's cool characters to fight against. As you defeat each opponent in the ring, you'll be able to learn moves from them, eventually piecing together the best moves from each of the other fighters. Or you can use the Tag mode, where you form a three-person team; you can switch characters at any time, but anyone you drop is out for the game. Use all the fighting skills you can master (like punch, kick, block and evade), and add to your arsenal as you learn new moves. Much like VIRTUA FIGHTER, all matches are determined by the tabulation of various scores not by low energy meaning every new hit or combo move matters.

title: GT 64 Championship Edition
description: Following in the footsteps of, the Imagineer-developed game goes for all-out realism.handles differently, however, going entirely for touring car racing without off-road elements. You (and a second player) make your choice of 14 official Grand Tour racing teams and fine-tune some of the world's fastest cars the way you like it. The game features three tracks -- Europe, Japan and the United States. Setting up your (fully licensed) car is a key factor in the player's success during the championship races. Your choice of tire will determine how well your car maneuvers on wet streets or through treacherous fog. If you happen to lose control over your vehicle and slam into an obstacle, the impact will leave a lasting dent and damage your car. But if things get too hairy, you can always catch your breath during a pit stop, refuel, and repair damages.

title: NFL Blitz [1998]
description: Midway's action-packed NFL BLITZ has been ported to the Nintendo 64. The game is very similar to the arcade version, though there are a few tweaks. As in the arcade, you can play with up to two players, one on offense, one on defense. You can also write your own offensive plays and use them later. The game is like normal football, but with much more speed and far fewer rules; the result is a fun, if unrealistic look at the NFL. Every team is faithfully represented, as are the players. There are a lot of realistic tackles and other animations that help to add to the realism of the game. Each 3D character moves realistically and fluidly, putting you right in the action. For anyone who likes to recreate games with their favorite teams but doesn't like the rules that slow the action down, NFL BLITZ is the perfect solution!
platforms: N64 NGPC PC PS GBC Arcade

title: NFL Blitz [1998]
description: Here is Midway's action-packed arcade football game, now ported to the PlayStation home console. The game is very similar to the arcade game, though there are a few tweaks. As in the arcade, you can play with up to two players, one on offense and one on defense. The game plays like normal football, but with much more speed and far fewer rules. The result is a fun, if slightly warped look at the NFL. Every team is faithfully represented, as are the players. There are a lot of realistic tackles and other animations that help to add to the realism of the game, and the announcer adds plenty of funny sayings and exclamations. For anyone that likes to recreate games with their favorite teams but doesn't like the rules that slow the action down, NFL BLITZ is the perfect solution!
platforms: PS NGPC N64 PC GBC Arcade

title: NCAA Football '99
description: NCAA Football 99 gives you a shot at the title, NCAA 99 delivers the ultimate college atmosphere with all 112 teams and stadiums, authentic fight songs and chants, and all the major conferences and championship games. Stunning 3-D players takes college football to the next level. The expanded Dynasty Mode? lets you play multiple seasons and recruit next year's top talent. Winning coaches move onto more prestigious programs, while losing coaches can actually get fired. With exclusive rights to the Bowl Championship Series including the Tostitos Fiesta Bowl, FedEx Orange Bowl, Nokia Sugar Bowl and rights to the Rose Bowl, NCAA Football 99 is the only game in town.
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older

title: Gex 64: Enter the Gecko
description: Gex is appearing in his own game on the Nintendo 64 with GEX 64: Enter the Gecko. The series jumps to 3D, adding a whole new dimension of playability to the title. The story is simple, as it sets up a reason for Gex to visit various levels that are based on famous movies or television shows. Gex is a unique character he fights off enemies with his tail, and is voiced by comedian Dana Gould. Gex rattles off plenty of witty one-liners as he finishes off enemies and travels through the various levels. To advance, the player must search each location and find different objects that will open up the later levels, while dealing with ruthless and unique enemies. GEX 64: Enter the Gecko makes a giant step towards combining humor and satire in videogames, which only helps to make the title more interesting and exciting to play.
platforms: N64 PS Vita GBC PSP PC PS3
rating_content: Animated Violence, Comic Mischief, Mild Language

title: Incoming
description: Fight against alien intervention with the finest in air, land and sea combat craft with INCOMING, an addictive multi-vehicle shoot-em-up with frantic, varied action. INCOMING delivers intense atmosphere via dramatic, breathtaking special effects coupled with all out action, which results in weekend-losing player immersion!

title: Deathtrap Dungeon
description: Deathtrap Dungeon sends players into battle against more than 50 different monsters in this 3D action/combat title. Make your way through 10 dangerous 3D levels filled with mazes, corridors, dungeons, and traps while battling dragons, mummies, rats, and zombies. A variety of weapons are at the player?s disposal including a choice of swords, hammers, flame-throwers, muskets, and magical spells. Using these weapons it is up to you to do what many others failed to accomplish losing their lives in the process. You must find and destroy the great dragon Melkor and free the city of Fang from his terror.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

title: HardBall 6
description: If you've got a hankering for Major League Baseball on your PC, you'll love the highly realistic action of HARDBALL 6. All of the MLB teams and players are ready to play, and the stadiums, uniforms, logos, and other trimmings are perfectly rendered as well. This installment of the popular series boasts a new 3D graphics engine, delivering images that look like they're straight from a television broadcast. A new fielding model makes it as much fun to play right field, as it is to hit clean-up. Play alone or take on a friend.

title: Forsaken
description: Set on a post-apocalyptic Earth, Forsaken places the player in the cockpit of a small hoverbike-like craft on a mission to outlast their opponents. Whether collecting resources in tight corridors and caverns or racing to beat the clock in timed missions, Forsaken offers an exciting ride through the future.

title: Urban Assault
description: All the fear of the front line. All the pressure of command. The Apocalypse is all yours.In the bowels of a toxic Earth, you are the leader of what remains of the human race. Your task...to repel the hordes of alien invaders and renegade human forces that have descended on the planet's corpse. Control a fully-loaded army over a wasteland of vehicular genocide, whether building resources and deploying armies from your floating Host Station -- or teleporting your shell-shocked mind into the cockpit of any vehicle you choose to enter.Maximized for strategy. Optimized for destruction.You are the war machine.This is the End.

title: Warhammer: Dark Omen
description: Real-time strategy game set in the complex, fantasy universe of Warhammer 40K (developed as a board-based war game). The game is premised on a conflict between an alliance of humans, dwarves and elves and a group of undead invaders. The campaign offers a series of increasingly challenging battles interspersed with good cutscenes that advance the story. The gameplay consists of tactical combat, before each battle you must deploy your units and then you control them in-mission. Losses sustained in battles cannot be replaced so you must manage these carefully. The control system is effective. The game is played on an isometrically-viewed landscape and the graphics are good.

title: Bio F.R.E.A.K.S.
description: In the future, the United States will split into warring regions; a different corporation will control each one. These corporations will be waging a secret war using biological, flying, robotic, enhanced, armored, killing synthoids, or BIO F.R.E.A.K.S. Choose one of the eight Bio F.R.E.A.K.S. and defeat the others to take over their territory and control all of the former United States. If just beating them doesn't satisfy your need for blood, then weaken your opponents by dismembering them. Do you have the guts and the skill to take on the F.R.E.A.K.S.?

title: Icarus: Sanctuary of the Gods
description: When the servants of an evil god descend to slaughter you village, you vow to get revenge if it's the last thing you do. Play as Colias, a mercenary with a taste for vengeance. Along with your wife, Helena, you'll set out on a mission to eliminate the minions of Ercanet and restore peace to the panic-stricken countryside. With tons of weaponry and equipment to help you through your battles, you'll decide on strategies tactics, and then hop into combat in this 3D adventure for the ages.
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older

title: Rosco McQueen: Firefighter Extreme
description: The world's tallest building is burning down, and it's up to Rosco to save the day! It seems that the evil Sylvester T. Square and his robotic minions are responsible not only for the fire, but they've taken hostages as well. Guide Rosco through the towering inferno as you rescue the innocent, squelch the fire, knock off the robots, and stop old Square once and for all. There are 15 blazing levels of action to work through each more terrifying than the last. You'll need to watch out for a host of hazards including backdrafts, dangerous smoke, and electrical fires. With a dozen unique hazards in all, the robots are only the beginning of your problems! Of course, you'll have your share of special weapons and power-ups to help give you a boost: Water canisters, a Super Hose, food items, and CO2 cartridges are just a few of the items you'll have on hand. Just like any fire fighter worth his salt, Rosco always has his axe on hand too which comes in handy against menacing robots. Make sure to keep an eye on the temperature, too; if the heat gets too high, your game is over.

title: Cool Boarders 3
description: COOL BOARDERS 3 brings the actions and excitement of snowboarding to the PlayStation. Choose from over 13 different riders and 22 boards, and then hit one of the 34 courses. Race through the course as fast as possible in the boarder-cross and slalom events, or concentrate on pulling off big tricks in the halfpipe, slope style, and big air events. For those who want test all of their skills, try the tournament mode and compete in all five events. When competition gets to be too much, try to perfect all of your moves in the practice mode. If your friends think they get down the mountain better than you do, make them put their money where their mouth is with the two-player mode. No matter how you play, the analog control makes taking charge of the action easier than ever. All of the action in COOL BOARDERS 3 will keep boarding bums busy for days.

title: Trespasser
description: In Trespasser, you are a young woman whose plane has crashed on the second island from Jurassic Park, site B, where dinosaurs still roam free.  Your character, Anne, has to explore the island for a way to get off, or try to contact some help. Trespasser features 8 levels full of jungle terrain and dinosaurs.

title: NCAA GameBreaker '99
description: NCAA GAMEBREAKER '99 continues this series' tradition of realistic college football simulations. You'll get features like the Customize Play option, which lets you design your own plays and really makes the possibilities almost endless. While many other football games neglect the running game, NCAA GAMEBREAKER '99 embraces it with open arms. Don't be surprised to find yourself on a 60-yard sprint to the endzone! As the running game is essential to any successful college program, the emphasis on it in GAMEBREAKER truly makes this the most realistic football sim you're likely to find. Of course, you also get all the standard gameplay modes, fully polygonal and texture-mapped players, and all of the college stadiums and team logos. NCAA GAMEBREAKER '99 can be enjoyed by up to eight players through the use of the Multi-tap.If you're ready to make a run at greatness, then get your hands on NCAA GAMEBREAKER '99.

title: Extreme PaintBrawl
description: Intense paintball action takes the spotlight in this full-on warfare extravaganza. Enter real tournament and season play, using eight incredible weapons to splatter your opponents with paint. Battle through five environments including Urban, Medieval, Desert, and Space enjoying games like Capture the Flag, Strategic Assault, and Elimination. If you're nervous about hopping right into competition, start out by honing your skills in Practice mode. Play against a computer-controlled squad or compete against real players over the Internet.

title: Bushido Blade 2
description: BUSHIDO BLADE 2 for the PlayStation brings back sword and weapon fighting action from the original BUSHIDO BLADE. There is no time limit and there are no health meters and one shot can kill you. At your disposal are the weapons you've mastered, your wits, your blocking ability, and an open fighting area where you can run and reposition yourself to better take on the enemy. There are six characters to choose from, with 12 more to unlock, and three modes of play including Story, Versus, and Training. With the link option, you and a friend can play each with your own screen by using a link cable. The Story mode pits you against other ninja, samurai and bosses, while Training lets you perfect your fighting style, which you will definitely need to do to master this game.

title: Front Office Football
description: The debut edition of Solecismic Software's football management sim, which features detailed management over trading (including free agency, draft and salary issues), career and season statistics, home towns, and quarterback "learning" skill development and team player stat increases.

title: NHL '99
description: NHL '99 from Electronic Arts is all about improving on an already top of the line series. The improvements from last years PC version include smoother game play, harder checks and improved AI.

title: F-Zero X
description: F-ZERO was a classic on the SNES, and now it makes its first appearance on the Nintendo 64 with F-ZERO X. As with the original game, you get behind the controls of a rocket-powered hover car and race to the finish line on tracks that twist and turn through the air. However, you will have to avoid the other 29 cars on the track or else face the consequences. You can choose from 30 different cars and learn the ins and outs of every one of the 24 tracks in the Practice mode. When you want some competition, try to win a Grand Prix Cup, get the fastest lap time in a Time Trial, or destroy the competition in a Death Race. You can also challenge three friends in the Versus mode. Can you survive the speed and action of F-ZERO X?

title: Armored Core: Project Phantasma
description: What is more fun than building a robot and making it your own personal killing machine? Nothing. Armored Core: Project Phantasma gives you the chance to create the world's deadliest robot. How do you know if your creation is a success? Why not have it go head-to-head with one of the 49 pre-made robots that are available? While creating your robot, you'll have access to tons of Armored Core parts and combinations, allowing the most efficiency for your robot. You can even transfer data over from the first ARMORED CORE in order to increase your robot's potential. If you've got a friend who thinks he can create a better robot than you can, put him to the test and pit your robots against each other in a two-player split-screen deathmatch. However, if one-on-one battles aren't your thing, Armored Core: Project Phantasma offers 17 new single-player missions, each of which will blow your mind.

title: Star Trek: The Next Generation: Klingon Honor Guard
description: You are a novice Klingon guard, suddenly thrown from a holodeck training exercise into the real world, and have to battle real opponents to rise in rank and honor.

title: Team Losi RC Racer
description: Take control of a remote-controlled car and race around a variety of tracks in TEAM LOSI RC RACER. There are total of 16 cars to choose from, each rated in speed, acceleration, grip and weight. At the outset you must select the track that you want to race on from a hub of the available courses. After you have completed all of the races in a hub, you must search the tracks for entrances to new tracks. Once you have found the entrance, the new track will be available for racing. While you're racing you'll come across a number of power-ups that will give you an advantage over the competition including freeze time, turbo, ghost, and copter. If your friends want in on the action, they can join you with the Two-Player option. See if you can take the checkered flag in TEAM LOSI RC RACER.

title: Duke Nukem: Time to Kill
description: Duke Nukem takes on a third-person perspective in DUKE NUKEM: Time to Kill. Time-traveling aliens threaten Earth's future, and Duke must travel through time to ancient Rome, the Wild West, and a futuristic Space Age to stop them. One there, he must run, jump, climb, swim, and shoot his way to finding the colored crystals that are the key to defeating the aliens. Before finding the crystals, use pipe bombs, gatling guns, and shotguns to put the bad guys out of commission. Luckily, you won't miss a second of the action because Duke becomes transparent when he would otherwise be obscuring the carnage. You also won't miss a single time-twisting alien by using the look function to aim your weapons. If blowing away the aliens is no fun, challenge your friends to a death match in the two-player mode. Can Duke save the world from the alien scum? DUKE NUKEM: Time to Kill contains the answer to that question.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence, Strong Sexual Content

title: Knights and Merchants: The Shattered Kingdom
description: Empire-building sim. The game consists of a series of 20 missions with diverse objectives. Your character is in the service on a king whose kingdom has been reduced to a small area and the overall the aim of the game is to reconquering the entire kingdom. The gameplay involves resource management, town building and strategic combat. The multi-player mode allows up to 5 people to play via hotseating, modem/serial connection, LAN or on-line. The graphics are reasonable, although they have been surpassed by more recent games. Play is accompanied by a medieval-style musical sound tracks.

title: Iggy's Reckin' Balls
description: Acclaim has taken a new approach to racing games with IGGY'S RECKIN' BALLS, available on the Nintendo 64. The player must control balls that race up a 3D track, while jumping out of the way of the enemy, like in a 2D platformer. Mixing these two concepts together creates something totally different from any other game out there, and it results in fast and addictive gameplay. The game can be played by one to four players, which results in the opportunity to play huge multiplayer battles. Each player is able to choose a different character and race on one of many available tracks. The audio side mixes some techno tunes, along with voice acting that is aimed towards a younger audience. IGGY'S RECKIN' BALLS is able to mix two disparate forms of gaming, along with contradictory graphic styles, to make a title that a gamer of any age could pick up and enjoy.

title: Independence War
description: There's a bloody civil war raging, and you're right in the eye of the storm. From the cockpit of your Corvette class vehicle, you'll decide exactly which resources you need to use for each battle, and then jump into combat. The struggle is against a rebellious bunch called the "Indies," and they'll stop at nothing to destroy your ship and conquer the universe. A realistic physics model makes for extremely interesting flight, and the awesome, 3D graphics truly deliver the excitement to your PC.

title: Spyro the Dragon
description: Gnasty Gnorc decides to make the dragons pay for all of the insults they have directed his way. After dabbling in magic, Gnasty turns the gems that litter the world into his soldiers and changes the dragons into crystals. However, the magic spell missed a young dragon named Spyro. You must guide Spyro through 36 levels spread across six worlds as he tries to free his brethren from their crystalline prisons. To make his way through each stage, Spyro can run, jump, glide, walk, roll, and fly. When he encounters an enemy, he can dispose of them with fire-breath or a charge attack. When the going gets really tough, power-ups upgrade the fire-breath to a fireball or superflames. Try to save the other dragons and return the world to normal in SPYRO THE DRAGON.

title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six
description: You are the leader of Rainbow Six, a super-secret organization put together by the U.N. to fight terrorism. Your team is made up of the best of the best from countries around the world. When someone starts trouble, and the political situation makes things to hot for local enforcement to handle, your team comes in and takes care of business. The game itself is a first-person shooter with a real eye towards realism. Before each mission, you select which members of your team you're going to take with you into a fight, arm them with the appropriate real-world weaponry, divide them into teams, and then plot out on a map where each team is going to go, and what actions they're going to take. Once you leave the plotting stage, you choose which one of the squad leaders you'll play as and the mission begins. Each mission has its own objectives, but most of them revolve around rescuing hostages, stealing information, or other covert actions.
platforms: PC N64 PS DC Mac PS3 PSP GBC PC

title: Command & Conquer: Red Alert Retaliation
description: Command & Conquer: Red Alert Retaliation brings the Counterstrike and Aftermath expansions to the PlayStation. According to historical lore, Albert Einstein went back in time and eliminated Hitler from history. Messing with the space-time continuum always has unintended consequences, and this story is no different. In the new timeline, World War II never occurred and Stalin and the Soviets expanded unchecked into Eastern Europe. Now, the Allies have formed to put a stop to Stalin and his plans. Play as either the Soviets or the Allies each with unique missions and troops, including 100 two-player missions (link-cable required) and seven new units. Since each side has different advantages and disadvantages, varied strategies and thinking are required to be successful. In general, missions consist of establishing and defending a base, gathering resources, and destroying the enemy base. Take over Europe or defend it; the choice is yours in Command & Conquer: Red Alert Retaliation.
rating_content: Animated Violence, Use of Alcohol and Tobacco

title: Heart of Darkness
description: Andy and his dog, Whisky, are out in the park having a good time. Suddenly, a solar eclipse occurs, and Whisky disappears. Andy jumps into his homemade space ship and travels to another world to save his dog. As one would expect, Andy encounters some resistance and crash lands on the planet. You will take control of Andy as he travels through eight unique worlds in search of his companion. Each world is divided into a series of puzzles, some of which require blasting enemies with the plasma cannon, while others require running and jumping. After solving several puzzles, the player is treated to beautiful video sequences that congratulate the player and advance the story. Whisky needs to be saved, and Andy is the only person who can do it in HEART OF DARKNESS.
rating_content: Animated Violence, Use of Alcohol and Tobacco

title: NFL GameDay 99
description: Head out to the gridiron, gamers it's GAMEDAY. The ever-popular football franchise returns to the PC with its most impressive entry to date. Considered by many to be the foremost NFL experience for the home computer, NFL GAMEEDAY 99 features all of the current teams, lineups, uniforms, logos, and stadiums of the pros. Motion-capture animation makes the players look and behave like their real-life counterparts, while TV-style presentation keeps things entertaining at all times. Throw in great commentary, and you've got yourself a football game.
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older

title: Pro-Pinball: Timeshock!
description: TIMESHOCK! PRO PINBALL might not be the real thing, but it's about as close to the arcade-machine experience as you're going to get. The savvy developers at Empire Interactive are true-to-life pinball enthusiasts, and it's apparent in the painstaking care they've taken in getting every little detail just right. The sights and sounds of a quality pinball machine are all here to be enjoyed. From fully animated flippers, jets, diverters, and switches that bounce and react just like their real-life counterparts, to balls that clatter as they roll up and down the wooden table, and scores that ring out loudly. Three modes of play are available: Novice, Tournament and Special Challenge mode. Unexpected "extras" are also included, like fast-action multi-ball play, magnetic ball saving, light, sound and bumper tests, and even table nudging via the PlayStation controller! Everything the true pinball connoisseur could hope for is here to be savored.

title: Motocross Madness [1998]
description: Published by Microsoft, Motocross Madness featured a realistic motocross physics model, detailed and expansive terrain, challenging AI, and realistic bike audio. The wrecks in the game are not only bone-chillingly realistic, but at times hysterical.

title: Sanitarium
description: The Sanitarium is a game where players come face to face with the protagonist's haunted mind and the enemies that hide there. Players journey through 13 levels and face over 80 enemies in a variety of disturbing environments as they attempt to save the protagonist from inpending doom.

title: Peter Jacobsen's Golden Tee Golf
description: Peter Jacobsen's GOLDEN TEE GOLF moves from the arcade to your PC in this faithful adaptation of the beloved game. Take your best swing against the pros enjoying the fastest-moving golf action ever. This game is pure, arcade-style action starring all of your favorite players. The innovative TrakSwing feature introduced in the coin-operated version is included, allowing you maximum control over your drives. If 18 holes of pure excitement aren't enough for you, check out the amazing graphics and comprehensive options.

title: Nam
description: It's not as cut and dry as the obvious good guys and bad guys setup of World War II, but the Vietnam War is the backdrop of this intense combat title. Play as a U.S. soldier, fighting against the Vietnamese. You'll begin your mission armed with only a Colt 45 and a knife, but you can earn the right to wield machine guns, rocket launchers, and more as the game progresses. The action is rendered in startlingly bold 3D, and the voice acting is cinema quality. Play against the computer or get up to six players in on the action via Internet.

title: Unreal
description: You are a convict in voyage towards the penal colony on the starship Vortex Rikers. But something has gone wrong. You are now the only survivors of a crash-landing on the planet Na Pali, once home to the peaceful and worshipping Nali who have now been enslaved by the evil Skaarj. Only they, however, have the technology that would allow you to escape from this place, but the 30 levels are fraught with peril and with other races enslaved by the Skaarj. 10 weapons, your wits and a few courageous Nali are all left on your side.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

title: Final Fantasy VII
description: FINAL FANTASY VII has quickly become one of the best-selling Role Playing games of all time.  Combining fully polygonal characters with pre-rendered backgrounds and a stirring musical score by Nobuo Uematsu, FINAL FANTASY VII is a worthwhile addition to any RPG collection. The story centers on the young mercenary Cloud Strife, who is fighting against the evil Shinra, Inc. Along the way, he meets an unforgettable cast of characters such as his childhood friend Tifa Lockhart and the grumpy pilot Cid Highwind. All together, it is an unforgettable and engrossing single-player game that can last for over 60 hours!
platforms: PC PS3 iPhone PS4 PS Android PSP
rating_content: Violence, Blood, Sexual Themes, Partial Nudity, Language, Crude Humor, Use of Alcohol and Tobacco

title: Game, Net & Match
description: Tennis takes center court in this detailed trip to the hard court (and three other surfaces). Play singles or doubles on 13 beautifully rendered tennis courts, competing as any of a dozen original characters. Six male and six female players make up the ranks that you can select from, and 200 computer-controlled opponents will give each match a unique level of competition. Play a season comprised of 169 tournaments or just try a single match. You'll be able to control topspin, slice, drop shots, and more in this accurate classic for the PC.

title: The Operational Art of War, Vol. 1
description: The Operational Art of War--Volume 1: 1939-1955, created by noted designer Norm Koger, is one of the most powerful military simulations yet produced. Essentially two separate systems, it is both a game and a scenario designer. Players have a high level of control over units, from company to corps level, with a wide array of command choices. A unique element of the game is its fluid turn system. Instead of fixed phases for movement and combat, players can resolve attacks at any point in their turn, reacting in a more realistic way to situations as they develop. The game has good graphics, although the main map can be difficult to navigate. Units are represented by "counters" using standard military symbols, which beginners may find confusing. Scenarios included are World War II, Korea, Middle East and hypothetical East-West conflicts.

title: Might and Magic VI: The Mandate of Heaven
description: The Ironfist Dynasty is tottering on the brink of ruin. As endless calamities plague the kingdom of Enroth, evil doomsday cultists plan to overthrow child Prince Nicolai and claim the throne for their charismatic leader. Fear grips the land and the people wonder if their sovereign has lost the Mandate of Heaven - the divine right to rule. The enemies of reason are at the gate and only extraordinary heroes can stem the tide of darkness. Will you answer the call?From the depths of the deepest dungeons, to the intrigues of the royal court, you will lead a band of adventurers on a dangerous journey of amazing depth and intelligence. With a completely new 3D graphics engine and a non-linear adventure system, Might and Magic VI: The Mandate of Heaven brings a unique role-playing experience to life.

title: Test Drive Off-Road 2
description: If you think roads are too restricting, then race with vehicles that are designed to leave the asphalt in TEST DRIVE OFF ROAD 2. There are 20 vehicles to choose from including a Hummer, Dodge Ram, Jeep Wrangler, Ford Explorer, Jeep Cherokee, Range Rover, Ford F-150, and a Dodge T-Rex. When you are ready to race you can take the World Tour and race in five different classes (Hummer, SUV, Truck, Military, and Safari). In each class you will compete in five races where you'll have to finish in the top three to advance to the next one. After competing in all of the classes every track will be unlocked, and you will be able to compete in the Open Class circuit. Who needs roads when you can drive anywhere with TEST DRIVE OFF ROAD 2?

title: Railroad Tycoon II
description: The sequel to the legendary Railroad Tycoon, Railroad Tycoon II, puts gamers in control of 34 cargo types and 51 train engines from around the world. Players can span the ages from 1804 to beyond 2000 while establishing transportation empires and outmaneuvering fellow robber barons. Scenarios allow for world-wide exploration and expansion. A sophisticated economy and stock market for Wall Street plunderers lets players test their entrepreneurial prowess. Whether building railroads across the unexplored American West in or acting as a technological pioneer in the far future, players must carefully manage their railroad for success.

title: WCW/NWO Revenge
description: In 1997, THQ introduced wrestling to the N64 with WCW/NWO: World Tour. Now, they have added more wrestlers, more venues, better graphics, options galore and an improved "grappling" system. The game has EEPROM memory (you don't need a memory card!). The main features include: All WCW belts; More than 60 wrestlers; Championship mode; More than 700 frames of animation per wrestler. See it for yourself, get your Revenge!

title: Rival Schools: United by Fate
