When a category appears, it is recorded on a memory card to help prevent questions from repeating. See if you can survive the Daily Doubles and become a champion in JEOPARDY!

title: O.D.T.: Escape... ...Or Die Trying
description: After crash-landing in unknown territory, players must retrieve a magical pearl of power in order to save their homeland of Calli. O.D.T. features four playable characters, (a wizard, a female fighter, a soldier or a mercenary), each with their own unique strengths and weaknesses. Depending on which character a player selects, the gaming outcome may vary. For example, the wizard, who may not possess the maneuvering skills of the mercenary, may need to find an alternative route around an area that the mercenary could scale with ease. Likewise, a mercenary may have trouble dealing with an obstacle that requires a magical presence, in which case the wizard would be very beneficial. Features include 16 different spells, four weapons with nine power-levels each and RPG-like elements with its own player-management system, constitution, weapon control and spirit abilities.

title: Streak: Hoverboard Racing
description: Experience the future of extreme sports today with STREAK: Hoverboard Racing. You can race as 12 different boarders on one of 12 different hoverboards. After selecting a board and rider, use the Training mode to learn the twists and turns of all 12 tracks. Keep in mind that pulling off big stunts will increase your speed. When you want a challenge, try to attain the highest ranking by racing your way through the Streaker Circuit in the Career mode. When the computer-controlled competition doesn't the proper level of challenge, you can race against your friends in a Two-Player split-screen race. If you don't want to race at all, you can concentrate on performing tricks in the Freestyle mode. Do you have the skills to master STREAK: Hoverboard Racing?

title: NHL Breakaway '99
description: The theme with Nintendo 64 hockey sequels is: The same game in different packaging. Wayne Gretzky?s 3D hockey from Midway did the same thing, and other than a few menu changes and a create a player feature, Acclaim just pulled a Midway. Again, a great simulation NHL Breakaway does have a great simulation based game, it is just very similar to last years version.

title: Milo's Astro Lanes
description: Bowling fans can enjoy an evolved form of the game set in the space-age future with MILO'S ASTRO LANES. Milo Terwilliker, whose name graces the alley, is at the center of this bowling universe. You can take advantage of power-ups, strategic points located along the lanes that change the performance of your bowling ball, to knock down the pins. You can also mega-size your ball to mow down more pins, or splinter it into three separate balls to increase your chances. The power-ups can also be used to your advantage as defensive tactics, by transforming your opponent's ball into the size of a pea or melting it with an acid spray. As the game progresses, you'll be rewarded with bonus rounds and more lanes. Enjoy these special attacks, the Multiplayer mode, and more as you raze the competition!

title: FOX Sports College Hoops '99
description: The pure and unadulterated thrill of competition comes to the Nintendo 64 with FOX SPORTS COLLEGE HOOPS ‘99. You can choose to play as one of 120 big-time college basketball programs. Once you have your team, play an Exhibition mode to get a feel for your team's offense and defense. For more challenging competition, guide your squad through a season and try to make the NCAA Tournament. If you want, you can skip the season and go to a conference tournament, or directly to the Final Four. The Season and Tournament modes will track statistics with the aid of a memory pack. Since there are six different camera angles to play from, you will not miss a second of the action. Lead your team to the big dance with FOX SPORTS COLLEGE HOOPS '99.

title: Star Wars: Rogue Squadron 3D
description: The Death Star has been destroyed thanks to Skywalker's and Wedge Antilles' efforts. But the Empire is quickly regaining strength; Rogue Squadron is formed comprising the best pilots in the Alliance. Their current mission: stop the imperial threats over Alliance planets in twelve missions (plus secret). Their vehicles: X-Wings, A-Wings, V-Wings, the snowspeeder and, with the latest patch, even an Episode 1 Naboo Fighter!

title: S.C.A.R.S
description: If you've always wanted to race as a wild animal in a combat car circa the year 3000   strangely enough, your dream has come true. Choose from five animal cars Mammoth, Rhino, Lion, Mantis, or Shark each made unique by its speed, handling, armor, and weapons. Grand Prix Mode gives you three main cups composed of a few races each and there's a customizable cup that can last for up to eight races. In Challenge Mode, you race against one of four additional characters Cheetah, Panther, Cobra, or Scorpion  earning the right to play as that character if you defeat him, which just isn't going to be easy. All of the standard weapons are here (missiles, shields, and turbos), plus some more inventive weapons, such as freeze magnets and energy fields. The best weapon, however, may well be a ticking time bomb that gets passed back and forth between racers until it decides to go off. With inventive combat and characters, exciting graphics, and solid gameplay in the tradition of SUPER MARIO KART, S.C.A.R.S. is an original!

title: Knockout Kings
description: Professional boxing comes to the PlayStation with KNOCKOUT KINGS. Choose from 38 professional boxers from all weight classes including Evander Holyfield, Ike Quartey, Lennox Lewis, Michael Moore, Shane Mosley, Oscar De La Hoya, "Sugar" Ray Leonard, and Muhammad Ali. For some quick action, choose any two boxers and enter an Arcade match. Arcade matches are less realistic and can result in quick knockouts. However, you can also choose to play in a simulation Exhibition match, where you must master ring strategies and wear down your opponent. If you are looking for a real challenge, create a boxer and fight through the ranks and become world champion. KNOCKOUT KINGS brings the subtlety of the sweet science to your living room, without having pay outrageous pay-per-view prices.

title: Motorhead
description: The future of racing is here, and it's called MOTORHEAD. This game allows you to hop in one of 10 streamlined racers and test your skills on eight obstacle-filled courses that wind through urban, desert, and seaside terrain. Play modes include the standard Time Attack, Single Race, League, and Head-to-Head competition found in any decent racing game. One unique feature of MOTORHEAD is that you can choose between 30 or 60 frames per second. Choosing 60fps gives the game a polished look, but you're limited to a three-car field. While going with 30fps hurts in the visual department, it does expand the field to seven cars; you'll probably want to experiment with both to figure out which one works best for you.. This futuristic racer has impressive visuals and cleverly designed vehicles that help put you in a futuristic state of mind. So if you're in the mood for a fast and fun racing experience, get your hands on MOTORHEAD.

title: No One Can Stop Mr. Domino
description: When your town is being overrun with colored blocks, there's only one man to call: MR. DRILLER. Creeping up from deep within the earth, the adorably button-nosed Mr. Driller must get to the bottom of things   literally. MR. DRILLER's Arcade mode requires you to burrow to the bottom of either a 2500- or 5000-foot passage. By facing a direction, Mr. Driller will drill through the block next to him, causing all like-colored blocks touching it to crumble as well. Three obstacles gravity, Mr. Driller's air supply, and the insidious X blocks make this harder than it sounds. Two additional modes, Survival and Time Attack, add to the replay value. MR. DRILLER is a cute puzzle game that harkens back to old-school games like DIG DUG.

title: Rugrats: The Search for Reptar
description: Tommy can't find his Reptar puzzle pieces, and its up to the rest of the gang to help him out. Play as Chuckie, Angelica, Phil, and Lil as you search the Rugrats world for the 12 missing pieces to Tommy's puzzle. The 3D adventure begins in the Pickles' house but continues to the backyard, a miniature golf course, a supermarket, and even the toy store! Objects you find will grant you access to more advanced levels (there are 14 in all), each of which is classified as easy, medium, or hard. On each level, your task is to help a Rugrat complete his or her mission and each challenge you meet will help you finish the puzzle. As you're playing, you'll stumble onto bonus levels like "Cookie Race," "Touchdown Tommy," and "No More Cookies." Each bonus challenge will help you earn Reptar Bars 15 of which will get you a puzzle piece. You don't have to be a baby to appreciate this amusing epic.

title: Top Gear Overdrive
description: Get ready to tear up some asphalt in this installment of the popular TOP GEAR series. Unlike the simulation-style racing of its predecessors, TOP GEAR OVERDRIVE comes complete with wacky leaps, Nitro bursts, and insane shortcuts. The seven all-new tracks take you through ancient ruins, glacial peaks, creepy swamps, and towering skyscrapers, and each of the tracks can also be mirrored making for twice as many courses.  The Championship mode starts you out with one of two inferior machines, challenging you to move up from 12th place. If you finish in the top four spots, you'll earn enough money to upgrade your vehicle, and you can keep doing so as long as you can keep finishing in the top four. Championship mode will take you through six grueling seasons in this manner.

title: Wheel of Fortune
description: Buy up vowels to win fabulous prizes in Wheel of Fortune, the game based on the popular show.

title: Buck Bumble
description: The basis for BUCK BUMBLE is not as far-fetched as you might imagine. The catalyst is a truck hauling some toxic waste to the dump that accidentally splashes a country field with the deadly toxins. The insects that survive the spill instantly begin transforming both mentally and physically. Soon a sophisticated military hierarchy has developed one with a single goal in mind: conquer all the insect races on the planet. Young Buck Bumble is a brave bumblebee that wants to fight for freedom. After he's told that he's too scrawny to become a soldier, he volunteers for a dangerous Super Insect Soldier program. In a flash of light, super-powered BUCK BUMBLE stands ready to defeat the EVIL HERD in a senses-shattering 3D shooter that has you battling cybernetic insects like acid-spitting Ants, Giz Beetles, Transporter insects, Craneflies, Dragonflies, Wasp MK1 Units, and the dreaded "Killapillas."

title: Oddworld: Abe's Exoddus
description: ODDWORLD: Abe's Exoddus is another wild adventure for Abe and his enslaved friends. Cast with a zoo of bizarre characters almost all of whose favorite past time is to injure, torture, or brutalize the benevolent Mudokons Exoddus features similar gameplay to the first ODWORLD title, namely 2D platforming. People have always flocked to this series because of the lovable characters and offbeat sense of humor found in the games. New characters include Fleeches, Greeters, Slurgs, Slogs, Flying Sligs, and Sloggies. The old favorites have also returned and include Scrabs, Paramites, and Sligs. A new wrinkle in the game is that you can now possess Scrabs, Paramites, and Glukkons; you can command Sligs to do your dirty work as well.

title: FIFA '99
description: Instead of trying to recreate the World Cup tournament, FIFA 99 squarely focuses on the the European league, with more than 250 soccer teams battling for the cup. Don't worry, EA didn't forget about the rest of the World. You can select plenty of international teams, from Argentina to Yugoslavia, as well as US and Brazilian league teams. FIFA 99 also dishes up a much more varied lineup of game modes, including a European Dream league and Cup Creation modes. In addition to its wider variety of modes, EA wisely included a Player Edit and a Team Edit function, so you can keep your teams up to date (you need a memory pak to save, of course). Like in FIFA 98, you can change face maps, give your players names, adjust attributes, and so forth. However, there are still no separate height and weight attributes for players.

title: Nightmare Creatures
description: Free your homeland in 19th-century Prague from a horde of gothic horror monsters that have been released by an evil wizard in this action-adventure. Your ultimate goal is to hunt down Adam Crowley, who has resurrected the Brotherhood of Hecate. You will yield weapons such as swords and other items and powerups like proximity mines, all aiding you in your heroic crusade of cleaning the zombies off the streets.

title: Half-Life
description: You are Gordon Freeman, a young research associate in the Anomalous Materials Laboratory. You have limited security clearance and no real idea of just how dangerous your job has become, until the morning you are sent alone into the Test Chamber to analyze a strange crystalline specimen. A routine analysis, they tell you. Until something goes wrong. In this legendary FPS, players enlist the help of traumatized scientists and trigger-happy security guards to get through high-security zones, sneaking and fighting your way through ruined missile silos and Cold War cafeterias, through darkened airducts and subterranean railways. When you finally come in sight of the surface, you realize that the inhuman monsters aren't your only enemies-for the government has sent in ruthless troops and stealthy assassins. Their orders seem to be that when it comes to the Black Mesa, nothing gets out alive... and especially not you.
rating_content: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Language

title: Heretic II
description: Heretic II is a third-person action game based on the Quake II engine that plunges you into a deep, compelling game combining brutal face-to-face combat and mystery-laden adventure. Gamers travel through complex, richly detailed environments filled with stunning special effects, wicked magic spells, detailed characters, vivid artwork and challenging level designs created by the Raven team and renowned fantasy artist Brom.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

title: SiN
description: Colonel John Blade, the leader of HARDCORPS, quickly finds himself up against Elexis Sinclaire, a very rich and very intelligent biochemist in this action-packed FPS. Elexis has her own plans for the city of Freeport and they aren't good. Sin is a fully-integrated first-person 3D action game utilizing id software's Quake II 3D engine.
rating_content: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Language, Sexual Themes

title: Bust A Groove
description: BUST A GROOVE brings dance simulation to the PlayStation. Choose from 10 dancers, each created using motion-capture animation, which results in the most authentic moves possible. After picking a dancer, hit the dance floor in the Practice mode to get a feel for the control. When linking moves together becomes child's play, hit the dance scene in the One-Player mode where the goal is to get the crowd and the camera to pay exclusive attention to you. When your groove becomes too hot for the computer to handle, challenge friends with the Two-Player mode. No matter what mode you play, a wide selection of ska, techno, disco, and hip-hop house music provides the beat for all of the action. If hearing music makes you want to shake your booty, then BUST A GROOVE is the game for you.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
description: Nintendo's highly acclaimed adventure brings the classic series into the third dimension. After a nightmare involving a certain young princess and the evil thief Ganondorf, series hero Link wakes up in his home village tucked away behind the mysterious Lost Woods. The only Kokiri without a fairy, Link soon meets up with his new traveling companion, the winged Navi, and sets out on the adventure of his life. The quest, which inevitably turns into a rescue mission for Princess Zelda, leads players through dark dungeons, picturesque villages, into the heart of a volcano, to the bottom of a lake, through a haunted desert, deep into a magical forest, into a giant tree, the belly of a beast, and even through time.

title: Darkstalkers 3
description: Three ancient spirits ruled the Dark World; Jedah, the oldest spirit, was resurrected. In an effort to rule over the Dark World alone, Jedah wants to save all of the dispirited souls. To create his perfect salvation, he calls those with valuable souls to his world so can take control of them. Choose from 18 horror themed characters as they battle in a tournament to the death. Every character has unique combinations and ultra powerful dark force moves. Be warned, though, as the arenas can have positive and negative effects on the fighters. You'll be mesmerized by the gorgeous, hand drawn animation that brings the action to life. After beating the computer controlled contenders, challenge your friends in the versus mode, and if they fear your superior skills, feel free to handicap the match. Darkstalkers 3 will challenge your skills as you fight to become the ruler of the night.
platforms: PS PS2 Saturn Arcade PS3 PSP

title: Street Fighter Collection 2
description: Street Fighter Collection 2 lets you relive the early days of the modern fighting game. The collection includes the original Street Fighter II as well as two of its sequels: Street Fighter II: Championship Edition and Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting. All three games retain their classic arcade gameplay that will remind you of days past. The fireballs, throws, and combinations that are staple of the Street Fighter series are included, as well as unique endings for each character in each of the games.

title: Kartia
description: At the beginning of KARTIA, you must choose to play as the pious daughter of a high priest or as a free knight searching for purpose. Both characters have unique stories and endings. However, there is some crossover between both plots. The vast majority of the gameplay focuses on the use of a magical set of cards, which can provide useful resources, labor, weapons, and magic spells. Throughout the game the player will receive new cards that can be combined with older cards, thus creating more powerful and creative abilities. Along the way players will have to think about how to use these abilities to gain tactical advantages. Characters designed by Yoshitaka Amano (FINAL FANTASY) inhabit 3D battlefields that can be rotated for the best view. With two separate quests and a large number of abilities to discover, KARTIA will keep the player busy for quite some time.

title: Asteroids
description: They said it couldn't be done, but they were wrong: a new and improved Asteroids that is just as addictive as the original. The classic shooter has been converted into a 3D space shooter with tons of features, like mind-blowing 3D graphics, innovative cutscenes, and intense special effects. Another improvement over the original is the dynamic weapon arsenal: laser nets, repulser shields, and shockwaves to name a few. The new Asteroids, however, uses the same style of gameplay as the original, along with similar sound effects. This is nostalgia at its best. But with all the new weapons, gameplay styles, and enemies, this game has replay value that makes it stand out from the original. Asteroids is made for the nostalgia gamer that misses the '70s, as well as new gamers who want a taste of the old days.
rating_content: Mild Animated Violence, Mild Realistic Violence

title: Jeopardy! [1998]
description: This 1998 version of the popular trivia show featured host Alex Trebek challing players with the answers to over 3500 questions.

title: Tomb Raider III: Adventures of Lara Croft
description: If you think you're ready for a world of incredible adventure, then grab a copy of TOMB RAIDER III: Adventures of Lara Croft for the PlayStation. In this exciting third installment of the TOMB RAIDER series, you'll swim, jump, crawl, climb, sprint, dive, roll, and shoot your way across the globe. You'll explore teeming jungles, London rooftops, the icy wastes of Antarctica and Nevada's infamous Area 51. Once again you play the role of Lara Croft, who has many new moves, including the monkey swing. You can also drive new vehicles including a kayak, ATV, and a snowmobile. Collect scattered pieces and attempt to uncover the frightening mystery of an ancient meteor, rumored to have amazing life-giving powers. Wade into battle with your lethal arsenal of weapons that includes pistols, hefty magnums, powerful shotguns, and machine guns. Fight swarms of wily henchmen, vicious piranhas, monkeys, and the now infamous T-Rex, in your dangerous quest of puzzle solving, action, and discovery.

title: Assault: Retribution
description: Your mission is to destroy the enemy by any means necessary. If you fail, the world as we know it may come to an end. You'll be fighting through seven intense levels as you try to reach the evil enemy and bring safety to your city. Whether you journey to undiscovered alien worlds or battle at the end of the earth, it's all here. Have no fear though, as you'll have a huge array of weapons to choose from: multi-phase pulse rifles, overwhelming shock weapons, and magnetic bolt accelerators, just to name a few. Each weapon will serve its own purpose in destroying the mutant race. If you can't do it alone, then join up with a friend in the Two-Player Cooperative mode. The Two-Player mode offers more mutants, different routes, and insane challenges behind every door. No matter how you play this game though, you'll be in for some action-packed fun.

title: Apocalypse
description: APOCALYPSE is now. An evil man, who wishes to unleash chaos and plague across the world, has summoned the harbingers of doom--the four horsemen. That's where Trey Kincaide comes in. Kincaide, a vicious convict, is the only man that can stop this evil. He is played by Bruce Willis, everyone's favorite star of the DIE HARD movies. You'd think this was a setup for a movie right? But it's not; this is a PlayStation game that will never see the big screen. Visually, APOCALYPSE is overwhelming. The graphics are clean and crisp, and the character models are beautifully rendered. It also features several gorgeous cutscenes that help enhance the story. The levels, while not being terribly difficult, are massive, and there is what seems to be an endless array of levels to play. This game is a must for any fan of great action movies or games.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence, Mild Language

title: A Bug's Life
description: This epic story follows an outcast ant named Flik through his trials and triumphs as he tries to save his colony from a vicious gang of grasshoppers, led by the evil Hopper. The game features cinematic scenes taken straight from the movie, adding a whole new level to the gaming experience. Also taken from the film are sound effects, score samples, and celebrity personas. Be ready to be left in awe after playing this gaming masterpiece. A BUG'S LIFE also offers 15 plush 3D environments, each of which are fully interactive and just waiting to be explored. To get through these intense levels you'll have to swing, slide, and fly your way past the enemies and into glory. Finally, the game offers a chance to interact with a wide variety of characters, each with its own personality. You will even be able to chat with your favorite characters from the movie. If you loved the movie, or just love to game, then this title is a must buy!
platforms: PS GBC PC PS3 PSP N64 PC
publisher: Sony Computer Entertainment, Disney Interactive Studios

title: Blood II: The Chosen
description: Blood II: The Chosen takes place the year 2028, 100 years after the events taking place in Blood. The Cabal, the cult dedicated to the worship of the Dark God Tchernobog, has become a massive corporation with influences in every major economic sector. Play either Caleb or one of the other three Chosen characters as you strive to oust the doings of Cabal from Earth. Over thirty weapons are present in Blood 2 such as the Mac-20 Sub-Machine Gun or Car-15 Assault Rifle. Twenty-five different levels covering a variety of locations and enemies new and old add to the action. Blood 2: The Chosen takes advantage of the LithTech 3D engine.

title: Extreme-G 2
description: For those who haven't played Extreme-G, up to four players take control of futuristic, magnetic bikes and race against one another on a variety of planets. While racing is at the heart of the game, there are so many weapons and power-ups that shooting and destruction also become a major part of the gameplay experience. Developer Probe invested a lot of time to add plenty of features, improve the Battle Mode, and up the top-speed of bikes to Wipeout proportions. You can even break the sound barrier and hear a sonic boom that then drowns out all other audio until you slow down below Mach 1. There are 12 different tracks, each with 3 variations, an improved Battle Mode with slow-moving tanks, a multiplayer Cup (up to 16 players compete in two-player split-screen competitions), as well as a contest mode with three cups, three difficulties, plus an added Duel Challenge.

title: Centipede [1999]
description: Enter the world of the Wee People and do your best to save them from the QueenPede, who will stop at nothing to destroy this peaceful race of humanoids. In this remake of the classic Atari game, players take the role of Wally, the village's humble bean counter, as he is quickly recruited to man the village bug shooter and sent off to save the colony from the ruthless QueenPede and her destructive subjects -- the spiders, scorpions, and fleas -- as she sets out to conquer the peaceful wee people. Work your way through all-new 3D worlds with new weapons and skills. And if you're really good, you might just discover the original Centipede.
platforms: PC DC Mac PS PSP PS3

title: Thunder Force V: Perfect System
description: In a grim future where a once-benevolent alien technology has turned against humanity, only a ragtag group of ace pilots can save the Earth from total annihilation.Code name: Thunder Force!Five spectacular weapons with multiple power-up levels let you blast through the metallic menace as a constant barrage of innovative enemies keeps you intrigued while you're trying to stay alive.

title: Star Soldier: Vanishing Earth
description: Earth is under attack by a horde of mechanical aliens, and it's up to you to save the planet. In order to do that, you'll have to face a disturbing number of robots, spacecraft, and gunfire, as you collect weaponry and obliterate everything in sight. You'll get your choice of three different ships (each has variable weaponry and speed), and six different battlefields on which to take care of business. Some of the levels take place on natural surfaces, some on giant metal structures, but all of them are going to push you to the limit as you try to save the planet from destruction. You'll face tiny spacecraft, huge bombers, giant robots, and deadly bosses in two different modes. The graphics and sound are truly out of this world, with detailed backgrounds, realistic-looking ships, and intuitive gameplay. The special effects and colors look great, and the controls are simple enough to pick up in a matter of minutes. With three difficulty settings, STAR SOLDIER: Vanishing Earth is great for players of all experience levels.

title: Sid Meier's Civilization II
description: The Civilization series of games has redefined turn based strategy on the PC. Now, Civilization II brings the series to the Play Station. Become the ruler of a band of nomads and try to create an empire that lasts from the Stone Age to the Space Age. There are two ways to win: become a military genius and conquer the world or for a more egalitarian approach focus on technological development and be the first civilization to place a colony on Alpha Centauri. Either approach requires precise economic planning, shrewd foreign policy, rapid scientific development, and a well-built infrastructure. Luckily, all of these aspects can be learned from the new step-by-step tutorial. Also new for the PlayStation, the interface has been redesigned to take full advantage of the PlayStation controller. Play Civilization II and find out if you can build the perfect empire.

title: Tiger Woods '99
description: The player who revolutionized the sport of golf is now featured in his very own PlayStation game TIGER WOODS '99. The game has been designed from the ground up, resulting in a fun and easily accessible experience. Finding the green is a breeze with an innovative club design that makes the golf swing seem simple. An entire 18-hole course can be enjoyed in only 30 minutes, and if you prefer not to play as Tiger Woods, there are seven other licensed PGA tour pros to choose from. You can select from nine varying modes of play including Practice, Tournament, Skins, Fourball, and Shootout mode. Compete on five different, lushly rendered, real-life golf courses (including Las Colinas). Listen to helpful and often humorous comments from Tiger himself, and groove to the driving beat of quality techno music as you play. Whether you're a big time golf fan or a complete novice, there's much to savor here.

title: Fatal Abyss
description: A new energy source, Bacteria 241, has been found at the bottom of the ocean. Two factions battle for it: Eco Systems and the evil Proteus Tech. Choose your allegiance and fight on a submarine in 12 missions for supremacy.

title: Akuji The Heartless
description: Crystal Dynamics is known for its intense adventure games, and AKUJI THE HEARTLESS is just that. It offers full combat and 3D action, with nine different hand-to-hand combinations to perform on your enemies. You will battle through 14 different levels, facing over 30 different types of enemies throughout the game. The enemies use an advanced AI that allows for greater variation in the way the enemies behave. You will also have 11 voodoo spells to choose from in your extensive magic system. To make the story come alive, AKUJI features full-motion video and excellent voice acting. AKUJI THE HEARTLESS will have your heart racing and your pulse pounding.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

title: ruthless.com
description: Turn-based business sim. You take control of a software company and must allocate resources to various areas in order to ensure the total dominance of your company's products. Departments requiring resources include research and development, human resources, admin., marketing and legal. Also, you're not restricted to staying within the law you can resort to industrial sabotage or even extortion and violence. A good tutorial is incorporated in order to help you get the hang of the game. The game is played on a simple grided screen populated with colored squares that stand for various buildings and secured markets. You can chose from a set of six scenarios or an open-ended game. It is also possible to participate in multi-player games on-line. There are multiple difficulty settings adding some replayability value to the game.

title: FunPack 3D
description: Classic arcade games had a certain charm, but have you ever imagined what they'd be like if they were in 3D? Past meets present in this collection of updates on the coin-operated favorites: CHOMPER 3D is a version of PAC-MAN that's infused with awesome camera angles; METEOR GUNNER goes where ASTEROIDS never dreamed of; SUPER BRICK BREAKER is a clever variation on the much-loved BREAKOUT; and MISSILE DEFENSE is a faithful update of the apocalyptic MISSILE COMMAND. Whether you're a fan of the older games or a newcomer to the classics, you'll love the extra dimension in FUNPACK 3D.

title: Microsoft Pinball Arcade
description: You'll find seven different boards to challenge your skills, each with a different theme. The game even includes a little history feature about pinball and how it came to be. MICROSOFT PINBALL ARCADE recreates pinball action, with close attention paid to the details that results in a realistic pinball experience.

title: WCW Nitro
description: With WCW Nitro, THQ has done everything possible to help re-create an exiting, fast-paced night of WCW Nitro from the TV to the console. With 16 big-name wrestlers and hidden ones to find, all special moves and music added, WCW Nitro is a mirror of its hit TV counterpart. Taunting, leg-drops, sleeper holds, signs, crowd chanting, Nitro has it all!

title: Mario Party
description: Mario and his friends return for a fun-filled party, and you're invited! Mario, Luigi, Donkey Kong, The Princess, Wario, and more return in this joyful party! The object of the game is simple: be the player who collects the most stars. You get stars by defeating any of the 56 mini-games that will challenge your gaming skills. Play in many classic Mario scenes, or keep on partyin' to rack up the most points and discover new play areas. MARIO PARTY features four-player multiplayer, the whole Mario gang, slammin' graphics, and pumpin' music. This is a party you don't want to miss!

title: Destrega
description: The people of Zamuel were struggling to survive. The Strega, an advanced race, took pity on them and shared their knowledge of magic. Immediately, Zamuel became the most powerful nation on the globe and started to conquer surrounding lands. Had the Strega known of the humans' thirst for power, they never would¿ve shared their knowledge. One thousand years have passed and the Strega are locked in a bitter war with the humans for control of the last magic relics. Choose from 12 warriors and battle the opposition in vast open arenas. Combatants can roam the environments to try to gain advantages over their opposition, so keep your eyes peeled. Use the practice mode to get accustomed to the fighting style of each character, and then tackle the battle, story, team battle, time attack, or endurance modes. If your friends have an appetite for destruction, challenge them in the two-player versus mode. Destrega will keep fighting fans happy for days.

title: TOCA Championship Racing
description: Drive all the season's official high-performance cars: Peugeot 406 Renault Laguna Audi A4 Volvo S40 Vauxhall Vectra Ford Mondeo Honda Accord and Nissan Primera. Each car is authentically modeled and features full simulated handling of the real vehicles. Race through the full season Championship Single Races and Time Trial options. Race wheel-to-wheel in a pack of sixteen cars on the world-famous race circuits. Every track is accurately modeled using actual 3D landscape data. Self-published in the UK as TOCA Touring Car Championship by Codemasters and released in the US by 3DO.

title: Close Combat III: The Russian Front
description: Close Combat III: The Russian Front is the third game in the award-winning Close Combat series, putting players in command of a 'fire brigade' of soldiers on the snowy Russian front where the terrain and the weather are equally as formidable as your Nazi opponents. Spanning the 1941 invasion of the Soviet Union to the 1945 fall of Berlin, Close Combat III: The Russian Front is as authentic as the more statistic-driven strategy games on the market and as fun to play as the more real-time war simulations around.

title: Baldur's Gate
description: Baldur's Gate takes you back to the Forgotten Realms campaign setting in a dazzling role-playing adventure, one that brings to life the grand tradition of the Advanced Dungeons & Dragons game through intricately designed graphics, sound and play balancing. Immerse yourself in this quintessential medieval fantasy world, where nations hang in the balance of your actions, dark prophesies test your resolve, and heroic dreams can be fulfilled at last.
rating_content: Animated Blood, Mild Language, Use of Alcohol and Tobacco

title: Moto Racer 2
description: EA Sports ups the high-performance-motorcycle-racing-game ante with MOTO RACER 2. This title is really two motorcycle-racing games in one: you can choose to race dirt or street bikes. The game has 32 tracks, some are of the dirt-arena type with jumps that allow you to pull off midair tricks, while others are city streets that allow you to open it up and approach speeds of 200mph.

title: BattleTanx
description: BATTLETANX is a wild tank-based shoot-¿em-up for Nintendo 64. This top-down shooter takes place in a post-apocalyptic world, where humanity is on the verge of extinction thanks to a virus that eliminated most of the female population. Huge gangs now rule the world with force and intolerance. Play as a lone soldier who sets out to save the world from these marauding misfits. Throughout the game you'll use three different tanks, each with its own capabilities. Collect power-ups to get even more bang for your buck. BATTLETANX has 15 levels based in five different American cities: Washington, San Francisco, Las Vegas, New York, and Los Angeles. Each of the locales is represented with a beautiful palette of colors that depict the explosive action in bright, vibrant tones. Save your progress through the missions with a password save function.

title: Starsiege: Tribes
description: Sierra Online used to be the biggest thing going for online action games. One of the favorite titles from their catalog was the online sci-fi shooter Tribes. Players flew around in jetpacks, launching energy discs at each other in intense online matches. Long before Counter-Strike, Battlefield, and a host of other imitators, Tribes offered up more than 32 player support, different player classes, a variety of weapon kits and a handful of multi-passenger vehicles. Loads of gameplay types, a wide variety of maps, and plenty of team-oriented features (and a lack of copy protection) made Tribes one of the most popular online shooters around.

title: Invasion From Beyond
description: INVASION FROM BEYOND is inspired by the science fiction B-movies of the 1950s. Martians are out to take over the Earth and you are the planet's last hope. Fight your way through 30 expansive mission that have varying mission objectives including escort duty, bombing runs, and tactical superiority missions. At the beginning of the game, only three ship and two weapons are available. However, as the game progresses nine more ships and 12 more weapons make blasting the Martians much easier. Adding an extra level of strategy is the Suck-O-Matic that brings in and expels items. All of the action takes place in fully rendered 3D environments and the animation moves at a whopping 50 frames per second. Play INVASION FROM BEYOND and save Earth from the Martian menace.

title: Magical Tetris Challenge
description: What do you get when you combine beloved Disney characters with the international phenomenon known as Tetris? Capcom's exciting combination presents a world of gaming possibilities in Magical Tetris Challenge. To further enhance the fun, an Adventure mode similar to that featured in Mickey's Magical Racing Adventure introduces a different dimension to the game. Follow Mickey, Minnie, Donald, and Goofy in their travels and join in their unique experiences as they journey through the Adventure mode. Other Disney characters will also pop up to present you with various tests; if you are successful, they reward you accordingly. Enjoy a more intense thrill by challenging other opponents in the Multiplayer mode.

title: ESPN X Games Pro Boarder
description: This addition to the series of ESPN X Games is only for board fans looking to have some serious fun. ESPN X GAMES PRO BOARDERS begins with five events including: half pipe, big air jump, trick course, jump or trick event, and an all-out race. Once you score in each of these events, you unlock a hidden Circuit mode where you'll need to place first in each of the five events. You only get three chances to do it, but once you do, another new mode opens up with four new courses. It's like being rewarded for having fun!

title: Penny Racers
description: The premise of PENNY RACERS is simple: race your car the best you can and be among the top three to reach the checkered flag. To achieve this objective, you must avoid missiles launched by your competitors, among other things. One way to counter this is the barrel roll maneuver, which is a quick and effective way to avoid unexpected hurdles on the tracks. In the beginning, you drive a pretty unimpressive racer. However, if you beat the competition and place in the top three, your reward is the chance to upgrade your car. Be merciless and steal the losing racers' special features, such as engine and armor upgrades, special attack abilities, and enhancing cosmetic features for the car. You have 13 different racer body styles and nine tracks to choose from. The cartoony racers zip through city streets, ice caves, and a volcano, and with the Track Create mode, you can design the wildest track you can imagine. When you toss four-player racing into the fray, the fun quadruples as the action intensifies and the losers are utterly humiliated.

title: Flying Dragon
description: FLYING DRAGON gives you two fighting games for the price of one. You can play in the Virtual game, where the fighters have normal sized models or in the Super Deformed game, where the fighters are short, cute characters reminiscent of the character sprites in a Super Nintendo RPG. Both modes have a choice of 20 characters, each with unique moves and abilities. After picking a character, learn the character's moves in the Practice mode, and then try to beat the competition in the Circuit, Versus, Tournament, and Group Battle modes. You can also compete to collect ranks and special items that will teach the characters new techniques. Try to master two fighting games with FLYING DRAGON.

title: Irritating Stick
description: "What the hell is an Irritating Stick?" you may ask, since the question's been drilling into your head the moment you read the title to this review. Well, simply put, Irritating Stick is a videogame version of that carnival game where you slap down a buck and try to maneuver a metal rod through a metal maze without touching the sides. More accurately, though, Irritating Stick is the US localized version of a Japanese PlayStation game based on Dengeki Iraira Bou (Irritating Electric Stick, for those that need the direct translation) -- a gameshow in Japan where you really do get electrocuted if you touch the sides.

title: The Settlers III
description: Control the full cycle of your civilization's evolution, from the initial planning and building of its infrastructure, to the full-blooded conflict of race against race in the quest to expand your power and domination in this strategy title. Before you start conquering your neighbors, however, you'll first need to create a sustainable economy from the interdependent activities of agriculture, industry and trading. The Settlers III contains three different campaigns: Roman, Egyptian, and Asian. Just like in the preceding games, the goal is to build up an economy. In The Settlers III, however, the player can choose the races he wants to use. Depending on the god they're adoring, the people have different characteristics and skills, and either they're good at construction or at developing strategies.

title: The Game of Life [1998]
description: GAME OF LIFE is a videogame version of the popular board game. Just like the board game, you go on a "journey of a lifetime," which basically simulates the events that occur during someone's life. The ultimate goal is to be the person with the largest nest egg at the retirement stage. Players spin a wheel and the little car moves along a track; at every stop, an event occurs that takes funds from or gives funds to the player. Eventually, everyone will get married, buy a house, and find a job. All of these things occur in both the Life and Life Enhanced modes. A new twist for Life Enhanced mode is Life's Little Games, which are mini-games that can either reward or punish the players. All of this entertainment can be enjoyed by up to six players, resulting in classic board-game action on your PlayStation.

title: Speed Busters: American Highways
description: Go the distance on America's highways with four different game modes: arcade, championship, multiplayer and online, each offering it's own unique challenges.

title: Montezuma's Return
description: A sequel to the 1980s game, Montezuma?s Revenge. In the game, players have to restore a desecrated tomb to lift a curse. You are Max Montezuma, a daring adventurer and rumored descendant of the legendary Aztec Emperor. You must escape from a doomed flight only to face challenges on an uncharted tropical island populated with ghoulish opponents energized by an ancient curse. The game has 50 hours of gameplay. It includes what you?d find in most adventure games: jumping, climbing, fighting, and swimming.

title: NCAA March Madness '99
description: The goal of every college basketball team is to get to the NCAA Tournament. The pinnacle of the sport is the coveted Final Four, which can bring in new recruits and fans like nothing else. In NCAA MARCH MADNESS '99, you can recreate that excitement on your PlayStation There are 140 teams to choose from, including 16 top women's programs. When you are ready to play, there are a huge number of gameplay modes to choose from including Exhibition, Tournament, Practice, Women's Sweet Sixteen, Three-Point Shootout, and Dynasty. All of the modes require great hoops skills as you'll use crossovers, fadeaways, and dunks in an effort to reach the Final Four. However, Dynasty mode also challenges you to recruit players and build a winning program over time. See what kind of team you could build with NCAA MARCH MADNESS ¿99.

title: Populous: The Beginning
description: With Populous, the god-sim was created. Millions of gamers were converted. A new genre was born. Now Bullfrog challenges you to achieve immortality in the first ever true 3D, real time strategy game. Tame wildmen and train tribesmen in stunningly beautiful worlds. Make them worship the ground you walk on. Wield your earth shattering powers to wreak havoc and hold them under your command. Turn up the heat of battle with erupting volcanoes, or summon the skies to rain fire on your rivals. Spread plagues among non-believers or direct a tornado into the heart of enemy tribes.

title: NCAA Final Four 99
description: NCAA FINAL FOUR '99 offers three gameplay modes: Exhibition, Tournament, and a 30-game Season. The rules can be configured to your preferences, whether it's arcade or simulation. This affects which fouls get called and determines whether or not your players feel the effects of fatigue. You can also choose from a variety of controller configurations, difficulty settings, game lengths, and camera angles to alter the game. And of course, everything is rendered in 3D, which creates the feeling that you're right in the middle of the action. There are 250 Division I teams available, making it easy to find your favorite squad on the roster. The sound, which includes play-by-play commentary, ball thumps, and sneaker squeaks, works well to get you pumped up and involved in the game. You can also play with up to eight friends (with a multitap) in the multiplayer game.

title: WCW/NWO Thunder
description: Wrestling fans, another THQ wrestling game is out on the market, and if you liked the others, you may want to check this one out too. Filled with multiple modes of play, World and US heavyweight Championships, Tag-team, Battle Royal, to the Cage matches, Thunder mimics the ever-popular TV series to perfection. Short movies of the wrestlers signature moves highlight before the game and before matches. So, if you feel like entering the cage with the biggest, baddest bullies in wrestling, get WCW/NWO Thunder and feel the power!

title: Contender
description: Arcade boxing action comes to the PlayStation in CONTENDER. Choose from 20 playable characters (both male and female), and enter the ring in the Exhibition mode to get a quick fix of the sweet science. Those looking for more of a challenge, try to rise through the local, national, and world ranks on the way to the world championship. Becoming world champion is going to take training, a little luck, and pummeling over 40 other contenders. If it looks like you're the one taking the beating, the tide can turn at any minute by connecting with the ultra powerful super punch. Once you become champion, don't rest on your laurels; go out there and defend the belt. If your friends challenge your supremacy, then knock them out with the Two-Player mode. Do you have what it takes to become the world champ? Play CONTENDER and find out.

title: Dark Vengeance
description: A mystical eclipse overtakes the world, and an evil group of elves (which had been held captive by sunlight for so many years) escapes to wreak vicious havoc. Can you fend them off and return light your world? Choose to play as Jetrel the Warlock, Kite the Trickster, or Nanoc the Gladiator in this epic struggle between good and not-so-good. Three different combat styles let you get comfortable with the fighting, while 30 unique weapons give you tons of destructive options. Of course, none of this will exactly make things easy--you have to fight more than 30 enemies in this saga.

title: Animaniacs Ten Pin Alley
description: ANIMANIACS TEN PIN ALLEY adds some wacky twists to the sport of bowling. Ten characters and voices from the series including Yakko, Wakko, Dot, Pinkey, and the Brain have come to bowl. However, these are no ordinary bowling alleys. Enjoy the views of Ten Pin Alley, Wacky Alley, Boogey Bowl, and World Domination Stadium. As with the wacky alleys, beware of the tripped-out balls: some will bounce down the lane and other will shatter after hitting a pin. Once you have chosen your character and ball, enter a tournament to keep the Brain from taking over the world, or Play as the Brain and try to take over the world. After dealing with world domination, invite up to five friends over to team up or play against each other.

title: South Park
description: When a comet almost collides with Earth, a posse of bizarre turkeys and evil aliens lands in South Park, and the four foul-mouthed grade-schoolers are, of course, going to have to rescue everyone. Switch back and forth between the characters with the touch of a button, as you use yellow snowballs, sponge-dart guns, toilet plungers, and more to squelch the strange attack and restore peace to the sleepy mountain town. With lots of levels and difficult bosses, the game's obvious strength is its creativity the enemies are all hysterical, and the game ends up being as funny as the show itself. Based on the hit cartoon, SOUTH PARK actually uses custom speech from stars Trey Parker, Matt Stone, and Isaac Hayes to keep the faithful masses happy, and adds a creative storyline that falls right in line with what you'd expect from the show. The 3D animation is a definite update on the cartoon, but the animation is so good, you won't even blink at the difference. If haven't used a bazooka that shoots out cows in a videogame before, you haven't played SOUTH PARK.

title: Virtual Pool 64
description: If you think pool is best left to the greasy-haired guys in smoky bars, you haven't tried VIRTUAL POOL on the N64. Enjoy lush 3D graphics as you try your hand at nine different games: 8-Ball, 9-Ball, 10-Ball, 6-Ball, 3-Ball, Rotation Pool, Straight Pool, Bank Pool, and One Pocket. Enter your name for record-keeping purposes, then choose from one of four excellent modes: Match, Freestyle, Tournament, and Shark Skins. You decide whether you want to play by American Pool Players Association rules, American Bar rules, or English Pub rules! Once you decide which game you want to play, you'll go to a high-resolution 3D table, where you can select any angle to view play from. Take your pick from four different table colors, three rooms to play in, and a variety of table speeds, rail speeds, pocket cuts, and pocket sizes. If that's not enough options for you.

title: West Front
description: West Front: Operation Sea Lion offers more scenarios, linked campaigns, and gameplay options for Talonsoft's West Front game. With over 30 new scenarios to choose from, you can find the gameplay style that fits you the best -- small battles, large campaigns, historical recreations, or hypothetical situations.

title: Pro-Pinball: Big Race USA
description: Realistic pinball action and racing excitement make for one potent combination! The PRO PINBALL series strikes again, this time with an auto-themed trek across the country. All of the realistic touches of arcade pinball are present from the bumpers right down to the click of the flippers. It's easy to change the table rules, switch the screen position, tweak the graphics and sound, and choose one of five difficulty levels, but racking up the points might not be as simple. Pinball wizards need not leave the house ever again.
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older

title: Beavis and Butt-Head: Bunghole in One
description: Could it be that Beavis and Butt-head are super-powered athletes? Nah. These two clowns couldn't putt a ball into the broad side of a barn, and their general ineptitude and lack of concentration is going to make things very difficult on you. Play 18 holes of miniature golf each inspired by the much-loved MTV cartoon series in this hilarious challenge. Watch out for nacho cheese volcanoes, haunted tombstones, flying buzz saws, and much more as you try to lower your handicap and get Beavis and Butt-head out of harm's way.

title: Oddworld: Abe's Exoddus
description: As if things weren't tough enough for Abe in the original ODDWORLD, this time he has to contend with even more evil Glukkons! It seems that the malicious beasts have been capturing the noble Mudokons and using their tears of pain to create SoulStorm Brew. Not only that, they're distributing the spirits of dead Mudokons for consumer use! Make your way through level after level of detailed action, using some rather unique weaponry to help your kinfolk out of this serious predicament. This is pure hilarity for gamers of all ages.

title: Return to Krondor
description: Return to Krondor is the sequel to Betrayal at Krondor. It is set in Raymond E. Feist's world of Midkemia, and offers many of the key RPG elements found in the original while simultaneously incorporating new technology.During the quest, players assume the roles of five main characters, Squire James, a reformed thief; the Keshian sorceress Jazhara; William ConDoin, son of the magician Pug; a roughhewn Warrior-Priest of Ishap named Brother Solon; and Kendaric, the reluctant wizard whose magic is the group's only hope of victory.The game is played in a 3D world, and spans 11 different chapters. There are also plenty of items, spells, and equipment for you to choose from.

title: Castlevania [1999]
description: Find yourself back in the 1800s, where rumor has it that a vampire uprising is happening deep within the twisted heart of Wallachia, Transylvania. In Castlevania, players can be one of two brave hunters who travel to Transylvania to investigate. Players can select from either the dashing and daring Reinhardt Schneider who carries a whip and short sword for close attacks, or the impetuous Carrie Fernandez who fires magical projectiles and wields a pair of blade rings for hand-to-hand combat. There are items to collect during the course of your adventure which may prolong the life of your character long enough to survive. These items include livestock to restore health, sacks of gold, weapon power-ups, healing kits, and moon and sun cards which can turn days into nights or vice versa. Both characters end up taking different paths and dealing with different storylines, but in the end they have to face down the same wretched demons including death itself.

title: Global Domination
description: Real-time action/strategy game available for PC and PlayStation. The game is set on a near future earth where two major groups are involved in international disputes. You work for one of them (ULTRA) and the gameplay consists of defending your bases and defeating the forces of the other group (WOE) through 20 missions. There is also a scenario editor. You have a range of vehicles and armoury at your disposal, including a range of missiles, submarines and bombers. The game has a strong plot, largely developed though cutscenes. The control system takes some time to master and a tutorial system is incorporated to help you . Alongside the single-player game there is a multi-player mode for up to 16 people (via LAN), or two can play via serial connection. The game is played on a global map and numerous video clips are incorporated into the game.

title: Carnivores
description: Bored with the regular, old hunting fare for your PC? Instead of waiting around for some dainty deer to come traipsing along, why not go after something more worthwhile, like a dinosaur? Track and kill seven prehistoric beasts in this detailed trip through the ancient jungles and forests of the world. You'll have three major weapons and eight hunting accessories to aid you in your pursuit, but none of them will help you much if your aim is off and a 10-ton target realizes you're shooting at it. Six environments and three skill levels keep the replay value high.

title: Jane's WWII Fighters
description: Realistic flight models and complex aerial tactics come to the fore in JANE'S WWII FIGHTERS. Command either the Axis or the Allied forces over Europe, fighting either for the spread of evil or the freedom of all people. Most of the planes flown in the war are at your disposal, and each is re-created in painstaking detail. Without radar (it hadn't been invented yet), you'll have to rely on your eyes and ears to know when the enemy is approaching. Awesome weaponry and an incredible 3D flight model propel this simulation to victory.

title: European Air War
description: Take to the skies over Europe during the most dangerous days of World War II. Pilot 20 authentic fighter aircraft from Great Britain, Germany and the United States. Defend the skies of southern England from waves of German bombers, fight off harrying Messerschmitts while escorting B-17s deep into the heart of the Third Reich, or engage in savage dogfights over France. Unsurpassed graphics and a dynamic game world will captivate you in this sequel to the critically acclaimed and award-winning 1942: Pacific Air War.

title: Combat Flight Simulator: WWII Europe Series
description: The simulation for serious fighter plane enthusiasts returns with a trip through the air battles of Europe. The eighth release in Microsoft's FLIGHT SIMULATOR series, this installment lets you test out the capacities of eight planes each of which is accurate down to the nuts and bolts. Play out dogfights over the skies of Europe, trying out more then 25 single-player missions and a variety of multiplayer outings. If you're too nervous to start fighting right off the bat, there are a number of training missions to get you up to speed.

title: Powerslide
description: Powerslide is a driving game like no other, with screaming fast graphics, drive anywhere 3D modeled environments, and gameplay that will keep you glued to your screen for an unhealthy length of time. It looks wicked, and the physics are awesome ? it feels totally real to drive. The gameplay is exceptional and the multiplayer technology smoother than any other game.

title: Quest for Glory V: Dragon Fire
description: Quest for Glory V: Dragon Fire combines the best elements of role-playing with pulse-pounding, real-time action. Set in the amazing 3D realm of Silmaria, Dragon Fire takes you on a journey fraught with peril, mystery and enchantment. The Council of Silmaria has set before you the seven deadly Rites of Rulership. If you succeed, you'll save the kingdom and win the right to rule as king. Are you ready for a mind-bending story full of plot twists, mythological creatures, paranormal opponents, and fire breathing dragons.

title: Gangsters: Organized Crime
description: Wanna be a gangster in a Chicago style city of the 1920's? Wanna control an underground organization dealing in extortion, illegal liquor, prostitution, violence, intimidation, gambling, gang warfare, bribery of officials, permanent elimination of individuals and a host of moneymaking activities? Can you simultaneously maintain a decent and honest reputation on the surface by supporting good causes, helping the police and running legitimate businesses? Will you be able to meet the challenge of balancing these two personas to gain influence and control over the city? Gangsters is a highly original game that blends together three major elements of successful strategy gaming; real-time game world interaction, man-management & business management.

title: DethKarz
description: Reminiscent of Twisted Metal, DethCarz pits players against each other with 25th century battle cars. The game features a total of four different environments, split up into 12 tracks. Rather than the usual straightways, tunnels and curves of most racers, the design goes for wild track layouts with incredible jumps and stunts and tons of obstacles.  Although players select from only four different cars, each vehicles attributes can be tinkered with to achieve unique handling, combat abilities, and racing characterisitcs.

title: King's Quest VIII: Mask of Eternity
description: One of the most poplar fantasy games of all-time returns to the PC for more role-playing excitement. In this installment, you play Connor, the peasant who has found a small shard of the Mask of Eternity. The piece of the mask has saved you from the cruel fate of your fellow humans, as a storm has turned them all to stone. Now, you must traverse seven enormous worlds to find the other four pieces of the mask solving puzzles and battling vicious enemies. Seemingly endless gameplay and amazing 3D graphics make the game a royal success.

title: FIFA '99
description: Instead of trying to recreate the World Cup tournament, FIFA 99 squarely focuses on the the European league, with more than 250 soccer teams battling for the cup. Don't worry, EA didn't forget about the rest of the World. You can select plenty of international teams, from Argentina to Yugoslavia, as well as US and Brazilian league teams. FIFA 99 also dishes up a much more varied lineup of game modes, including a European Dream league and Cup Creation modes. In addition to its wider variety of modes, EA wisely included a Player Edit and a Team Edit function, so you can keep your teams up to date (you need a memory pak to save, of course). Like in FIFA 98, you can change face maps, give your players names, adjust attributes, and so forth. However, there are still no separate height and weight attributes for players.

title: Wargasm
description: Wargasm is set in 2025 A.D. All governments have signed a treaty for total disarmament, eradicating any future possibility of war. Instead wars are to be held on virtual battlefields. Each nation constructs a database with the virtual representations of their best front line forces and stores them on the World Wide War Web (WWWW). But unfortunately, WWWW, like today?s Websites, are also open to abuse by hackers and saboteurs. And in due course, the balance of power goes awry and utter chaos becomes apparent. Now it?s time for someone to act, and act real fast. Wargasm isn?t just about guns, it?s about strategy too. And don?t get this game just for its naughty title. The death effects are shown in gory detail, with blood splashes on your screen.

title: 3-D Ultra NASCAR Pinball
description: Start in the Garage table; modify your steering, tune-ups, and brakes, then get set for the big race. Of course (as the title would indicate), the race is actually a pinball game, and you'll have to hit all sorts of targets in order to gain pole position, pull into the lead, and eventually take the checkered flag. Two different difficulty levels let racing fans ease into the tough stuff, and four selectable backgrounds ensure that you'll never get bored with things. You can even choose to play as one of four real NASCAR drivers!

title: Extreme Tennis
description: Serve and volley with the best of them in EXTREME TENNIS. Your game begins in Tony's Pro Shop, where you'll pick out your clothes and a racket. You choose whether you want to play on clay, grass, or hard court, and how many sets your match will last. Each opponent is fashioned after a top pro on the tour, with plenty of competitors from both the men's and women's circuits. It's up to you where the difficulty level is set, so start out slowly and work your way up to the top rankings. Now, this is 3D tennis the way it was meant to be played.

title: Nectaris: Military Madness [1999]
description: In Nectaris: Military Madness, it's up to you to save the Moon from the evil Xenon Empire. To free the Earth's lone satellite, you have a selection of futuristic military units at your disposal that will come in handy in battle. Each unit has its own advantages and disadvantages, which will call for your strategic mind to decide how to use them. After touching down on the surface of the Moon, your job is simple: destroy all enemy forces and bring peace back to the Moon. The name of the game here is strategy, as you'll also need to strategize your plan of attack, taking into account the Moon's terrain that affects your units' efficiency. If you're in the mood to employ your best strategies while trying to save the Moon, then Nectaris: Military Madness is the game for you.

title: Jeff Wayne's The War of the Worlds
description: Jeff Wayne made a classic concept album based on H.G. Wells' story back in 1978, and now it's an incredible video game for the PC. The year is 1893, and Martians have landed in the U.K. With Scotland and London under attack, it's up to a group of human forces to rid the planet of its unwelcome visitors. Play as either the humans or the spacemen battling underwater, across land, and through underground caves. More than 60 minutes of music from the original album underscore the action. The 3D masterpiece features the voices of Richard Burton and Nigel Hawthorne.

title: Microsoft Golf 1999 Edition
description: Experience golf as it really is, from the crisp feel of your first drive to the ball's final roll into the 18th cup. The 1999 Edition of Microsoft Golf has an authentic feel with natural, easy-to-use controls, seven challenging courses, and a wide range of choices for play. Tee up on the famed Donald Ross Memorial course--a compilation of the best holes created by Donald Ross--or grab your clubs and head for any of the other six championship courses, including Greg Norman's famed Medallist course in Hobe Sound, Florida. Gorgeous graphics and naturally fluid game play make all 117 holes a realistic, relaxing experience.
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older

title: Blackstone Chronicles
description: The story goes something like this just after the turn of the century, an insane asylum is built inside an old mansion. Your father was the caretaker when the place finally closed in the 1940s, and now he's returned from the dead to take care of some unfinished business. The Blackstone Historical Society has plans to re-open the building as a museum, but you have to stop your late father's killing rampage and rescue your young son before hundreds of people perish. Loaded with incredible puzzles and 3D graphics, the BLACKSTONE CHRONICLES is an eerie classic.

title: Bust-A-Move 4
description: The little green dinosaur is back in Bust-a-Move 4, the fourth installment of one of the most popular puzzle games in the world. Take control of him as he tries to eliminate the colored bubbles that are crowding his airspace. With a bubble-shooting machine, the dinosaur tries to connect three bubbles of a single color to eliminate them, as well as any other bubbles they may be touching. This time around, falling bubbles will seek out other bubbles of the same color to make chain reactions. With intense multiplayer competition, all new graphics, and create-a-level mode, you've never busted bubbles like these! And with 16 mysterious characters to save, and thousands of bubble busting puzzles to choose from, you'll be bustin' like crazy!
platforms: PS Arcade DC PS3 PSP PC Vita GBC

title: Uprising-X
description: As you pilot the experimental tank-like war machine known as the Wraith, you look back over the events that brought you to this mission. The Rebels' uprising against the Imperium regime showed great promise, and they were able to capture strategic intergalactic locations. The stolen Imperium technology that led to the Wraith was a huge success for the Rebels. Now on the brink of defeat, the Emperor Caston has unleashed a new, terrible weapon of mass destruction capable of annihilating entire planets. In UPRISING X, it is your mission to prevent this horrific weapon from further use. You have ability to customize not only the weaponry on the Wraith, but also your infantry and military vehicles for maximum strategic advantage. Wage war against the CPU across more than 20 alien battlefields in Single-Player mode, or battle your friends in one of five different Two-Player modes ranging from Infantry Crush to Deathmatch. See if you can lead the Rebels to victory in UPRISING X.

title: NBA Jam 99
description: If you were a big fan of NBA JAM in its arcade days, you'll be surprised to see how much the game has grown up. Unlike its two-on-two cousin, NBA JAM '99 is realistic five-on-five ball, with serious attention to detail. Keith Van Horn provided motion-captured animation for over 300 real NBA players, each with real-life attributes and stats. Kevin Harlan and Bill Walton provide all of the colorful play-by-play, and each home arena is replicated down to its lighting and floor variations. If your team just doesn't work, play GM and execute a few trades, sign some free agents, and make some good draft picks. The game features the standard Exhibition, Playoff, and Championship modes (all customizable), and adds in a Skills mode that allows you to test your mettle at 3-point shooting. If you really miss the old NBA JAM, they've even included a Jam mode that's five-on-five ball with super dunks, "on-fire" streaks, and no fouls. For basketball fans, NBA JAM '99 is a slam-dunk favorite.

title: Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate
description: Battle Chaos Space Marines and their demonic hordes across the galaxy in a Campaign of 15 linked scenarios or use the Random Mission Generator to gain experience and power for your Ultramarines.

title: Master of Monsters: Disciples of Gaia
description: In MASTER OF MONSTERS, gamers control one of six commanders, who must assemble a squad of monster troops in order to fight the forces of an enemy commander. Each type of monster has its positive and negative qualities; for instance, a unicorn is fast but is generally weak, while a serpent is packs quite a punch but doesn't move well. You can also combine two creatures to make a new monster, each of which has unique attributes. Once you have your monstrous troops together and on the field, you engage in turn-based, one-on-one combat. You can battle it out with up to three human opponents, with the best monster as the prize of the match. In MASTER OF MONSTERS, strategy and fantasy combine to make for a unique gaming experience.

title: Wheel of Fortune [1998]
description: Do you want to buy a vowel? That's the question that WHEEL OF FORTUNE for the PlayStation based on the popular television game show asks players. The game features 3D graphics that realistically portray the actual set used for the show, with impressive lighting effects and a panning camera. The gameplay remains exactly the same as on TV. Up to three people can play at once, guessing letters of a particular phrase, location, or title, then winning money by spinning a wheel with dollar amounts on it. The show's co-host, Vanna White, appears in digitized video clips and performs the same duties that she does on the show. There are over 2,000 different puzzles, enough to keep any player busy for quite a while. Each game can be played within a specified time limit for games as long as the show, or just a few quick puzzles if you need a quick fix.  WHEEL OF FORTUNE for the PlayStation brings the game to an interactive form that replicates the show perfectly and is guaranteed fun for any puzzle-game lover.

title: F1 Formula 1 '98
description: Formula 1 racing makes another appearance on the PlayStation with FORMULA 1 '98. Thanks to the most up-to-date FIA license available, all of the drivers, teams, and tracks from the 1998 F1 season are included. Along with the new license, several new additions have been made. Animated pit stops, a replay mode, and an improved graphics engine give the game a new level of visual detail. New commentary from Murray Walker and Martin Brundle create an audio experience that draws the player into the game. Dual Shock support, linked four-player split-screen action, and Arcade Challenge mode add new gameplay elements. With all of the additions, FORMULA 1 '98 creates the most realistic F1 racing experience possible.

title: Future Cop: L.A.P.D.
description: Los Angeles is not always a nice place. In the 22nd century, criminals overrun the city, and Los Angeles is declared uninhabitable. You take control of a mech (that can transform into a hover bike) and try to clean up the streets. Use flamethrowers, plasma bursts, mini-shockwave mortars, and many other weapons as you battle through eight action packed levels by yourself or with a friend. For those who like a little more strategy, play the Precinct Assault mode, in which both players (you can challenge the machine or another human) start with bases and construct combat units. However, building the units cost points that are earned by destroying the enemy's equipment. The first to capture the opposition's base wins the game. With its multiplayer options and a choice of two different games, FUTURE COP: LAPD offers action and excitement for every gamer.

title: Golden Nugget 64
description: GOLDEN NUGGET 64 is a gambling simulation for the Nintendo 64 that is truly one of a kind. There are 10 games in all, including Blackjack, 5-Card Draw, Craps, Roulette, Mini Baccarat, and six types of slot machines. Each game looks just like it does in a real casino, and there are even 3D dealers who talk during gameplay. By using a Memory Pak, the player is able to make a character that they can regularly use, and the computer will track all statistics, which helps to give the gamer a clue as to how much money they have won   or lost. The game provides the true feel of a real casino, with background chatter and music. GOLDEN NUGGET 64 is the only game of its kind on the Nintendo 64, and is a sure bet for casino aficionados.

title: Plane Crazy
description: Plane Crazy is a unique racing game where players pilot propeller-driven, hot-rod racing planes through a variety of courses. In Plane Crazy your aim is to be the fastest speed freak in the air, obsessed with shaving seconds off each course time. This 3D arcade-style racing game comes with 9 unique race courses, 3 modes of gameplay and 3 customizable aircraft to choose from.

title: WCW Nitro
description: WCW Nitro from THQ and Inland Productions pits you, as one of 16 wrestlers, fighting for the ultimate prize: The WCW Heavyweight Belt. Run-in fighters, ring-out fights, surprise attacks and 6 real venues make Nitro as electric as the real thing.

title: CyberStrike 2
description: Imagine entire cityscapes sprawled out in glorious 16-bit color, complete with intricate interior areas and massive outdoor structures. You want a nuclear reactor? You got it. Slip into a cracked pipe, make your way through the nuclear core, and emerge on top of the city - ready to pick off opponents foolish enough to stand up against your arsenal of weapons.

title: Barrage
description: Sit yourself down in the pilot's sat of a high-speed hovercraft, then speed through outdoor, underwater, and underground locations that will make your jaw drop. Countless enemies stand in the way of your progress toward a mysterious portal, so you'll have to keep those guns blazing as you journey through levels like Prairie, Tunnel, Canyon, Chicago, and Ocean. There's a whole spectrum of high-powered weaponry to help you out, but the computer's enormous AI is going to make it tough on you. All gamers had ought to enjoy the game's 3D graphics, open paths, and nerve-racking combat.

title: Rush Down
description: Take a stab at three of the world's most exhilarating outdoor sports without getting scraped, bruised, or sweaty. You can try your hand at kayaking, mountain biking, and snowboarding as you attempt to finish a series of courses as quickly as possible. Choose from four skilled characters, then select your equipment each kayak, bike, and board is rated for speed, handling, and grip, so make sure to pick the one that fits your racing style. Once you're ready to go, you can compete in three modes of play: Arcade, Championship, and Multiplayer. In Arcade mode, it's just you out there trying to hit checkpoints in the allotted times. In Championship mode, you take on computer opponents in three separate events. If you beat the competition in all three races, you move on to the next continent. The action takes place in Africa, Europe, North America, and Asia, and each continent is represented in realistic 3D detail. The Multiplayer mode is split-screen mayhem, as you take on a friend in a heated battle. With additional features like instant replay and a soundtrack by six great French rock bands, Rush Down is sure to be a hit the world over.

title: Brigandine: The Legend of Forsena
description: A great war had been ravaging the villages for years when the Almekia Empire finally defeated its rival country, Norgard, in the year 214. A year later, however, Norgard's Admiral Zemeckis assassinated Almekia's beloved King Henguist, proclaiming himself the new Emperor and beginning a reign of terror. It's now up to you, as one of the five Knights of Rune, to battle the monsters and armies of Zemeckis and restore peace to a broken land. Each Knight was born with specific runic abilities, and each is designated to defend a specific piece of Forsena. Lance is a young prince whose duty is to protect New Almekia and Badostow; Lyonesse is the protector of her kingdom, Leonia; and the lord Vaynard teams up with his White Wolf warriors to defend the northlands. Once you choose your character, you'll organize your party members into attack forces and begin the battle. A deep and involving war simulation, the game's system is based largely on hit points, experience, and levels making it an effective role-playing title as well. You'll use rune assaults, magical spells, and attacks with various weapons to get the job done, but strategy and patience are the best allies you'll have. With outstanding graphics, a top-notch story, and action that takes more than a few tries to crack, BRIGANDINE: The Legend of Forsena is a real classic.

title: Snowboard Kids 2
