title: WWF Smackdown!
description: WWF Smackdown from Yukes is considered by many to be the elite in a plethora of wrestling titles out on the market. Smackdown gives the intense wrestling fanatic all they can handle with an exiting fast-paced version of the WWF. There are two main aspects that set WWF Smackdown apart from the field: The gameplay and the career mode. The career mode lets the gamer start his/her own career and provides the drama, fear, anxiety and everything that comes along with the World Wrestling Federation experience.
rating_content: Blood, Animated Violence, Mature Sexual Themes

title: South Park Rally
description: In what has to be characterized as the wackiest rally-racing game ever, the characters of South Park take to the streets of their beloved town in a cutthroat competition. Cruise through "South Park Forest," "Big Gay Al's Big Gay Animal Sanctuary," "Downtown South Park," and many other familiar scenes from Comedy Central's hit cartoon series. A twist on the standard racing game, South Park Rally is as much a treasure hunting challenge as it is a speed contest -- you have to seek out hidden items in order to notch a win.All of your favorite South Park characters are here, including Cartman on his famous police tricycle, and Chef in his station wagon. You'll have to reach deep into your bag of tricks to thwart the competition using weapons like Mexican staring frogs, chocolate salty balls, and Mr. Hanky to inflict damage on other vehicles. The shows' stars, Trey Parker, Matt Stone, and Isaac Hayes, have lent their voices to the game, and the result is an experience that is reminiscent of the show but unique as a game.

title: Animaniacs Splat Ball
description: Join up with your favorite cartoon characters, putting Wakko, Yakko, and Dot into a paintball competition against the show's bad guys. The action unfolds on three different playing fields, boasting 72 amazing levels of gameplay. All of the familiar faces from the long-running ANIMANIACS television series are here, and the play is a hilarious version of Capture the Flag. Packed with power-ups, hidden areas, and more, Splat Ball is a lighthearted way to experience combat strategy. Three different difficulty levels make it easy for players of all skill levels to get in on the fun.
rating_content: Mild Animated Violence, Mild Realistic Violence

title: Carrier
description: While tranporting an extremely dangerous form of life, the aircraft carrier "Heimdall" is attacked by terrorists.  The ship transmits a "Mayday" message and then falls silent.  Your job is to board the ship and determine what has happened to the ship, crew, and the mysterious life form. Time for some horrific survival!
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

title: Extreme PaintBrawl 2
description: Assemble the team, choose the camo, grab a marker and assign tactical maneuvers to each team member. Strategically eliminate the opposing team as you progress through six diverse 3D environments. Manage your resources, fine tune your skills and get ready!

title: TNN Outdoor Fishing Championship
description: Get out the rod and reel, because the challenge of fishing can now be put into the palm of your hand thanks to TNN OUTDOORS FISHING CHAMP. Play in the Free Fishing mode to get a feel for the game controls and learn how to reel-in the big one. When you want to test your mettle, try to become the undisputed fishing champion in the Tournament mode. You will have to travel to six different tournaments and catch a predetermined number of a specific kind of fish to stay alive in each. If your friends are fishing fanatics, you can challenge them and see who can catch the most fish in an hour. In all of the modes, there are over 30 different varieties of fish to catch including bluegill, catfish, walleye, rainbow trout, lake trout, and largemouth bass. Play TNN OUTDOORS FISHING CHAMP and have a fish tale to tell your friends.

title: Marvel vs. Capcom: Clash of Super Heroes
description: MARVEL VS. CAPCOM is the latest installment of Capcom's STREET FIGHTER series. But now gamers will be able to play as brawlers from the far reaches of the Capcom universe, spanning games like STREET FIGHTER, MEGA MAN, and CONTRA. Marvel is represented by new additions like Venom and Onslaught, as well as fighting-game staples Spider-Man and Wolverine. Capcom's lineup includes Street Fighters Ryu, Chun Li, and Zangief, but also non-fighting game characters like Captain Commando and Mega Man. The result is a veritable smorgasbord of fighters from all over the place. This mix of comic book heroes and videogame characters gives the game a diverse feel, but the gameplay will feel familiar to fans of STREET FIGHTER and other Capcom fighting games.

title: Neo*Geo Cup '98 Plus
description: World-class soccer matches are at your fingertips with NEOGEO CUP '98 PLUS. Three types of games kick any fan into a sporting frenzy. Single mode lets you pick a team and take on the computer. Story mode sends your team into the NeoGeo Cup, where you'll compete for the title, aiding your team with power-ups along the way. Finally, 2P Play lets you use a NeoGeo Cable Link (sold separately) to hook up with a friend and tangle head-to-head.

title: 1602 A.D.
description: With your homeland quickly becoming overcrowded, you've left in search of new lands. With little food and few of the comforts you've become accustomed to, your expedition treks across the country, eventually coming to a series of islands on which your new life will begin. Combining elements of societal simulation with intense exploration, the game also mixes in land and sea battles to deliver a truly distinctive package. Can you establish a city, forge trade routes, and keep the citizens of your new colony happy? You'd better hope so.

title: Dark Arms: Beast Busters 1999
description: Driven by a quest for an unparalleled bio-weapon, you make a pact with the Master of the Dark Realm, who allows you to enter his kingdom in search of the weapon. You'll start this 2D role-playing fantasy with a basic weapon. As you journey through the four main worlds of the game, your weapon will become more powerful by killing the beasts you encounter. You'll also find ways to develop other super-weapons, firepower you'll need to defeat all four worlds and eventually complete your journey.

title: NBA In The Zone 2000
description: Play basketball the way it's supposed to be played with NBA IN THE ZONE 200. You can play as any of the 29 NBA teams which feature more than 300 actual players. All of the players look just like their real-life counterpart thanks to motion-captured animation. You will feel like you are in the middle of the court with the help of the ambient sounds recorded from each arena. Adding to the realism is the play-by-play work of NBA announcer Red Clay. Along with the standard gameplay modes like Exhibition, Season, and Playoffs, a Slam Dunk Contest and Three-Point Shootout are also included. When you are on the court, you can call plays on the fly and pinpoint passing ensures that you get the ball to the right player. See if you've got what it takes to be a world champion with NBA IN THE ZONE 2000.

title: Black Bass Lure Fishing
description: Now you can enter a summer-long fishing tournament in BLACK BASS LURE FISHING. At the beginning of the tournament, you have the lowest ranking and can only fish on one lake. But if you perform well enough and move up the ranks, your class will change and you will be able to choose which of the two lakes you want to fish on. Should you do really well and move into the top two classes, you will be given access to special techniques like Let Fish Go, 8 Magic, Power Lift, Dancing Worm, Dancing Frog, and Last Strike. Along the way, you will be able to use eight different lures to attract the big fish and your progress will be recorded using a password system. So hop in your boat and try to win the tournament in BLACK BASS LURE FISHING.

title: Microsoft International Soccer 2000
description: There's simply nothing like the feeling of seeing that gap, passing it off to an open teammate, and watching as the ball miraculously speeds past the goalkeeper into the corner of the net. Arcade-style access meets realistic soccer physics in this international feast. Mind-blowing graphics and highly sophisticated AI grace this gem of a soccer game, showing you every detail from the kickoff to the last second of overtime. Commentary by Jonathan Pearce and Ron Atkinson keeps you abreast of the action.

title: Magical Tetris Challenge
description: Experience a wide variety of TETRIS games with MAGICAL TETRIS CHALLENGE. There's Normal mode, which is the classic TETRIS that everyone loves. Up or Down will increase the height of a player's stack based on the number of lines the opposition has cleared. In Magical Tetris, after clearing lines, an odd-shaped piece is placed in the opposition's queue. Players must clear a rising tower of gray blocks until a keyhole appears. Clear the row with the keyhole, and you can move on to the next round in Tower Tetris. Target Tetris gives the player a set pattern of blocks and a set number of pieces to clear all of the rows that contain acorns. Two players can experience Harmony Tetris, where players have to clear lines at the same time. MAGICAL TETRIS CHALLENGE has all the action and variations any TETRIS fan will love.

title: FIFA 2000 Major League Soccer
description: Brace yourself for a soccer game that brings all of the wild fun of soccer home on your Game Boy Color! FIFA 2000 is a fully-licensed soccer game that has more than 60 teams from around the world with updated rosters appropriate to the 2000 season. You can choose to play one of five different gameplay modes. Exhibition mode is a quick game where you set the teams and the rules then hit the field. In Tournament mode, you'll square off against an assortment of other teams to see who can take home the final victory. Playoff mode has you playing the final teeth-to-the-grindstone matches where every victory counts. In League mode, you'll play through a full season that culminates in the playoffs to see who is the greatest. Finally, Indoor mode takes the game inside and changes up the rules a little bit, resulting in a fast-paced version of the original. Options available for every mode include weather settings, foul settings, wind, and more. You can also use the password to save all of your stats in League and Tournament modes. FIFA 2000 is compatible with all existing Game Boy systems.

title: Nox
description: Nox is a dark and creepy Action/RPG set in a bucolic world that is being corrupted by a wicked queen of the undead - Hecubah. In solo play, you choose from three different adventures. Follow the path of a warrior and you will forge your skills and master powerful weapons in the Fortress of Horrendous. Join the ranks of the conjurers in the village of Ix and learn to summon the creatures of the land and control the forces of nature. Or lead the life of a wizard, and use combat magic, stealth, and traps to foil the undead legions. Multiplayer offers Arena, Capture the Flag, Elimination, Noxball, and King of the Realm gameplay modes.

title: Dance Dance Revolution 2nd Mix: Dreamcast Edition
description: Dreamcast port of the original Dance Dance Revolution: 2nd Mix arcade game. The game features all songs from the arcade edition, plus bonus tracks, and offers full support of the DDR dance mat controller. Gameplay is unchanged: players tap their feet to the beat of songs, trying to match their steps with the on-screen arrows and cues (which scroll by at varying speeds, depending on the songs). The game was released in February 2000 in Japan under the JAN code: 4988602-72441-7. DDR: 2nd Mix was followed by Dance Dance Revolution: Club Version Dreamcast Edition.
platforms: DC PS PS Arcade Arcade Arcade

title: Azure Dreams
description: Azure Dreams for the Game Boy Color is an RPG experience like no other. You play the role of Kou, a young boy who has just celebrated his 15th birthday. Years ago, your father disappeared while exploring the treasure-laden Monster Tower, a massive structure filled with a variety of dangers. Now, you are finally old enough to go to the Tower and find out what really happened to your father. Since many explorers have surely charted out the Tower beforehand, finding what you are looking for should be a snap, right? Not quite, because the Monster Tower changes its entire layout every time you visit, providing new challenges and areas to explore every time you enter. What doesn't change, however, is the number of monsters lurking around looking to end your quest. To help fight them, you can enlist some monsters of your own. Combined with the tons of treasure you'll find, you'll be well equipped to tackle the dangers of the Tower.

title: Looney Tunes
description: The Looney Tunes have been a staple of popular culture since the 1940s. Now, they have come to the Game Boy Color. You must navigate through seven stages that are reminiscent of Saturday morning cartoons. In each of the levels you must help a different character get through a tough situation: Bugs and Daffy must use Frisbees to destroy enemies and defeat the boss at the end of a stage; Porky pilots a spaceship to destroy satellites and an evil star that wants to eat him; Tweety must fly through his stage avoiding bottles and Sylvester; and Speedy Gonzales must enter an Aztec temple to defeat Dracula. If you love the Looney Tunes, then you need to get a copy of LOONEY TUNES for the Game Boy Color.

title: Roadsters
description: You get into a race with your buddies...in the middle of traffic. In order to win, you must pass your friends and get past all of the other cars on the road. This is the racing action and excitement of ROADSTERS for the Game Boy Color. You can choose from three different drivers that have unique attributes, and go find some action on any of the 12 tracks. To win a race, you must weave through traffic and pass the seven cars that are the competition. After each race, you are awarded cash to repair and upgrade your vehicle. Thanks to a revolutionary game engine, the action is the fastest possible on the Game Boy Color. ROADSTERS puts the thrills and dangers of road racing into the palm of your hand.

title: ECW: Hardcore Revolution
description: When the wrestling-license musical chairs ended last year, Acclaim must have felt like it was on the hurtin' end of a Stone Cold suplex, what with EA snagging the WCW license from THQ and an enraged THQ, its spirit meter jacked up to stratospheric levels, responding by wresting the prized WWF license from Acclaim's grasp.All's fair in love and corporate lumberjack matches, though, so Acclaim pulled itself off the canvas and went out in search of a new franchise. The answer lay as close as the nearest TV, where Extreme Championship Wrestling (ECW) holds court weekly on The Nashville Network. Sealing the deal for a long time to come, Acclaim has invested some of its many WWF and Turok bucks in the ECW.

title: Colin McRae Rally [2000]
description: COLIN MCRAE RALLY brings the thrill and excitement or European-style rally racing to the PlayStation. For the uninitiated, European rally racing take place over several days and has the drivers take to multiple tracks, one competitor at a time, in a race against the clock. To learn how to control your car in the off-road environment and get used to working with the navigator, go to the Rally School where Colin McRae teaches the basics. When you are comfortable driving, choose from 12 real-world rally cars and take on the challenge of an actual event in the Rally mode. For those who want to tackle a bigger challenge, Championship mode will place you in the rallies of eight different countries, including Australia and Monte Carlo. No matter how you play, the graphics engine allows the excitement of driving on two wheels and rollovers. If you're interested in a different kind of racing, try COLIN MCRAE RALLY.

title: Brunswick Circuit Pro Bowling 2
description: In Brunswick Circuit Pro Bowling, bowling enthusiasts found the most realistic bowling simulation available for PlayStation. Brunswick Circuit Pro Bowling 2 will feature everything that was great about the original, with improvements designed to appeal to hardcore and casual bowlers alike. Enhanced graphics, updated Brunswick ProStaff and equipment, new and improved interfaces, multi-player support for up to 8, and a completely overhauled Create-a-Bowler feature are just the tip of the iceberg. Add to that new modes of play including Team and Skills Challenge, real ProStaff tutorials, more bowler and crowd reactions, auto-replay and dual-shock and analog support, and you've got the PlayStation bowling game that can't be beat!

title: NBA In The Zone 2000
description: Get set for some serious net time with KONAMI and the NBA! We're back In The Zone for PlayStation, Nintendo 64 and GameBoy Color with our best season yet! Lead the break from the tip off with features like three-point contest, pinpoint passing and the slam dunk contest. All 29 NBA teams are here, with 300 actual players suiting up. So are you ready to try to sink the 3 with 2 seconds left? Work on your "D"? Venture into the paint? Or are you just going to sit there with that goofy look on your face? Huh? Huh? Huh?

title: The New Adventures of Mary-Kate & Ashley
description: Help Mary-Kate and Ashley solve five mysteries by dinnertime in THE NEW ADVENTURES OF MARY-KATE & ASHLEY. You take the roles of Mary-Kate, Ashley, and their dog Clue. Each character has a set of special abilities: Mary-Kate can jump to high ledges, Ashley can flip switches, and Clue can fit through narrow openings or give the girls a boost to higher areas. On each level, the girls and Clue must use their talents and work together to collect a puzzle piece. If you get stuck, there are three clue pieces scattered in each stage. Collect all three pieces, and you are given a hint on how to collect the puzzle piece. Digitized voice-work throughout the game will make you think you are really playing with Mary-Kate and Ashley. Try to solve all of the mysteries in THE NEW ADVENTURES OF MARY-KATE & ASHLEY.

title: Fear Effect
description: Fear Effect is an action adventure waiting to unfold! Wee Ming Lam disappears a few days before her 18th birthday under mysterious circumstances. Three ruthless mercenaries conspire to track her down and ransom her off to her father, Mr. Lam, a powerful Triad leader in Hong Kong. An extortion mission to retrieve Wee Ming Lam becomes a lesson in survival against the most unimaginable of enemies.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence, Suggestive Themes

title: Croc 2
description: You are Croc, a crusading crocodile who must rescue the Gobbos, from the evil villain Baron Dante who has taken over the Gobbo Valley and is turning all good creatures to evil with his magical powers. With amazing graphics and animation, including moves such as swimming, swinging, and flying, you can explore with Croc in more than 250 individual game areas on 45 levels.

title: Triple Play 2001
description: Get yourself some peanuts, popcorn, and crackerjacks and get in the game with TRIPLE PLAY 2001 from EA Sports. Step up to bat or round the bases as one of over 1,000 real-life players, and hear the crowd shout as you send another home run sailing over the centerfield wall. You can visit all of the major league stadiums the amazing recreations on view are correct down to the smallest polygon. Access to all pertinent stats is readily available, and die-hard fans of the sport will be impressed by the wealth of information on hand. Take to the mound in a variety of modes like Exhibition, Playoffs, Versus, and Home Run Derby. Listen in Dolby Surround sound to broadcast-style commentary from announcers that will fool you into thinking you're watching a game on TV, not playing one. Watch realistic motion-captured athlete animations, trade unwanted players or create your own, and unlock hidden greats like Hank Aaron and Babe Ruth. With TRIPLE PLAY 2001, the baseball action is non-stop.

title: Hidden & Dangerous: Devil's Bridge
description: In 1941, Captain David Stirling gathered an elite group of soldiers and founded what was to become one of the most powerful Special Forces agencies in the world - the British Special Air Services. Only the strongest, swiftest, and most daring were allowed to join the SAS; their bravery in battle was second to none.Now YOU can become a member of the SAS with Illusion Softworks´ Hidden & Dangerous: Devil's Bridge. This offers even more exciting missions and campaigns. Guide your four-man squad of covert paratroopers deep into enemy territory during World War II. Either blow up the bridge or blow the mission...the choice is yours.

title: Sim Theme Park
description: Have you ever wanted to own an amusement park? Now's your chance with SIM THEME PARK. Start with a small park, and try to build it into the largest and most popular park in the city. You must decide what to install: new rides, attractions, food booths, and souvenir stands, and where to put them. There is also the opportunity to determine what kind of landscaping the park needs. And if you really want to micromanage, you can hire and fire staff, determine their salaries, and assign them to specific duties. When you have built all of the available attractions, you can spend money to research new ones. The ultimate reward is to walk through your creation and try everything for yourself. With the help of SIM THEME PARK, you can find the rewards and thrills of creating an amusement park.

title: Total Annihilation: Kingdoms -- The Iron Plague
description: This expansion to the 1999 real-time strategy game, Total Annihilation: Kingdoms, adds a fifth playable race. Where the previous four relied heavily on magic and knights, the warriors of Creon are known for their use of DaVinci-inspired medieval technology.

title: Roadsters
description: Get ready for the hot-rodder's dream as you jump into the driver's seat of ROADSTERS. You can select from 30 different cars, each with the top down and the engine fine-tuned, ready for intense high-speed action. Every car has its own handling capabilities, so mastering each one will keep the challenge level and replayability high. You can also modify your ride, giving it more power or better handling. So, even if you don't find a car in the beginning that fits your driving style, you can make adjustments and improvements that will fit your needs. You'll also have 10 real-world courses to choose from, ranging from a secret military base to an Aztec temple. And don't forget to keep your eyes peeled for short cuts, because you're going to be up against some stiff competition that will give you a run for your money in every race. With three different racing classes, dozens of roofless cars to master, and a good variety of tracks, ROADSTERS is the ultimate arcade-racing experience.

title: Top Gear Hyperbike
description: Motorbike racer set in the Top Gear series. The Championship mode has you alternating between dirt and street racing as you compete for points. You earn new bikes and courses along the way like many other games, but interesting twist is going from one kind of racing to the other. The physics of each type of racing are very different, and you'll have to switch back and forth between dirt and racing tactics on the fly. The dirt bike racing is a lot more arcadey with all of the jumps and wide open tracks. You can earn turbo by pulling off tricks and there's really nothing to stop you from testing your stunt skills while racing except your own nerve and imagination. In this way, Hyperbike is like Hydro Thunder where you're expected to lean on that turbo button the whole time and it's up to your racing skills to ensure there's turbo available.

title: Armored Core: Master of Arena
description: ARMORED CORE: Master of Arena puts you in control of the lethal robot of your choice. The robots in this game are fully customizable, so you can make the robot exactly what you want it to be. If rockets are your thing, give it rockets; if you like chain guns, then so be it! It's completely up to you! To make things more interesting, by completing missions you get the chance to earn credits and upgrade your equipment, which is necessary to survive. Attack your enemies using intense speed and vicious weapons. You'll also have the ability to run, slide, and fly, all in order to hunt down your enemy. Best of all, this game features two discs of innovative gameplay. It is a must for any robot-action junkie.

title: Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation
description: Lara Croft faces the great dangers of an unleashed Egyptian god in her fourth tomb raiding adventure. Last Revelation's redesigned inventory system gives Tomb Raider brand-new gameplay. Combined with Lara's new moves and abilities, gameplay features greater scope than ever before. Clear objectives and smaller locations result in less time spent traveling between areas. Individual environments are more reminiscent of the original game - tightly focused and puzzle-orientated, but with higher levels of detail and a greater number of objects than seen before. An emphasis on ancient locations and tombs allows mystery, suspense and characteristic atmosphere to play key roles throughout.
platforms: DC PSP Mac PS PC PS3

title: Rugrats: Time Travelers
description: The Rugrats are about to find out that the only thing more exciting than traveling through your own backyard is traveling through time. After discovering a time machine, the kids accidentally scatter themselves throughout history, and you're the only one who can reunite the famous babies with their beloved cohorts. Each of the game's 12 levels puts you in charge of a different character, charging you with tasks like finding a lost toy, locating fellow Rugrats, or tracking down mysterious items. The whole debacle begins when Chuckie won't enter the time machine with the other babies, but he changes his mind as soon as the rest if the gang disappears and leaves him all alone. Chuckie's attempt to track down the others puts him in the 1800s, but none of his friends are there. In fact, Tommy is in ancient Egypt, Angelica is at an old circus, Phil is trapped in prehistory, and Dil is, somehow, lost in space! Can you collect all of the lost items and round up the babies before it's too late?

title: Street Fighter Alpha: Warriors' Dreams
description: A return to the earliest days of the Street Fighter saga, Street Fighter Alpha brings together a cast of 13 characters (10 main fighters plus three hidden ones), many of whom would come to be champions and challengers in later Street Fighter tournaments.  The series' inaugural title introduces super combos and alpha counters to add a new dimension to fighting.
platforms: GBC Cell PS PSP PS3 Arcade PC Saturn Cell

title: Worms Armageddon
description: The pink worms and red worms have co-existed peacefully for hundreds of years...until now. Tensions have mounted to the point where the worms are acquiring and creating weapons of mass destruction, and the only possible outcome is war. You must lead your team of one to four worm soldiers against a computer-generated opponent (or a friend) in this strategic adventure of small proportions. Take your pick from 13 wild weapons from baseball bats to angry sheep. You can even form an air raid and get your attacks in from above. If camaraderie is in the air, you and three friends can play cooperatively, too. The options are fully customizable, as you select how long each worm fights, how many hit points each worm is granted, and which terrain you prefer to battle in. There are a total of 44 single-player missions, and the levels are generated randomly, whereas to keep replay value way high. If you aren't the confident leader you aspire to be, form your team and head to Training mode to work out the kinks.
platforms: N64 PS GBC PC PC DC Mac Mac

title: Spy vs. Spy
description: The Black Spy and the White Spy have feuded on the pages of MAD magazine for decades. Now they bring their feud to the Game Boy Color. You can play as either the Black Spy or the White Spy, with the goal being to outsmart your opponent and collect five objects hidden throughout the level. As luck would have it, you have an infinite number of booby traps to place throughout the level to get rid of your nemesis. Buckets of water can be set up over doors and items can be rigged with bombs. If your opponent has set a booby trap, you can defuse it with the proper item. Should you get caught in a trap, you have infinite lives, and all you lose is time. If you want a friend to join the mayhem, use a link cable and go at it. Who will be able to survive from one stage to the next in SPY VS SPY?
platforms: GBC iPhone SMS ZX Amiga NES C64 CPC Apple-II 400/800 ST

title: Sammy Sosa Softball Slam
description: While baseball has the boys of summer, softball has the middle-aged, bald guys of summer. The recreational sport of "normal" people comes to the PlayStation with SAMMY SOSA'S SOFTBALL SLAM. You can play with or against 24 single-sex and co-ed teams. For some quick competition you can play in the Exhibition mode, but if you want more intense games, try to win a championship in the Season mode. When playing a season takes too long, you can play a tournament with up to eight teams. In all modes, the players react to the ball the same way that real softball players do: once in a while, they will miss fly balls or overthrow a base. Unlike most summer softball leagues, a bombastic announcer gives the play-by-play and announces each batter. SAMMY SOSA'S SOFTBALL SLAM lets you enjoy a recreational game without getting out of the house.

title: Cyber Tiger
description: Cyber Tiger brings arcade golf action to N64. Play as six different characters, including Tiger Woods. Each character starts out as a junior golfer. As you progress, develop your character into a teenage amateur and then a professional golfer by winning tournaments in the career mode. For a quick golfing fix, hit one of the five courses and play a round of stroke play, skins, four ball, shoot out, or foursome. If the shots are not falling the way you want, then hit the driving range and practice greens. To enhance your experience, hit targets while out on the driving range to earn "special" balls like the gumball, which sticks when it lands; the power ball, which flies further; the eyeball, which always flies straight; and the super ball, which bounces really high. With all of these options, younger fans and old professionals will have a good time with Cyber Tiger.

title: Montezuma's Return
description: You are out to find the Aztec treasure in MONTEZUMA'S RETURN. The only skills you have are wits and your jumping ability. You must navigate 150 screens, each of which is constructed of platforms, ladders, poles, and rope. Use the elements of the screen to collect all of the treasure and move on to the next area. However, there are a large number of enemies out to stop you including rolling skulls, spiders, snakes, Aztec guards, scorpions, and spikes. Touch any of these hazards and it's Game Over. Luckily, you can pick up new abilities along the way, like walking through enemies and killing an attacker with one touch. Try to collect all of the Aztec's treasure that you can in MONTEZUMA'S RETURN.

title: Thief II: The Metal Age
description: A first-person shooter where stealth is key, where being ignorant about your enemies and surroundings got you killed. Thief II surpassed the original with new abilities such as shooting buttons using arrows, invisibility, and setting and disarming traps. Practically anything you could do as a thief in a pen and paper RPG you could probably do in Thief II. Complimenting the game were its proto-Venetian setting where magic and technology co-exist and where dark, untamed forces threatened the fabric of reality. All this combined to make Thief II one of the best games of all time.

title: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater
description: Grab a skateboard and head to the streets for some action in TONY HAWK'S PRO SKATER. Try to score as many tricks as possible in the Halfpipe mode, where the biggest rewards come with complexity and originality. In the Tournament mode, you must compete against professional skaters in five different skate parks, navigating through the park and performing tricks. Hopefully, you will be able to beat the competition to the finish line. If your friends want in on the action, you can challenge them to a race with the Versus mode, where you can compete via the link cable. But don't enter the Versus mode unless you are prepared; the best preparation comes by playing the One-on-One mode against the computer. Get all of the skateboarding action you can handle with TONY HAWK'S PRO SKATER.

title: Star Wars: Force Commander
description: Think you have what it takes to command a battalion of AT-ATs' Or to defend the Rebel stronghold at Hoth? Prove it in Star Wars: Force Commander, a real-time strategy game from LucasArts. You'll lead both the Empire's monolithic military might and the ragtag-yet-resourceful Rebels. Keep your war machine humming in single- and multiplayer modes. The ultrarealistic 3D terrain and vehicles give you the power to guide your troops to victory. This is war. This is Force Commander!

title: Invictus: In the Shadow of Olympus
description: Real-time strategy game with RPG elements, set in the world of Greek mythology. The main game consists of a dynamic campaign. You play Odysseus and must guide him through a series of missions as a result of a wager between the gods. Other legendary heroes become members of your party and each character has their own special skills. The game employs average 3D graphics. The violent nature of the game is potentially unsuitable for the younger gamer.

title: NBA Jam 99
description: Arcade basketball action comes to the Game Boy Color in NBA JAM '99. Enjoy a two-on-two basketball game with no rules using your favorite NBA players. Use the Practice mode to work on your moves, and when you're ready to compete, take on a Quick Play game or become the champion after playing through the grueling NBA Season. If the hassles of the season become too much, just skip to the Playoffs. No matter how you play, all of the classic NBA JAM gameplay remains intact. Players can make five-point baskets by shooting from Hotspots, or receive a temporary stats-boost by collecting the power-ups that occasionally appear on the court. If you are looking for a different kind of basketball game, try NBA JAM '99.

title: Might and Magic VIII: Day of the Destroyer
description: The Destroyer again walks the land. In the four corners of the world gates to the planes of Fire, Air, Earth, and Water have opened and denizens of those realms are sweeping across the lands. Lead a band of rugged adventures on a most perilous mission to save the world. This is not necessarily an adventure just for Knights, and Clerics, you may need to enlist the aid of the darker races such as, Trolls, Dark Elves, and Minotaurs. Save the kingdoms from ruin or watch as the lands are decimated forever in Might and Magic VIII.

title: Superbike 2000
description: Feel the excitement of high-octane motorbike racing in this exhilarating rush from EA Sports. Full of arcade-style action and realistic bike simulation, the game brings together the best elements of two gaming styles. There are 20 real-life riders to choose from (each with a sponsorship), and you'll need to have the pro skills to match the pro names if you hope to get anywhere. You'll race through 12 unique tracks, each of which is an accurate representation of an actual pro circuit course. You can customize your ride in a variety of ways to make sure that your bike fits your own personal riding style. In Single Race mode, you choose to race a full grid in one shot or over the course of two events. Championship mode lets you choose a rider, customize your bike, and set out for an entire career of full-throttle racing action. If you want to hone your skills, try out Practice mode, which lets you attempt maneuvers you're too scared to pull out in the heat of competition. If you love motorbikes but hate breaking your leg every time you fall off of one, you'll love the realistic simulation of SUPERBIKE 2000.

title: Boarder Zone
description: Take to the slopes with BOARDER ZONE for the PC. Cruise the mountains with this behind-the-boarder 3D snowboarding title. Choose from one of four distinct boarders and four different boards, each with their own attributes. Six different gameplay modes are available, including Race Attack, Trick, Time Attack, Challenge, Slalom, and Practice modes.

title: Championship Bass
description: The world of competitive fishing comes to the PlayStation with Electronic Arts's Championship Bass. There are several different ways to play: Bass Challenge offers 15 scenarios that will improve and challenge your fishing technique, or you can take on challengers in the Tournament and Career modes. If the competition stresses you out, take a trip to one of the six lakes for a relaxing afternoon of fishing. Since all of the lakes have full access, you will always be able to find the perfect fishing spot. No matter how you choose to play, you'll never miss a second of the action thanks to unique above- and below-water camera angles.

title: Test Drive Off-Road 3
description: Some cars should stay on the pavement, while others are designed to go where no other vehicle has gone before. Those are the vehicles included in TEST DRIVE OFF ROAD. You can choose from four different vehicles: a Hummer, Land Rover Defender 90, Jeep Wrangler and Chevrolet K-1500 Z71. In addition to the four starting vehicles six more become available with extended play and include a monster truck, dune buggy, stock car, hot rod, Mini Cooper, and an off-road beetle. When you are ready to race there is a Mixed League and Class League to choose from. Mixed League is open to any vehicle and Class League restricts the entries to vehicles of a particular type. While you are racing the 12 tracks offer three different surfaces including dirt, snow, and rocks. Try to master the elements and go where other cars can't with TEST DRIVE OFF ROAD.

title: Superbike 2000
description: Get on your leathers and fire up your PC for the most exhilarating racing sim of any kind. Prove you can handle 150 horsepower between your legs with the most faithfully modeled bikes, bike physics, riders and tracks ever seen.

title: Crusaders of Might and Magic
description: Drake once lived a peaceful and happy life in his village. He never bothered anyone, and he never wanted to be a hero. Suddenly, an army of the undead, led by Necros, destroyed Drake's village. Unable to do anything, Drake left the ruins of the village and became a merchant. Several years later, while selling swords and shields, Drake gets caught in the Crusade, an uprising of noble spirits who are out to destroy Necros and his army of the undead. Take control of Drake as he joins the Crusade. Run, jump and climb through 3D environments as Drake destroys Necros's legions with swords, axes, maces, and a little magic. Will Drake survive to fight Necros, or will he try to leave the Crusade at his first opportunity? Play CRUSADERS OF MIGHT AND MAGIC and discover what happens.

title: Stephen King's F13
description: A provocative yet unanswered question for horror fans and computer users. Unanswered until now. Soon, STEPHEN KING'S F13; will be available to all, but perhaps best reserved for only the bravest of souls. With F13, Stephen King brings his own enigmatic brand of interactive horror to the screens of everyday computers. F13 is presented in an imaginative and easy to use format. It is an interactive time-killer and exceptional desktop companion filled with bone-chilling realism and delivered in distinct 'Stephen King' style.

title: Hydro Thunder
description: The arcade hit HYDRO THUNDER has come to the PlayStation. Take control of nine different super powerful boats and hit the water in 12 different tracks. On every track the goal is simple: collect power-ups, use shortcuts, and be the first to the finish line. Choose a track and get racing in the Arcade mode, or for more of a challenge, play the Circuit mode where players must finish in the top three to have enough money to pay the entry fee for the next race. If dealing with other boats keeps giving you a headache, try to earn the fastest time in the Time Trial mode. If your friends want to join the powerboat racing, use the two-player mode to challenge them to a race. The wind will whip through your hair, and you just might get splashed with some water while playing HYDRO THUNDER.
platforms: PS N64 DC PC Arcade PS2

title: Vegas Games
description: Try to break the bank and come away a millionaire in VEGAS GAMES. You can play 20 different casino games, both cards and machines. The card games include Blackjack and Baccarat. Bet on dice in Craps, or on the result of a spinning wheel in Money Wheel or Roulette. If lottery games are more your style, try to win big in Keno and Video Keno. There are five different versions of Video Poker to try including Deuces Wild, Tens or Better, Jokers Wild Double Down, Jacks or Better High Roller, and Jacks or Better Double Down. No casino is complete without slot machines, and VEGAS GAMES is no exception. This one has eight different machines to try: Ancient Treasures, Love 2 Win, Go Fish, Easy Money, Dynamite Dollars, Buffet, Buck Teeth, and Beyond the Stars. If you love to gamble, you will enjoy playing VEGAS GAMES.

title: BattleTanx: Global Assault
description: Sequel to 3DO's popular multiplayer tank battle fest. This time around players can expect a whole slew of new goodies ranging from enhanced graphics to improved framerates and more deathmatch modes than ever before. In the year 2002 the world has turned into a diseased, post-apocalyptic wastelands. As the human race struggles to rebuild society, a young boy who possesses rare tele-kinetic abilities holds the key to a better world. However, an evil QueenLord wants this boy's powers for her own so that she may destroy what is left of civilization. Using a variety of tanks and weapons, players must rescue this powerful child from the hands of evil and deliver him into the safe arms of the allies. Only then can peace be restored upon the land.

title: Rayman 2: The Great Escape
description: It's hard to deny thatstarted a new era in platform gaming, but there was no successor that better embodied's groundbreaking ideas than. With its enchanted storybook look beautifully translated into 3D, lush, vibrant colors, funny enemy designs, and clever jumping puzzles,is platforming perfection. Michel Ancel's platformer shines the brightest on Dreamcast, but every version is a charm. No arms, no legs, no problem for the little French creation that could.
platforms: DC N64 PC PS PS3 PS2 PSP PS3 iPhone 3DS NDS

title: Front Mission 3
description: After numerous wars and terrorist attacks, Yokosuka had finally entered a state of peace; it would last only 10 short years. A deadly explosion rocked the continent, disrupting peace and causing a worldwide panic. Take on the roles of Kazuki and Ryogo as they try to clear their names after being linked to the explosion. Engage in 60 different missions as Kazuki and Ryogo recruit friends, surf the Internet for information, and customize their wanzers. Will Kazuki and Ryogo be able to save themselves?Front Mission 3 is a turn-based strategy game with a unique Double Feature Scenario. It allows the player to choose one of two completely different viewpoints towards the same general plot of the game. Each scenario features eight characters with their own unique robots.

title: Virtua Striker 2
description: Imagine yourself in the middle of a pitch surrounded by a stadium filled with rabid soccer fans. Now it's a whole lot easier to do, thanks to VIRTUA STRIKER 2. Based on the wildly popular Japanese arcade game, you play in an international tournament against world-class football teams. You control your player's actions through long passes, short passes, or side kicks. You can also choose to align your team's offense with the Change Formation command, or try to steal the ball from your opponents or prevent the competition from getting the ball down field with a slide tackle. Play in your choice of Arcade, Versus, or Tournament modes. Use the Power Meter to your advantage when taking a shot on goal. Play against the computer or dominate a friend in Two-Player mode. Featuring breathtaking graphics and a brilliant use of motion capture that gives the players absolutely stunning fluid motion, VIRTUA STRIKER 2 scores a goal in armchair soccer.
platforms: DC Arcade Arcade Arcade Arcade Arcade

title: Mobil 1 Rally Championship
description: Thirty-six stages from the official British Rally Championship can be raced in over twenty licensed cars.  As in real rallies, you must manage the repair of your car between the stages of the race. The game features superb, photo-realistic, 3D graphics including weather.

title: Chu Chu Rocket
description: Take a trip to outer space with some very hungry cats and some very scared mice. In Chu Chu Rocket, you control a pack of rodents, placing arrows and other directional information on the floor of each level in order to help steer your friends away from danger. In a race against the clock, you'll have to move faster and faster as the game progresses.Like any great puzzle game, the premise of Chu Chu Rocket is simple: guide groups of skittish mice into your rocket, steering them clear of the grumpy cats that are wandering around. The only thing you can use to get the mice to safety is an endless supply of directional arrows, which will change the direction the mice are heading. But just getting the mice into your rocket isn't enough; you've also got to keep the cats out, because they'll wreak all kinds of havoc if they get in: rockets will move randomly, things might slow down, speed up or completely freeze, or a handful of other random circumstances.Chu Chu Rocket is not only a unique premise, it's also the first Dreamcast game that lets you go online and play against other mouse wranglers around the country. You can also design your own mazes and go head-to-head with a friend to really liven up the party.

title: Swamp Buggy Racing
description: Racing game based on the real-life sport of Swamp Buggy Racing. Developed by DayLight Productions, the game is an arcade racer at heart. Players compete on two different tracks: Mesa Park in Fellesmere, Florida, and an off-road course named Wild Thing, also in Florida (Florida is the home of the Swamp Racing association, so it's a fitting location). There are four different types of buggies: a four cylinder, four-wheel drive off-roader called The Secret Weapon, a six-cylinder L-Mean-Yo, a 1000-HP monster called The Outlaw, and an eight-cylinder super stock class known as Re-Psycho. Swamp Buggy Racing was published by WizardWorks in 2000 and features the official NASRA license.

title: Family Game Pack
description: Whatever happened to family game night? It's back thanks to 3DO's FAMILY GAME PACK for the PlayStation. Play 25 family classics than span four different categories. Get into the action of card games like GO FISH, OLD MAID, or HEARTS. For those who like boards with their games, tackle BACKGAMMON, CHECKERS, or CHESS. Or you can win it all or lose everything with casino games that include video poker, slot machines, and BLACK JACK. Should someone be looking for a more solitary endeavor, play KLONDIKE, AULD LANG SYNE, or SCORPION. Every game is faithfully recreated with high-resolution 3D graphics. The FAMILY GAME PACK has something for everyone. Who knows, maybe your family will start to have dinner at the dining room table again.

title: Army Men: Sarge's Heroes
description: In ARMY MEN: Sarge's Heroes, the Tan Army is at it again. Now they are trying to gather weapons of mass destruction: exploding skyrockets, intensely hot magnifying glasses, and the ultimate weapon the garbage disposal. Only Sergeant Hawk can keep the scales of good and evil in balance. Guide Hawk through 16 missions that range from the simple, seek-and-destroy to the complex, stealth reconnaissance. With over 40 mission objectives and 13 weapons, the possibilities are endless. Once the Tans have been defeated, invite your friends over to experience the plastic carnage in a head-to-head game. Plastosheen, a revolutionary new highlighting process that brings out the plastic look of the characters, highlights all of the death and carnage. The men may be plastic but the combat is real.

title: Quest: Fantasy Challenge
description: As you're leaving a party at the castle, you're suddenly attacked by a swarm of evil monsters. Now you must fight your way through the monsters to get home. In each of the 20 levels, you must collect gems and open chests that are scattered throughout. However, there are a large number of enemies on your tail including Hellhounds, Apophis, Bumbershoot, Rocky, Skeletons, and Scorpions. Luckily, you have a magic wand that will destroy them, but there's a catch it must recharge between shots. There are also a multitude of power-ups like Fresh Bread, Mint Leaves, Honey Leaves, Dew Drops, Spirit Light, Healing Potion, Heroes Drink and the Dragon's Potion that will help you along the way. Try to collect all of the items and get home safely in QUEST FANTASY CHALLENGE.

title: ECW: Hardcore Revolution
description: When the wrestling-license musical chairs ended last year, Acclaim must have felt like it was on the hurtin' end of a Stone Cold suplex, what with EA snagging the WCW license from THQ and an enraged THQ, its spirit meter jacked up to stratospheric levels, responding by wresting the prized WWF license from Acclaim's grasp.All's fair in love and corporate lumberjack matches, though, so Acclaim pulled itself off the canvas and went out in search of a new franchise. The answer lay as close as the nearest TV, where Extreme Championship Wrestling (ECW) holds court weekly on The Nashville Network. Sealing the deal for a long time to come, Acclaim has invested some of its many WWF and Turok bucks in the ECW.

title: Killer Loop
description: Are you prepared for the fastest ride of your life? You'd better bring your own seatbelt, because these futuristic vehicles get some serious velocity going. Choose your racer, make any necessary tweaks, and then take off on one of eight awesome tracks. The courses span the globe and eventually the universe, making it to Mars before all is said and done. Packed with power-ups, special modes, bonus tracks, and more, KILLER LOOP requires the mastery of a new skill on each successive course. Play in either Championship or Time Trial modes.

title: X: Beyond the Frontier
description: X: Beyond the Frontier combines 3-D environments, epic battles, diplomacy, construction, exploration, and trading into a gaming experience of intense exploration. You can follow the storyline in an open or linear fashion while operating 150 types of spacecraft and space stations as well as encounter up to 10,000 objects within the universe.

title: SEGA Swirl
description: If you're looking for an alternative to SOLITAIRE on your PC, then SEGA SWIRL is the game for you. The object of the game is simple: clear the board of all the different colored swirls (which look eerily like the Dreamcast logo). As you remove a swirl or group of swirls, the remaining swirls fall down to fill the gap left by the removed swirls. In essence, SEGA SWIRL can be thought of as an inverse TETRIS. You get more points for removing chains of swirls, so strategy is an important element of the gameplay. As you progress, chains will become less frequent and planning and forethought become the real challenge. There are several different game modes available, like playing against the computer, against up to three friends, or just against the clock. You can also play through e-mail, which slows the gameplay down considerably but gives you many more possible opponents.

title: Sword of the Berserk: Guts' Rage
description: Sword of the Berserk: Guts' Rage is a fighting game based on the popular manga written by Kentarou Miura Hack. This epic Sword of the Berserk: Guts' Rage is the US translation of the Japanese hit Berserk, a solo adventure set in medieval times. This game has a fighting game style combo system, which allows you to dole out the hurt with multiple weapons and attack moves. There's a witty elfin fairy, a tyrannical king, an insane girlfriend, and a land overrun by evil. Slash through more than 30 types of grotesque enemies, each with unique and fearsome attacks. There's two combat modes (including the devastating Berserk rage), unleash powerful combination moves, and wield four deadly weapons.

title: Army Men
description: 3DO's popular series of ARMY MEN games makes its way to the Game Boy Color in style in this single-player overhead shooter. Play as Sarge, hero of the Green Army, as you attempt to foil the various schemes of the evil Tan Army. You'll see it all in the game's 20+ missions. Arctic wastelands, lush jungles, and desert bases await you, all loaded with enemy soldiers and traps. Gather up a variety of weapons (like grenades and machine guns) to battle the Tans. Keep your eyes peeled for well-armed vehicles such as tanks and jeeps in order to turn up the carnage another notch. ARMY MEN takes full advantage of Game Boy Color's lush palette to create extremely vibrant environments, and digitized voice samples help move the story along. Continue the plastic war whenever you want thanks to the password save system.

title: Renegade Racers
description: When Buck Billionaire's adventuresome plunge from the Brooklyn Bridge lands him on the deck of a yacht, it sparks an idea: why not sponsor a contest between the 12 fastest watercraft racers in the world? Choose from 12 goofball participants (including Buck), as you try to speed your way toward glory. Each of the 12 racers is ranked based on strengths and weaknesses, and each represents a different nationality. The game features three main modes and eight exciting race modes. The race modes include Battle Race, in which you can blast your opponents; Check Point Challenge, a race that requires you to make it to each marker before time expires; Smash & Grab; Treasure Hunt; Head-to-Head; and Dodgems. You just select which of the three difficulty levels suits you, and then get ready to enjoy up to 48 levels of loony fun. Some of the most exciting boards have to be unlocked by beating their bosses in Head-to-Head competition, but there are plenty of pickups, weapons, and turbos hidden throughout the game to give you an advantage. Bon Voyage!

title: Die Hard Trilogy 2: Viva Las Vegas
description: Yippie-ki-yay! Blast into non-stop action as feature film and game hero John McClane, who once again finds the chips stacked against him as he faces a new legion of hi-tech terrorists in a race against time. The bright lights and vast landscape of Las Vegas provide the backdrop for an all-new story line that incorporates the three white-knuckle game styles of the original best-selling Die Hard Trilogy. Try to beat the odds as you match wits with the meanest, smartest villains in the most explosive adventure John McClane has ever faced. The payoff is the hottest action in town!
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

title: NHL Rock the Rink
description: EA Sports has broadened its horizons in terms of flexibility towards games. EA makes some of the most statistically realistic games and now introduces a NHL and NHLPA licensed arcade-style hockey game. If you love bone-jarring hits and blistering shots you will love the style of hockey Rock the Rink brings to you. Addicting entertaining and interestingly intense, Rock the Rink gives you a break from the headache of actually running a franchise and lets just go out and play.

title: Bakuretsu Muteki Bangaioh
description: Treasure-developed 2D shooter, played from a zoomed-out view. You pilot the Bangaioh, a super-powerful robot, through 40+ stages of free-roaming 2D shooting, with your goal in each level to find and destroy the boss. Along the way, you run into opposition from various enemies, ranging from gun turrets to opponent mechs, and when you're not shooting down these aggressive enemies you can also blast buildings, cars, and basically anything lining the levels. In addition to shooting in all directions, you have available to you two modes of fire, Mami Mode and Ricky Mode. The former fires straight laser blasts that repel off walls, while the latter launches heat seaking missiles. Also released for Dreamcast.

title: F1 2000
description: Seventeen Grand Prix circuits including Indianapolis, USA. Compete simultaneously in the full 2000 season, either as team-mates or bitter rivals. Introducing Heidfield, Mazzacane and Britain's Jenson Button. Edit the grid set-up to customise each race. The all-new Arcade mode will have you burning rubber! With exclusive commentary from Murray Walker and Martin Brundle.

title: Messiah
description: You're Bob: a small cherub (read: winged baby in diapers) sent down to Earth by the big guy upstairs to clean up what's wrong with the world. You have no weapons, and you're mortal, but you do possess one invaluable power: Possession. Using other people's bodies (not to mention the weapons they pick up), you journey through the bleak futuristic levels in an attempt to right the wrongs of the world.
rating_content: Blood, Animated Violence, Mature Sexual Themes, Strong Language

title: Gauntlet Legends
description: In GAUNTLET LEGENDS, an evil sorcerer has set the minions of the underworld free. Now, it is up to the four heroes from the corners of the realm to save the world. You take the role of a warrior, valkyrie, wizard, or archer and travel throughout the world searching for the rune stones that will return the demons to the underworld. While the action is set in 3D environments, the classic GAUNTLET gameplay remains intact. Players must travel through maze-like stages, hacking and slashing through every enemy in sight. Along the way, players can collect food to recover health and gold to purchase improved stats. There are also a huge number of power-ups that have temporary effects including fire breath, phoenix familiar, and magic potions that can be stored for later use. GAUNTLET LEGENDS continues the gameplay tradition of the arcade classic GAUNTLET.

title: ECW: Hardcore Revolution
description: Extreme Championship Wrestling -- replete with barbwire ropes and some pretty nasty-looking weapons of mass mayhem -- comes to Sega Dreamcast in the aptly titled ECW Hardcore Revolution. With 40 different wrestlers to choose from (or you can create your own), each with their own unique fighting style and stock of bloodied props, this game promises to be for wrestling fans what caffeine is for game programmers: lifeblood. Also featured are three different venues, with over 20 different types of matches, including I Quit, Gauntlet, and the ever-popular First Blood. So come on down, and beat your friend's head into virtual pulp!

title: Hydro Thunder
description: Take to the choppy seas in the blazing-fast boats of HYDRO THUNDER. A port of the highly popular arcade racer, HYDRO THUNDER will have you gaming away for hours without the need to constantly pump quarters into the console. Get behind the wheel of a dozen turbo-charged, futuristic boats and bump and glide your way to victory. Compete on 14 vividly rendered international tracks in an attempt to unlock bonus boats and tracks, grab power-ups, and find hidden shortcuts. You'll feel the wind smack your face as you marvel over the thunder boat's accurately modeled physics. Pull back on the Z-trigger for a boost of nitro-fueled speed or grab nitro balloons for a timed burst of extra power. You can also grab balloons that provide you with temporary invincibility and help you knock opponents off the track. Compete against the computer or go head-to-head with up to four friends (Expansion Pak required for three to four players) across locales like "Thunder Park," "Lost Island," "Venice Canals," a "Ship's Graveyard," and more. In the water-spraying racing of HYDRO THUNDER, the arcade is in your very own living room.
platforms: N64 DC PC PS Arcade PS2

title: Deception III: Dark Delusion
description: For some time, the country of Burganfada has supplied slave labor to the island of Alendar. So it came as no big surprise when Reina and her family were kidnapped and taken to Alendar. The big surprise came when Reina was taken before King Frederick, who immediately recognized her as someone who possessed the ability to build magic traps. Armed with this knowledge, Reina sets about trying to rescue her family. Who should Reina trust? Does everyone have ulterior motives for helping her? The answers to these questions will determine which of the multiple endings is the final result as you help Reina build over 2,000 possible traps to stop her stalkers. If you don't want to deal with the plot, play the expert mode and solve independent puzzles that use traps as pieces. Will Reina be able to save her family and keep her good nature? Play DECPTION III: Dark Delusion and find out.

title: Pokemon Stadium
description: Battle add-on to the popular Game Boy titles, based on the Japanese Pokemon Stadium 2 (Nintendo further enhanced the game by adding a gallery mode). In the game's Stadium Mode, one player competes in 80 different battles, divided into four tournaments. Beat the Stadium Mode and you're in for a bonus battle against the ultimate Pokémon warrior, Mewtwo, as well as a secret mode that gives you 80 brand-new, and devilishly tough battles. There is virtually no way you can beat the secret mode without having trained your own, elite Pokémon. One to four players compete against each other or the computer in a no-holds-barred battle with customizable rules. You can select rental Pokémon for these battles -- but that makes them much too predictable since their selection of techniques isn't determined by the trainer. You can also select quick and easy versus and random battles.

title: Polaris SnoCross
description: Get on a snowmobile and drive your way to victory with POLARIS SNOCROSS. Try to master 10 different courses that take you through ovals, twisting bobsled runs, and several treks through the wilderness. When you are ready for some competition, try to win the Tournament Cups, where you will have to take first place from two other racers. After winning, you will be able to upgrade your vehicle before moving on to the next race. With three different Cups to win, there is plenty of racing action. If you get tired of racing computer-controlled opponents, hook up a link cable to challenge your friends to a race. You will become the greatest snowmobiler of all time in POLARIS SNOCROSS.

title: NBA Showtime: NBA on NBC
description: Take on all of the action of two-on-two basketball with no rules in NBA SHOWTIME: NBA on NBC. Choose from all 29 NBA teams, featuring over 100 professional players then hit the hardwood and work on your moves in the Practice mode. When you want some competition, work your way through the Season to the Championship. If you don't want to bother with the Season, skip it, and leap right into the Playoffs. With over 30 different slam-dunk animations, you are going to see something new every time you play. If you can get a player to sink three buckets in a row, watch him light up the scoreboard while he is on fire. If you enjoy wild basketball action, you will love the action in NBA SHOWTIME: NBA on NBC.

title: Die Hard Trilogy 2: Viva Las Vegas
description: How could it happen again? It seems that New York police detective John McClane is the unluckiest man in the world. He has already had to dispose of terrorists three times; now, while McClane vacations in Las Vegas, the city comes under attack from terrorists. Once again he's got to stop the terrorists and save the city. Like the original game, DIE HARD TRILOGY 2: Viva Las Vegas has three different styles of play. Take control of McClane in a third-person adventure that has McClane disposing of terrorists and rescuing hostages. Other levels take advantage of a light gun and have the displaced detective battling terrorists and trying not to shoot innocent bystanders. The final level takes place on the streets as our hero drives from place to place trying to defuse bombs. Play DIE HARD TRILOGY 2 and help John McClane get through his Vegas "vacation."
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

title: Muppets
description: Dr. Bunsen Honeydew has developed a new time machine, so he invites all of the Muppets over to see the new invention. However, something goes awry and the Muppets are sent back in time. Fortunately, Kermit and Animal were running late and were not involved in the mishap. Now these two must travel back in time and rescue their friends. You will take control of Kermit and Animal as they travel through six different time periods that contain a total of 24 levels. Help Kermit defeat enemies with paper airplanes, and use his super jump to collect items. Animal will pound enemies into submission with drumsticks and will shake items loose with his stomp. Will the two heroes be able to save the gang? Find out by playing JIM HENSON'S MUPPETS.

title: Shadow Watch
description: Shadow Watch is a turn-based strategy game where you lead a crack team of operatives to uncover a nefarious plot to stop humanity?s advancement to the stars. Dreams of an international space station have often been destroyed by the red tape of politics. After failed attempts by Russia and the U.S., a multi-national consortium of science agencies concluded that a space station could be built efficiently with the group effort of member nations. However, they needed a multinational, neutral organization with space experience and a drive to finish the work on its own. They need a corporation. They need you. The game features eighteen campaign maps in three locations and six operatives with over seventy skills they can learn.

title: F/A 18 Super Hornet
description: The Barents Sea and the Indian Ocean are the settings for this high-fidelity flight simulation. You'll earn your stripes over the course of 40 detailed missions each with a combination of aerial and air-to-ground combat. All of the latest U.S. Air Force weaponry is onboard, and a fully active cockpit closely mirrors the real thing. You can play co-operatively with a friend, one player taking the wingman spot, the other strapping in as pilot. Get up to 24 players in on the dogfights with play over the Internet.

title: Gundam Side Story: 0079
description: After years of space wars, a huge space colony is dropped on the continent of Australia and kills countless innocent people. This leads to the signing of the Antarctic Treaty, which outlaws colony drops but doesn't stop the fighting. You are Lieutenant Rayer, the leader of the White Dingo unit, and the fate of the country is in your capable hands. Outfitted with only two giant mechs called Gundam Mobile Suits, you patrol the countryside in search of the Zeon, who pose an immediate threat to your people's existence. Equipped with 60mm Vulcan guns and either a 100mm machine gun or a rocket launcher, you'll have your hands full with the evil Zeon and their high-tech weaponry. Master the complex controls of the Gundam Mobile Suit and defend your country in the ultimate test of courage and battle skills.

title: LEGO Racers
description: Playstation has seen many racing games, though none are quite like LEGO RACERS. The game, which is inspired by the building block toys, lets players build cars from one of 12 included sets of Legos. There are 24 different tracks to race on, spanning all sorts of imaginative and exciting locations. You can go at it in four racing modes, with the Circuit mode being the most involved. This mode lets you build up points throughout the races, which opens up more tracks and competition. There is also a Time race, which allows you to race against a ghost of your previous performance. The Multiplayer mode lets two people race head-to-head in their own customized vehicles in a split-screen battle. LEGO RACERS features many unique options that possibly due solely to the Lego license make it a fresh and original title.
platforms: PS N64 PC Cell Web GBC
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older

title: Street Sk8er 2
description: Life is full of tough decisions. Too bad most of them aren't as much fun. This time, things are a little different. The first thing you need to decide when you sit down to play this smash sequel to Street Sk8er is, do you jump on your board and tackle the 11 teeth-rattling events that come ready to play in the game, including street, halfpipe, and park courses or do you take over an abandoned warehouse and design your ultimate skate park? While you're thinking it over you can go into Free-Skate mode and check out all the events and courses with no pressure. Levels include multiple paths and shortcuts, as well as windows, barrels, and other breakable objects because it wouldn't be skating unless SOMETHING got broken. You can also call a friend over and challenge him to a multiplayer Pool Duel, which offers a split-screen mode so you don't miss a bit of the action. Backing the action are tunes provided by Del the Funky Homosapien, Shootyz Groove, and Ministry that will get you in a shredding sort of mood.

title: Deer Hunter 3: The Legend Continues
description: Every day should be a hunting day, and with Deer Hunter 3, it can be. You've never had a more powerful cache of firearms or buck-bustin' hunting gear, and it's never been brought to you with such realism. Travel the expansive fields, forests, bluffs and mountains of Utah and Missouri on an individual pre-season scouting trip, or engage in a multi-player expedition with your on-line buddies. Then return for season opener on the ultimate quest for the buck of a lifetime.

title: Army Men: World War
description: Battle by land, sea, and air in this action-packed 3D war game. Instead of fighting only on the ground like you did in its predecessor, ARMY MEN: World War offers three different environments to battle in. Each environment offers its own vehicles, weapons, and strategy. This game offers many features such as calling in air strikes, dropping paratroopers, or all-out attacks, straight into the enemy lines. Weapons from the WWII-era are also used in the game to give it the old-fashioned feel. A great Multiplayer mode is also available in ARMY MEN: World War. You can either compete against friends in all-out war, or join up with them and fight cooperatively against the Tan army. Fans of the original will love this game.

title: Syphon Filter 2
description: Picking up from where the last game left off, Syphon Filter 2 starts with Lian Xing being infected with the Syphon Filter virus. Gabe Logan must find the antidote, stop the spread of the virus, and clear his name. To do all of this, Gabe will have to travel the world and face many enemies. Just like the first game, he can take out foes with quick shots to the head. But this time around Gabe can also sneak up behind someone and slash his throat. Gabe also has help with his mission, as the player will be able to take the role of Lian in several levels. If you get tired of fighting computer drones, a new Deathmatch mode lets you battle your friends. Remember, stealth will keep you alive longer than brute force in Syphon Filter 2.

title: Tread Marks
description: Tread Marks is an Off-Road Battle Tank Racing and Combat game. Unlike most off-road racing games, in Tread Marks you can actually put holes and scorch marks in the terrain, which last for as long as the race does and don't hurt performance. With a suitably powerful weapon, you can even dig yourself a new canyon, or level a significant chunk of the map!

title: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater
description: Ported by Edge of Reality, N64 owners received arguably the best version of the breakthrough skateboarding game. With the exception of a few minor features (video walls etc.) everything that made Tony Hawk so fun made it to the N64 game. The biggest difference is that it looks better. No jumpy, pixelated skaters this time around. The N64 game features smooth, crisp riders rolling and sliding around sharp environments with only the occasional dip in framerate. The c-buttons are a bit tougher on the fingers when you try some higher level tricks and combos, but that's all part of a days job for a hardcore gamer.

title: Hot Shots Golf 2
description: Put on some plaid pants and head out to the course in Hot Shots Golf 2. You can learn everything about the game of golf and how it is played in the Tutorial mode. Once you master the nuances of the game, head out to the links and play a nine holes on a par-three course. If you have friends, challenge them to a four-player stroke play round or a two-player match play game. There are also two single-player modes: Tournament and Versus. If you're up to the challenge, see if you can beat a grid of computer-controlled opponents in the Tournament to unlock new courses. You can also play the Versus mode to unlock new characters. No matter the mode, understanding the unique style of every character is essential to performing well. Hot Shots Golf 2 makes the sport of golf accessible for everyone, without requiring plaid pants.
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older

title: Ace Combat 3: Electrosphere
description: The ACE COMBAT series has taken a giant leap forward with the addition of ACE COMBAT 3. Offering 22 flyable aircraft from the F-16XF Gyrfalcon to the UI-4054 Aurora there is something for everyone. You'll get 36 intense missions that offer all sorts of fighting including air-to-air, air-to-ground, and air-to-sea; or you can even battle it out in the stratosphere. An innovative addition to the third incarnation of the series is the 3D Virtual Cockpit. It allows you to look in all directions during play, so all you have to do is get your enemy in sight and stay with him. Most importantly, it gives you access to dogfights galore, which are by far one of the best parts of any flying game. So hop into the cockpit and take this one for a spin.

title: Star Wars: Episode I: Jedi Power Battles
description: The STAR WARS EPISODE I universe comes to the PlayStation with STAR WARS EPISODE I: Jedi Power Battles. The game loosely follows the plot of the movie, and allows you to control one of five Jedi masters: Qui-Gon Jinn, Obi-Wan Kenobi, Mace Windu, Plo Koon, and Adi Gallia. Each Jedi has unique abilities, combinations, and force powers, and understanding the relative strengths and weaknesses of each character is essential for success as you battle through 10 levels that culminate in a duel with the evil Darth Maul. Should the forces of the Trade Federation keep winning, have a friend help you take up the battle with the two-player Cooperative mode. Anyone who loved the movie and wants to see more Jedi action will enjoy STAR WARS EPISODE I: Jedi Power Battles.

title: Codename Eagle
description: What if the October Revolution hadn't happened? What if the Tsar's son, Peter, took upon himself to change Russia into a war machine and start World War I? It would take someone to stop him, that's for certain. And that is going to be you, as Red, one of the best operatives of the secret organization Shadow Command. In the course of the 12 missions, you will discover the Tsar's true plans and Red's origins while you assassinate key personnel, bomb-run from a triplane, and demolish the Russian war machine from within.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

title: Rayman
description: The console hit RAYMAN has come to the Game Boy Color. Mr. Dark has captured all of the Toons, and destruction and chaos threaten the world. The only person who can reverse the situation is Rayman. He must travel through 30 levels that span nine different and unique worlds. Luckily, our hero can run, jump, punch, and helicopter his way through each level. There are enemies to defeat and power-ups to be gained the most useful being the Tings, which provide Rayman with clues and extra lives. More ambitious players will want to go through every stage several times, as there are objects that cannot be reached until Rayman has learned certain skills by progressing through the game. Anyone who enjoys RAYMAN on other platforms will certainly appreciate the Game Boy Color version.
platforms: GBC PC DSi PSP Wii U Cell PS Jaguar GBA PS3 Giz Saturn

title: Star Wars: Episode I: Racer
description: Imagine Ben Hur in a galaxy far, far away. Replace the two-wheeled carriage with a futuristic, hovering pod -- now take away the horses and strap two giant afterburner-powered engines to the vehicle. The boost of the two fuselages pulls the carriage forward at speeds in excess of 600mph and a stream of pure energy, called a mag beam or coupler, makes sure that the engines don't fly off in opposite directions. Like its "real," up to 40-foot-long counterparts in the movie, Racer's pods use a three-point dynamics system that will cause the carriage to realistically drift in the air behind its two engines. Unlike the movie, which features 18 opposing racers, Episode I Racer stars more than 21 characters complete with their rides, including three pods based on original design concepts that weren't used in the final film.
platforms: DC GBC Mac PS N64 PC

title: Time Stalkers
description: The game is TIME STALKERS and you are Sword, a young hero magically whisked away from the security of his home. You find yourself on a dangerous quest to unite with other unlikely heroes, right all that is wrong, and return to your own land once again. There's plenty of hack and slash, role-playing combat, and exploration to be had and with randomized dungeons there's always new territory to fight and forage through. Just be careful, because you can only carry four valuable items at a time as you delve into the dank and foreboding underground lairs. Sword's war party grows as he journeys with the addition of stout allies and cash rewards are given if enough vicious monsters are slain. Not sure just how a creature is feeling towards you? A unique beast meter clues you in on how aggressive the monster is. Master a number of spells like Capture (which forces enemies to fight for you), Clairvoyance, and the as powerful as it sounds-Armageddon. TIME STALKERS is an intriguing, role-playing fantasy filled with magic, mayhem, and blade-swinging combat.
rating_content: Mild Animated Violence, Mild Language, Suggestive Themes

title: Galerians
description: Galerians is a 3D action adventure game that challenges you on what you're capable of doing with psychic powers. You play as a young man by the name of Rion, who must decide on what he can do with his powers. Changes are he may ignite his enemies into a blazing fire, or lash out with a bolt of kinetic mental energy or possibly helping locate hidden items.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

title: Mission: Impossible
