description: The rogue leader General Reznick has threatened to attack the United States with an arsenal of nuclear weapons. In addition, he has kidnapped several UN weapons inspectors. Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to take control of Ethan Hunt, infiltrate General Reznick's base, rescue the weapons inspectors, and destroy the nuclear arsenal. This may sound impossible, but Hunt has a number of resources available to him including keys, guns, cameras, and a grappling hook. But, Ethan's greatest weapon is stealth. By staying out of sight and not killing the guards, Ethan can earn stealth points that can be translated into additional lives. Will Ethan be able to survive 10 terrorist-filled levels? Only if he uses all of his skills in MISSION: Impossible.

title: Y2K [2000]
description: When gothic writer, Aleister Dharke, rebuilt the Dharke Manor in 1920, he had no idea that the Dharke Corporation would eventually use the facility to test robotic servants and create automatic home management devices. When the company went bust in the 1990s, the house went up on the auction block. That's where you come in: You're Buster Everman, the lucky state lottery winner who's just bought himself a big, old house. You decide to spend your first night in the mansion on New Year's Eve, 1999. There's only one little problem: The house isn't Y2K-compliant! Now, the various devices the corporation has created are going haywire, and your only hope is to escape before it's too late.

title: Hello Kitty's Cube Frenzy
description: Hello Kitty comes to the Game Boy Color with HELLO KITTY'S CUBE FRENZY. The objective of each stage is simple: Kitty must collect all of the items scattered throughout each level. However, you can only tell Kitty to move left or right, and if you are not careful, Kitty will fall off the edge and say hello to the grim reaper. Luckily, blocks fall from the sky, which can be rotated and used to create staircases and bridges to the objects. However, placing three blocks with identical colors next to each other will make them disappear; this can both help and hurt. In addition to the block problems, Badz Maru, Hanamaru, and Pandaba will wander around and cause problems for Hello Kitty. Can you handle the pressure and collect all of the items in HELLO KITTY'S CUBE FRENZY?

title: Pro Darts
description: PRO DARTS brings the greatest of all British pub games to the Game Boy Color. You can play as eight different characters (two have to be unlocked), each with unique ratings in strength, nerve, and accuracy. Once you have selected your character, use the Practice mode to learn the rules of the six different games Cricket, 301, 301 Double Out, Around the World, 501, and 501 Double Out. When you are ready for some competition, you can challenge the computer to a game on three different difficulty settings. If your friends want to get in on some of the action, you can challenge them to a game without having to use a link cable. No matter how you play, you must aim the dart and use a power meter to send it flying. Play PRO DARTS, and get all of the darts action you could ever want.

title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six
description: Terrorists are out to destroy the world. You, as part of an antiterrorist group, must lead an elite group of commandos code-named Rainbow. To carry out your missions, you must choose a team from among the members of Rainbow each has unique skills that may or may not be useful on any given assignment. Once you have assembled a team, you must determine a plan of attack, including what weapons and gear are required to execute the plan. Will making a head-on assault work, or should you use subtler tactics? The choice is yours. Once you're prepared, you must try to execute your part of it, while the other members of the team controlled by the computer execute theirs. Work you way through 14 missions to stop terrorism in RAINBOW SIX.
platforms: GBC PC N64 PS DC Mac PS3 PSP PC

title: Beetle Buggin'
description: Beetle Buggin' is a fast and furious autocross race game that allows you to drive one of 17 legendary models and choose from more than 50 uniquely detailed cars. Put your foot down while the clock is ticking, the car can jump of over 100 yards. The object of the game is to have fun in a wide range of totally different environments and with the best technology available. There's 5 different challenges you have to choose from: Speed, Jump, Cross, Buggy and Monster. Each challenge takes place in an original environment and in different conditions such as day/night and rain/sun.
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older

title: Tzar: The Burden of the Crown
description: Tzar is a fantasy-medieval real-time strategy game with a touch of RPG. You play one of three distinct races, European, Asian or Arabian. Your civilization and your economy will depend on your ability to harvest four different resources, master two different trade methods and defend your kingdom with powerful and unique warriors. Expect to conquer territory fighting with - or against - Ninjas and Samurais, Stone Golems, Ogres and Dwarven Axe throwers, flying units like Dragons, Flying Carpets and Bats as well as a host of powerful ships like Pinques, Hulks and Galleons.

title: NHL Blades of Steel 2000
description: Based on the 1988 NES game, BLADES OF STEEL, this update delivers detailed hockey physics combined with brilliant, arcade-style animation. You can play any way you'd like, as there are five difficulty levels, five game speeds, adjustable controls, and plenty of other options. Not only does BLADES OF STEEL 2000 include all NHL players and teams, it also has the most complete set of fighting options you'll find this side of a boxing game: you have the choice of several different punch types, and it's even possible to land body shots and tackle your opponent. You can play an entire season, a single game, or jump right into the Stanley Cup Playoffs as you slash and check your way to hard-fought victory. As a GM, you can trade, sign, drop, or create your own players, and the rosters are very easy to manage. Each NHL athlete is graded based on skating, shooting, stick handling, spirit, fighting, and stamina so you know these guys are going to be realistic. Randy Hahn, the voice of the San Jose Sharks, provides in-depth commentary, and the PA announcer sounds uncannily authentic. If realistic hockey and smooth play are your idea of quality craftsmanship, this is your game.

title: Walt Disney World Quest: Magical Racing Tour
description: Everyone knows that beautiful fireworks displays illuminate the skies over the Walt Disney World Resort. But did you know that it's all run by an enormous, amazing contraption - the Fireworks Machine. But those inquisitive chipmunks, Chip 'n Dale, have accidentally caused the machine to explode -- if they don't put the machine back together before the end of the day, there won't be any fireworks shows!Chip's idea is to race around Walt Disney World Resort and collect all the pieces of the Fireworks Machine. If they get some friends to help too, they could find all the parts and put the machine back together in no time! You'll be speeding around 13 raceways based on popular Walt Disney World Theme Parks and Water Parks, including famous attractions like Space Mountain, Pirates of the Caribbean, Rock 'n' Roller Coaster, and The Jungle Cruise!

title: Alundra 2
description: In the Kingdom of Varuna an evil Baron, with the help of a dark sorcerer and a legion of pirates, has overthrown and imprisoned the king. You are Flint, a renegade swordsman on a quest to free the kingdom from the Baron's sinister rule. Through a land of hidden danger, you wield your sword, navigating an immense story fraught with bizarre characters, brain-twisting puzzles, and wild games. But beware, an even greater evil is about to be revealed. The storyline alone, is enough of a reason to buy this game. But if you want more reasons, there are plenty of them crisp graphics, innovative gameplay, and superb music are just a few of them. The battle system remains mostly the same from the first Alundra, retaining the real-time battle system. The puzzles are also much like the original, some being very easy and others much more difficult. If you were a fan of the original Alundra, or if you're an Adventure or RPG fan, then this is the game for you.

title: Star Trek: Armada
description: Star Trek: Armada is a 3D real-time strategy game set in the Star Trek Universe. Lead four distinct races such as the Federation, Klingon, Romulan, and Borg. Build over 30 types of starships, including battleships, cruisers, destroyers, scout ships, cargo ships, transport ships and construction ships. Arm your fleet with a multitude of weapons, from Phasers to Photon Torpedoes, and build research stations to develop specialized weapons.

title: Custom Robo
description: Custom Robo is sort of a sci-fi action take on Nintendo's own collect-and-battle style Pokemon titles. In the game's story mode, you slip into the role of a young boy who has just built his very own toy robot who goes by the name of Lei. Together with your cousin, you head down towards Robo Station to take part in a giant Custom Robo battle championship that takes place in the local Holosseum. The ultimate goal is to improve your skills so that you can defeat the champion Custom Robo builder of them all, Mamoru. Gameplay involves robo customization and frantic action battles in confined 3D arenas. Followed by a sequel.

title: Army Men: Air Tactics
description: Air Tactics is reminiscent of the old Desert and Jungle Strike games: fly around and shoot anything that moves, and hit a few key objects while you're at it. Air Tactics, of course, doesn't take place in deserts or jungles, but instead in real-world settings scaled down to the size of your little green men. 3DO captured the feel for this rather well. One mission has you flying through a bathroom, complete with a fortified empty tissue box as an anti-aircraft bunker, a tub filled with boats, and even a rubber ducky on the floor.

title: Last Call
description: There's a party going on in here, and you're the bartender! All of the action takes place in a hip New York bar, where the clientele just want to drink and you've got to help them. Learn how to mix more than 100 different drinks ranging from the simple to the absurdly fancy. Make sure to check I.D. cards, keep the customers from getting too drunk, and maintain a constant flow of music. (You wouldn't want folks to start getting bored, would you?) The goal is to earn tips, but that won't be so easy with 20 of the city's fussiest at your bar.
rating_content: Mature Sexual Themes, Strong Language, Use of Alcohol and Tobacco

title: Majesty: The Fantasy Kingdom
description: Majesty is a unique sim putting you in the crushed velvet hot seat of your own kingdom. With an epic quest before you, you make the decisions of where to build your settlement's guilds and temples. From these you recruit a varied cast of larger-than-life heroes. Each one has a mind of his own and must be enticed to meet your goals, via rewards you offer and spells you cast. Meanwhile you must make sure that your treasury stays flush with cash to support these and other outlays necessary to maintain a thriving medieval town. The fact that you are being barraged by attacks from mythical beasts and fantastic creatures doesn't make your job any easier.

title: Battlezone: Rise of the Black Dogs
description: BATTLEZONE: Rise of the Black Dogs is a pulse-pounding action game that straps you into a towering Mech battle unit that's been loaded with enough firepower to sink a dozen aircraft carriers. The player then gets to decide on a course of action, either signing onto a massive battle campaign that will require all sorts of intricate field maneuvers and resource management to achieve the goal, or jumping with guns blazing into a down and dirty, gear-gnashing deathmatch battle where everything that moves has to be considered an enemy and blasted into free-floating atoms before it does the same to you. The three basic modes of play in BATTLEZONE: Rise of the Black Dogs are Arcade, Pilot, and Commander. Arcade is perfect if you don't have the time to plan your battles and only want to worry about yourself. The mission-based Pilot mode provides a good example of broadening gameplay by adding objective-based missions to the game. This game offers something for everyone including a unique Racing mode wherein contestants pick up their heels and hoof it, circling nav points on the track, all the while keeping an eye out for the competition.

title: Soldier of Fortune
description: Soldier of Fortune is a first-person action shooter title from Raven Software. You play a soldier-for-hire who must travel to some of the world's most dangerous political hotspots in order to carry out your task. Take part in over 30 missions with tasks such as locating nukes on a speeding freight train to searching out an Iraqi oil refinery. You'll be utilizing the world's most lethal weaponry, including a sniper rifle, white phosphorous grenades, and prototype microwave pulse guns. With realistic body damage, interactive 3D environments, and the Quake II engine with new GHOUL technology to back it up Soldier of Fortune is placing you into a realistic world filled with violence.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

title: NASCAR 2000
description: Ever wish you could compete against Jeff Gordon, Dale Earnhardt, Terry Labonte and other top NASCAR drivers in a race? 26 of your favorite drivers are here to race against and even even choose to be in this NASCAR racing game.Pick the type of tires you want, change your gear ratios, adjust the air dam, and more. When you think you're ready to go, head out for three qualifying laps which will determine your starting place for the main event. Don't skip it or you'll wind up starting out at the back of the pack. Once the race is under way on one of 12 custom-designed courses, you can cycle through the views outside your car and decide when to come in for a pit stop. You can race anywhere from three to 24 laps against 10 to 26 cars. When the race is over you can try again or get ready for the next track.

title: Need for Speed: Porsche Unleashed
description: True to the award-winning Need for Speed heritage, the latest in the series delivers the next level of mind-numbing open road racing experiences with an extensive collection of cars from the 50-year history of the most storied performance car manufacturer in the world: Porsche. Push every boundary to unleash the potential of these incredible vehicles while weaving through traffic, against fierce competition and escaping the police to ultimately discover your own limits.

title: Jackie Chan's Stuntmaster
description: Radical's fighting game, released by Midway in the US and Sony in Europe.

title: Plasma Sword: Nightmare of Bilstein
description: The fall of the Fourth Empire and death of Bilstein were momentous occasions when they happened last year, but still not all is will in the galaxy. Rumors have begun to circulate about the appearance of Bilstein's ghost haunting the planet Zeta, and that's extremely inconvenient for the citizens. You'll choose from 22 unique characters to take through this grand quest, which includes Arcade, Versus, Group Battle, and Training modes. With its emphasis placed squarely on combat, PLASMA SWORD: Nightmare of Bilstein allows you to build up plasma as you, attack resulting in a complex and realistic fighting system that accounts for energy drain, loss of strength, and adrenaline. You'll do your fair share of punching and kicking your way through this adventure, but special weapons and power-ups will help as well. A follow-up to the popular STAR GLADIATOR, this installment provides an in-depth gaming experience for sci-fi fans and gamers alike.

title: Carmageddon
description: CARMAGEDDON brings all the carnage of the PC and Nintendo 64 action-racing games to the Game Boy Color. You play as one of the last survivors of a horrible disaster that has turned an entire city into zombies. Now you've got to take to the streets in a deadly race with other survivors. Use your weapons and driving skills to decimate your opponents and the zombified pedestrians that walk the streets. You'll find more than 30 different tracks of mayhem in four different areas, giving you plenty of replay value. Earn enough points and you'll upgrade your road machine to something with a bit more destructive power, and there are 18 different machines available for your use. Colorful graphics represent all the vehicular mayhem with speed and style, and a password function saves your progress through the game. CARMAGEDDON is for Game Boy Color only.
platforms: GBC PC Mac iPhone Giz Android PS

title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
description: Based on the Japanese comic book of the same name, JoJo's Bizarre Adventure follows the adventures of Jotaro Josuke and his friends as they travel the Far East in search of Jotaro's mother. Key to the action is the relationship between each character and their psychic partners, known as a Stand. The Stands are used to enhance each characters attributes and powers. Choose from 18 characters each with a unique Stand and battle your way to finding Jotaro's mother. In addition to the standard punch and kick attacks, every player can call upon their Stand to block or attack. But if the Stand takes damage, so does the character, and if the Stand's life meter falls to zero, the character becomes stunned and is vulnerable to attack. If you are a fan of the comic book or are looking for a different kind of fighting game, run out and get JoJo's Bizarre Adventure.
platforms: PS Arcade DC PS3 DC Xbox 360

title: BattleTanx
description: BATTLETANX is a wild tank-based shoot-‘em-up for Game Boy Color. This one-player top-down shooter takes place in a post-apocalyptic world, where humanity is on the verge of extinction thanks to a virus that eliminated most of the female population. Huge gangs now rule the world with force and intolerance. Play as a lone soldier who sets out to save the world from these marauding misfits. Throughout the game you'll use three different tanks, each with its own capabilities. Collect power-ups to get even more bang for your buck. BATTLETANX has 15 levels based in five different American cities: Washington, San Francisco, Las Vegas, New York, and Los Angeles. Each of the locales is represented with a beautiful palette of colors that depict the explosive action in bright, vibrant tones. Save your progress through the missions with a password save function.

title: Need for Speed: Porsche Unleashed
description: True to the award-winning Need for Speed heritage, the latest in the series delivers the next level of mind-numbing open road racing experiences with an extensive collection of cars from the 50-year history of the most storied performance car manufacturer in the world: Porsche. Push every boundary to unleash the potential of these incredible vehicles while weaving through traffic, against fierce competition, and escaping the police to ultimately discover your own limits.

title: Microsoft Baseball 2001
description: Microsoft ups the ante this year with their latest baseball title, which includes new stadiums, updated player rosters, much-improved graphics, and Baseball Mogul(tm) Technology. Play through a game, season, or even manage careers over multiple seasons -- Microsoft Baseball 2001 lets you do it all.
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older

title: Striker Pro 2000
description: If soccer is your sport of choice (or even if it's not), you're sure to get a kick out of the super-realistic international action of STRIKER PRO 2000. Choose your squad from a list of more than 130 international teams, and then customize your guys right down to their names and sock colors. You'll try to score by utilizing an unprecedented vault of maneuvers including bicycle kicks, sliding shots, diving headers, and full tackles. The physics closely mimic those of real soccer, with player animations taken straight from the sport itself. Check out the nine cool modes of play, including: Knockout, Super Trophy, and the epic International Cup. Cool music and sound effects add to the overall experience, and games can be customized to play out any way you'd like. A massive 28-page instruction manual will take you through all the ins and outs of this dedicated soccer simulation.

title: Resident Evil -- CODE: Veronica
description: Side chapter in the popular Resident Evil/BioHazard third-person survival horror series. After narrowly surviving the horrific onslaught in Raccoon City, RE2's Claire Redfield now seeks clues in search of her missing brother, Chris. To her horror, she discovers Umbrella Corporation's insidious activities are not isolated to the remote, mid-western city. No. Something much larger is going on here. Flesh-eating zombies and horrific beasts haunt Claire's every move. Just how far does this twisted conspiracy extend? What is Umbrella Corporation really up to? And who is behind this bio-tech terror? The game introduced moving camera angles to the series. Later ported to PS2 and GameCube.
platforms: DC GCN PS3 PS3 PS4 Xbox 360 PS2 DC

title: Risk II
description: The year is 1812. Napoleon's army is on the march, and it's every empire for itself. As "Supreme Commander," you'll seize territories, crush your enemies, and betray your allies in a fast-paced, ruthless quest for world domination. Play the Classic Game under the familiar rules, trading cards for armies and rolling the dice to outdo your opponent. Play the Simultaneous-Turn option for a whole new Risk experience that includes I-COM communication and negotiation features, territory depth enhancements and territory bidding. Risk II is the ultimate form of this game of world domination that people of all ages have enjoyed for forty years!

title: MDK2
description: The sequel to the Shiny-created action game puts players in control of Kurt Hectic, everyone's favorite bionic dog, Max, as well as the eccentric Dr. Hawkins through the game's spacious areas in an effort to stop the incoming horde of invaders. Each character will feature their own set of special abilities. For example, Kurt has his trademark "ribbon chute" which lets him fly, glide, and jump, as well as new additions to his super suit like cloaking and chameleon powers. Max brings the house with four-armed fury as he uses his considerable firepower in combination with his handy-dandy jet-pack to cause some serious damage. Finally, Doc is busy combining whatever he can find to make the latest and greatest weapons and items.

title: Bassmasters 2000
description: BASSMASTERS 2000 offers competitive game play with levels of depth never before seen in fishing simulations. You can even create your own angler, patterned after yourself, or customize male or female anglers of any age. The Lure Cam gives you a sense of what goes on beneath the murky waters and the different play modes provide for a unique fishing experience. Relax and take in the wildlife in Exhibition mode, go for the money in Tournament mode, or play with a friend in Two-Player mode. Wherever you're fishing, you can use real equipment from the top manufacturers. And there's no need to get frustrated if it's a quiet day on the water; nine-time B.A.S.S Angler of the Year Roland Martin will give you the advice you need to reel them in. Angling veteran, Shaw Grigsby is also onboard with color commentary for your biggest catches and losses. Wake up early and get to the lake with BASSMASTERS 2000!

title: All-Star Baseball 2001
description: Acclaim?s All-Star Baseball series on the Nintendo 64 has turned out to be the leader of all baseball titles on the N64. Just like most sequels the All-Star series looked for a few more features to add to an already good game. This year, Acclaim hasn?t disappointed. New features include: Arcade batting and pitching becomes much less complicated. Just pitch and hit. Batting practice mode gives gamers a way to get used to the complicated simulation batting controls.

title: Mobil 1 Rally Championship
description: Mobil 1 Rally Championship offers fans of rally racing a variety of options. For some quick fun there's the Arcade mode, which doesn't require too much of a time commitment. There's also a Championship series, a set of Time Trials, and a Two-Player mode. In Championship mode, the cars are divided into four categories, and you set off on a total of six tournaments set throughout the British Isles. Each rally is made up of six races each having very different track and environmental conditions. With a total of 48 races, there's more than enough variety.

title: Command & Conquer: Tiberian Sun -- Firestorm
description: Add-on pack for Tiberian Sun. It offers single-player campaign and multi-player modes (via LAN and Net). The pack includes seven new unit types and modified versions of others that appeared in the main game. New units include mobile war factories (on the side of the GDI), stealth generators (NOD) and new attacking units, the Cyborg Reaper (NOD), Juggernaut (GDI) and Limpet Drone (both sides).
rating_content: Mild Language, Realistic Blood, Realistic Violence

title: Jeremy McGrath Supercross 2000
description: Professional supercross racing comes to the Game Boy Color with JEREMY MCGRATH SUPERCROSS 2000. You can race with or against professional motocross riders like Jeremy McGrath, Travis Pastrana, Kevin Windham, Sebastian Tortelli, Jimmy Button, John Dowd, and Greg Albertyn. When you have selected the proper rider, you can race on any track in the Arcade mode. For a bigger challenge, work your way through the ranks to become champion in the 80cc, 125cc, and 150cc Seasons. In all of the races, you can gain an advantage by performing stunts to make power-ups appear, which you can collect to give you an advantage. Do you have what it takes to beat McGrath and the other professionals in JEREMY MCGRATH SUPERCROSS 2000?

title: Pokemon Trading Card Game
description: Your goal in life is to become a Pokemon Card Master. In order to do that, you must pick a deck from three starter packs of cards based on Charmander, Squirtle, and Bulbasaur and travel to the eight card clubs and defeat their leaders. Along the way, you will challenge many players to collect new cards and the helpful Professor Mason will aid you by giving you cards as well. While becoming a card master is a laudable accomplishment, the real goal of the game is to collect all of the cards over 200 in all. If you want to collect all of the cards, you must play human opponents in the Pop mode to get a chance to earn rare cards. All of the complexity of the real-world game has been captured here. Play Pokemon Trading Card Game and become a Pokemon Card Master.

title: Motocross Madness 2
description: Motocross Madness 2 is the sequel to the very popular motocross racing game of the same name. It adds more tracks, more gameplay modes, more bikes, and the ability to customize almost anything about your rider or bike. The game lets you take control of the handlebars of a motocross racing bike as you compete in events like races, trick competitions, and Baja racing.

title: Bomberman Max -- Red: Challenger
description: In Bomberman Max, your task is to jump through five zones with a dozen levels each. At the beginning of the round, you're given your quota to meet -- in some levels, you'll have to destroy all the enemies. In another, wipe out all the blocks in the land. In another, rescue the level's Charabomb. And in others, simply make your way to the target square in the set amount of time. But it won't be easy, since many enemies just don't stay still for you to walk up and plant a bomb next to them. It's all in the strategy of bomb-placement. Plus, once a level's complete, you'll have to pick the proper exit that appears. Released in two versions, Blue and Red.

title: Dinosaur
description: Travel back to prehistoric times, with Disney's DINOSAUR for the Game Boy Color. Loosely based on the computer-animated feature film, players will have to guide Aladar the Iguanadon, Zini the Lemur, and Flia the Pteranodon through 12 different levels, using each of their unique abilities to overcome obstacles and defeat enemies. Aladar's strength and brute force are great assets, but there are times when the smaller, quicker Zini will need to take over. Neither of them will do you any good if a situation calls for the ability to fly, though so it's a good thing Flia is with you on this adventure. Learning to use each of these characters to overcome obstacles is the key to avoiding extinction! With video taken directly from the film and an encyclopedia covering all the creatures in the game, Disney's DINOSAUR will immerse players in a world that existed millions of years ago.

The fast and frenetic action of one of the most popular arcade shooters of all time is back on Game Boy Color. 1942 packs in all of the fun of the classic WWII shoot-‘em-up, with its colorful graphics and gameplay intact. You are a pilot during the war whose mission is simple: destroy all the enemy planes in over 30 stages of machine gun mayhem while trying to keep yourself alive. When the going gets tough, use your barrel-roll maneuver to get out of harm's way for a few seconds. Decimate the enemy and collect power-ups that give you an increased rate of fire, a wider shot, or even up to two fellow fighters who will protect you from danger while giving you some cover fire to boot. Play in Single-Player mode or alternate with a friend to see who can get the highest score. 1942 is an intense blast-fest that challenges your reflexes and your skills!
platforms: GBC PC PS Wii CPC ZX C64 NES Arcade iPhone Cell

title: Grind Session
description: Get ready to ride the rails and ollie over fences in GRIND SESSION. You can choose from six professional skaters: Willy Santos, Daewon Song, Cara-Beth Burnside, Ed Templeton, Pigpen, and John Cardiel. If you don't find a skater that fits your style, you can create you own skater. After getting the boarder you want, go out and earn some respect in the games eight stages, which include some parks in the Van's Triple Crown of Skateboarding. Each level has a number of objectives that earn you respect points after they are completed. With respect, new levels open up including several competitions, which are broken down into street, vert, and best trick events. If your friends want to challenge you, take them on in a number of different two-player games. The excitement of skateboarding makes on the PlayStation with GRIND SESSION.

title: Toobin'
description: Race down a river in an inner tube in the arcade classic TOOBIN' on the Game Boy Color. Your only goal is to beat the opposition to the finish line, but there are a large number of obstacles in the way including sharp rocks, crabs, and gun-toting hillbillies. Fortunately, there are several power-ups scattered throughout the game to help. For example, soda cans are weapons that can be hurled at obstacles to destroy them, patches allow you to recover from collisions, and beach balls grant invulnerability. Figuring out when to use these items is part of the challenge, as you race down 27 different rivers of varying difficulty. Fans of the arcade classic have something to cheer about, now that TOOBIN' can be in the palm of their hand.
platforms: GBC Arcade PC ST ZX CPC Amiga C64

title: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater
description: Skate as the legendary Tony Hawk, or as one of nine other top pros. Work your way up the ranks by landing suicidal tricks in brutal competitions to become the best skater on the circuit. It's time to go pro. Pull off hundreds of motion-captured move combos on the fly with super-smooth controls. Nail insane airs, grabs, slides, grinds, kick-flips and landing tricks.

title: Millennium Winter Sports
description: MILLENNIUM WINTER SPORTS allows you to experience the thrill of victory and the agony of defeat in eight winter sports. Try to get through the course as fast a possible in the bobsled; out-skate your opponent to the finish line in speed skating; see who can jump the farthest in two separate ski-jumping events; see if you can pull off twists and flips while flying through the air in the aerials competition; strap on the skis and navigate the downhill course; or strap on a snowboard to navigate the giant slalom course. For the ultimate in snowboarding action, try to impress the judges with your performance on the halfpipe. Practice any of the events in the Challenge mode or try to become the best winter athlete in the world with the Championship mode. All of the action of winter sports can be yours with MILLENNIUM WINTER SPORTS.

title: Grand Theft Auto II
description: Police sirens wail and cars explode in the gang-infested, smash-and-crash mayhem of GRAND THEFT AUTO 2 from Rockstar Games. Six treacherous gangs control the city, and your role is to ally yourself with one of them and gain their respect by carrying out dangerous missions. You'll engage in heists, bombings, assassinations, and contraband deliveries and the better you do, the more points you rack up. The more points you gain, the angrier rival gangs become towards you and the more police (and eventually even the military) will try to stop you. Join up with the devious Yakuza, Rednecks, Hari Krishnas, Russians, SRS or Loonies in heavy shooting, racing, and rioting action. You can watch the mayhem unfold as you blitz across the gigantic city maps performing dastardly deeds and outwitting the cops and FBI. A throbbing Drum and Bass soundtrack keeps you pumped up while you're mowing down victims with pistols, shotguns, Molotov cocktails, grenades and more. GRAND THEFT AUTO 2 for the Dreamcast is street shooting, hard-driving gameplay for hoods of all ages.

title: Harvest Moon GBC
description: You have inherited the family ranch from an ancestor. With only a shed of rusted tools and a small amount of money, you must prove yourself worthy of owning the ranch by returning it to its former glory. To do this, you must till the soil and cultivate vegetables. When you have earned enough money, you can add chickens and livestock to help increase your profits. While you work, you will receive visits from the local townsfolk, who will ask for your help. You should always help them as much as possible, because they will be willing to return the favor later. Once you have built your ranch to a significant level, you can trade it with other farm masters via link cable. Try to restore the family ranch in HARVEST MOON.

title: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? Second Edition
description: In Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?, try to win a fastest-finger question against your friends and get into the hot seat. While you're facing Regis, try to answer 15 questions that increase in value. You will also get all of the lifelines from the television show. Will you be able to make it to the $1,000,000 question? Is that your final answer?

title: Test Drive Le Mans
description: The world of GT Endurance racing comes to the PlayStation with TEST DIVE LE MANS. All of the cars, tracks, and drivers from the endurance circuit are included. For some quick action, pick a car and head out to the track in the Arcade mode. The Challenge mode places a series of obstacles in front of you, and if you complete them and new tracks become available. If you can beat the record in the Time Attack mode, new cars are unlocked. But the ultimate challenge lies in the Championship mode, where you choose from three classes of vehicle GT1, GT2, or Prototype and race on all of the courses in the endurance circuit that culminates with the 24 hours at Le Mans. Are you tough enough to drive for 24 hours straight? Now you can find out with TEST DRIVE LE MANS.

title: Armorines: Project S.W.A.R.M
description: ARMORINES: Project S.W.A.R.M. is chalk full of gameplay. Dozens of unique enemies that think for themselves make the game very difficult. The AI script is quite incredible, as the enemies seem to be very smart. Possibly one of the best options of the game is the Co-op mode, which allows you and a friend to take on the bugs and attempt to save the world together. The environments are also quite amazing; you'll lead your character through sandstorms, snow, rainforests, volcanic eruptions, and even outer space. The backgrounds that go along with each situation are also rather breathtaking. The unique weaponry has a lot to do with the great gameplay as well. Your arsenal can become pretty stacked as you gather guns in this sci-fi shooter. But what makes this game stand out is its multiplayer capability. With up to four people battling it out, ARMORINES: Project S.W.A.R.M. won't get old any time soon. All you action fans who are looking for a game to pass the time, do yourself a favor and pick up this one.

title: Medievil II
description: Medievil 2 takes place hundreds of years after Medievil, and finds Dan in the Victorian-era London. The evil Lord Palethorn has begun assembling an undead army in order to take over the world. You, as Dan, have decided to bring it on yourself to save the world from Lord Palethorn. You won't be all alone however, as you have friends in the form of a mad professor, a female Egyptian mummy, and a friendly ghost, all of which will provide you with help throughout the game. Your arsenal ranges from swords to muskets, and if you defeat enough enemies on each level, you'll unlock its Chalice of Souls. This is where you can acquire special items that will make your job much easier. An interesting wrinkle in the sequel is that you can now play as Sir Dan's disembodied head, which allows you access to areas that you might not be able to access as big Dan. Gameplay is a mixture of platform-jumping, puzzle-solving and good old-hack and-slash action.

title: NBA In the Zone 2000
description: The thrills and challenges of the NBA come to the Game Boy Color in NBA IN THE ZONE 2000. Select your squad from among all 29 NBA teams, and then play an Exhibition game. When you are ready for some prolonged competition, try to become the NBA champion by going through the ups and downs of the rigorous NBA Season. If you want to be the champion without the hassle of the season, skip straight to the Playoffs. When you don't have enough time for a full basketball game, you can play the 3-point Shootout mini-game. And if your friends think they have better hoops skills, make them prove it with the Two-Player link-cable mode. Try to make a windmill dunk and keep the opposition on edge in NBA IN THE ZONE 2000.

title: Starlancer
description: Starlancer is a space combat simulation that combines the action of first-person space combat with the drama and intrigue of a classic air combat movie. Countries from around the world including the United States, China, Russia and Great Britain have formed strategic alliances and now battle for control of Earth, Mars and other planets across the solar system. As part of a newly formed, ragtag aviation unit, the 45th Volunteers Squadron, players must prove themselves and earn the respect of their peers.

title: Maken X
description: Welcome to the world of MAKEN X, the world's first game that can be called a first-person hacker. Imagine a combination of a 3D fighter and a first-person shooter, and you'll get the idea. An experimental medical instrument called Maken has been discovered, which can extract the material of the human spirit. You play Kay Sagami, who's been taken over by the Maken. On a quest to discover the hidden potential of Maken, you must fight your way through the Blademasters, skilled fighters whose sole purpose is to protect world order. As you defeat enemies, you can "brainjack" them, inhabit their bodies acquiring their special powers and weapons. On your journey, you uncover a diabolical plot of world domination, and your goal suddenly changes from one of discovery to one of world safety. Hack your way through MAKEN X and harness the power of the Maken.

title: Triple Play 2001
description: Big Hitting action is back with EA Sports and Treyarch's Triple Play 2001. Homeruns have been the theme of this storied series from the beginning and it doesn?t look to change any this year. Good graphics, MLB and MLBPA licenses, internet play, and the new MLBPA Big League Challenge with legendary players make Triple Play the newest in this exiting baseball series.

title: Sammy Sosa Softball Slam
description: Sammy Sosa Softball Slam brings the ultra-popular game of softball to the PC for the first time ever for an entirely new game experience! Step up to the plate for more fast-paced game play as you knock out doubles and triples. All this over-the-top action comes screaming at you through a non-stop barrage of instant camera cuts combined with sizzling special effects, side-splitting animations and a bombastic announcer guaranteed to keep you on your toes and wanting more!

title: Romance of the Three Kingdoms VI: Awakening of the Dragon
description: Start with China and conquer the entire world in this amazing turn-based strategy game. As with its predecessors, this sixth installment sets it sights on world domination via actual history. Most characters are taken directly from previous ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS titles, but the settings and gameplay are updated to include nearly 600 non-playable characters. Each of these personas has a role in the game's outcome, of course every person holds information that may be key to your success. Play as a wide variety of units (including the Northern Riders and the Mountaineers of Shu) as you make your way through more than 100 real-life historical event sequences. Each page of history will change according to you're your actions, but there is a Chronological Records system that will compare your game to what actually transpired. As Emperor, you have the right to deem Nobility, and promote your Nobles with riches and power. With seven real campaigns to choose from the game also includes a few miniature missions for Emperors with minimal time on their hands. Amazingly, eight players can join in on the militant action as well.

title: Metal Gear Solid [2000]
description: Early 21st Century. An incident that rocks the US government takes place. The classified weapon and nuclear-launching bipedal tank Metal Gear has fallen into the hands of terrorists. Seven years after the fiasco at Outer Heaven involving the original Metal Gear, the US government calls in Solid Snake to neutralize the terrorist threat.In this exclusive Game Boy addition to the blockbuster Metal Gear franchise, you as Solid Snake must use stealth tactics and undercover espionage to defeat the hostile empire. The fate of the world lies in your hands...

title: Wild ARMs 2
description: Finally, a sequel has come for one of the PlayStation's first RPGs with WILD ARMS: 2nd Ignition. The game features a new story and cast of characters, this time led by a mysterious person named Ashley. The story spans various locations and dungeons around the world, offering varying graphical and musical styling. The visuals remain as the same type as the first game: there is a ¿ perspective view that looks down on the characters, something unique from just about every other RPG available. The backgrounds appear as 3D polygons, though each of the characters are sprites, with plenty of animations to make their motions fluid and smooth. The battle system is a slow-paced turn-based affair, letting the player have plenty of time to think over each move. WILD ARMS: 2nd Ignition offers gameplay that mixes the classic RPG style with other contemporary games, and a graphics system that no other game can match.

title: Tachyon: The Fringe
description: Tachyon: The Fringe is a space combat simulation where you must use your own survival techniques as a pilot figher. When you explore the galaxy, you often encounter vicious space battles. You play as Jake Logan, a corporate star pilot in the 26th century. You are framed for a crime you did not commit. Banished to the dangerous fringe of colonized space, you must survive by all accounts.Bruce Cambell is the voice for your character Jake Login. Cambell is well known for the Evil Dead movie and the television show, Xena: Warrior Princess.

title: Vagrant Story
description: Adventure into a world of unparalleled depth and danger with SquareSoft's Vagrant Story. In this sweeping dungeon-crawling epic you play as Ashley Riot, a young assassin and spy for the organization known as Riskbreakers. Your goal is to unravel a deep and twisted plot and come to terms with the recent death of your wife and child. If this sounds a bit too cerebral never fear. Your path to recapturing your sense of humanity hinges on the destruction of countless vicious monsters and the exploration of dark and dangerous dungeons. Vagrant Story is awash in gorgeous scenery and features designs from Yasumi Matsuno and Akihiko Yoshida, the acclaimed artists and creators behind Final Fantasy Tactics.

title: Striker Pro 2000
description: Hardcore soccer action comes to the PlayStation with STRIKER PRO 2000. You can choose from 130 different European club teams thanks to the UEFA license. After you choose a team, work on strategies, tactics, and learn the controls with the Training mode. When you are ready for some competition, there are eight other gameplay modes to choose from. No matter the mode, the artificial intelligence of the computer-controlled players creates the most realistic simulation possible. In other words, defenders mark their men extremely well and make things as challenging as you'd expect from world-class competition. If you can get past the defense, you must contend with goalies that are virtually brick walls. The offensive players are no slouches either; they instinctively push forward to capitalize on breakaway opportunities. STRIKER PRO 2000 puts you in the middle of a soccer match without having to put on your cleats.

title: Perfect Dark
description: Spiritual sequel to GoldenEye. Starring special agent Joanna DarkT, the storyline, is brought to life by outstanding cinemas and surprisingly good voice-acting. Shooting, with some snazzy new weapons, is still the primary focus of the game, but with all of the tasks and puzzles to get through, you'll have to use your brain as well as your trigger finger to get by. It is in this way, that Perfect Dark, pays the ultimate respect to GoldenEye. Rare took so many steps to differentiate this game from its three year old predecessor, but the one thing that is consistent over both games, is the extraordinary depth and rich gameplay. If you didn't play GE, you might have a hell of a time learning how a game like PD thinks and what kind of behavior is rewarded.

title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six
description: Tactical, squad-based, real-world combat comes to the Dreamcast in RAINBOW SIX from Pipe Dream. The name of the game is strategy (broken up by bursts of gunfire), and you'll need all your wits about you to survive. You take command of a secret antiterrorist strike team and plan and attack your way through 21 international rescue missions. RAINBOW SIX is really two games in one. The first is the planning stage: watch informative, compelling mission briefings, choose your team members, and equip them for action. Next, check the location blueprints and assign orders for your elite agents. Once you have a plan of action set, the second phase begins. Watch as bullets fly, bombs explode, and necks snap as your agents execute your careful orders and carry out their daring rescue attempts. Things don't always play out as you'd hope, so you'll need a facile mind to change gears and issue new commands on the fly. In varied locales from embassies to amusement parks, you'll plan, perfect, and guide your team to victory in RAINBOW SIX.
platforms: DC PC N64 PS Mac PS3 PSP GBC PC

title: The Crystal Key
description: Sci-fi fantasy graphic adventure game from The Adventure Company. Prepare yourself for an incredible adventure! Armed with only your wits, your travels will take you through stunning 3D lands of desert, jungle and water as you explore breathtaking ruins and caverns in search of the elusive Crystal Key. The game offers beautifully rendered 3D scenes and animation that can be rotated 360 degrees. Featuring a twisting storyline, detailed graphics, engaging original music, and challenging 3D puzzles, The Crystal Key provides hours and hours of challenging and entertaining gameplay.

title: Atari Greatest Hits
description: Two CD-ROMs full of Atari arcade classics? Believe it! Combining two volumes of ATARI ARCADE HITS, this all-inclusive package lets you test your mettle at such groundbreaking games as: ASTEROIDS, CENTIPEDE, MISSILE COMMAND, PONG, SUPER BREAKOUT, TEMPEST; ASTROIDS DELUXE, BATTLEZOME, CRYSTAL CASTLES, GRAVITAR, MILLIPEDE, and WARLORDS. Each game is replicated in arcade-perfect form, and there's an Enhanced mode for each presenting the action with updated graphics and gameplay. Throw in a collection of old Atari ads and an entire CD of desktop themes, and you've a got a winner on your hands.

title: Sammy Sosa High Heat Baseball 2001
description: The HIGH HEAT BASEBALL series was already a fan favorite among gamers, but things have gotten out of hand since they added Sammy Sosa's endorsement. Arguably the most complete baseball game of all-time, HIGH HEAT BASEBALL 2001 features all 30 current Major League teams and 45 stadiums. Yep, you read correctly the extra 15 stadiums are classic parks that no longer house MLB teams, which means you'll get to play at such dinosaurs as Shibe Park and Baker Bowl. New player models allow for a greater variance in physics among the athletes, and the graphics have been widely improved from top to bottom. Also augmented is the Home Run Challenge, which now lets you choose whether you want to take your pitches overhand, side-armed, or submarined. This version includes an amazing highlight reel that's viewable at the end of each contest, and better AI than any baseball game in history. It's got everything but the overpriced hot dogs and licorice.

title: Colin McRae Rally [2000]
description: Colin McRae Rally brings the thrill and excitement or European-style rally racing to the PC. Learn how to control your car with the Rally School where Colin McRae teaches the basics. After earning your stripes, choose from 12 real-world rally cars and take on the challenge of an actual event in the Rally mode. For those who want to tackle a bigger challenge, Championship mode will place you in the rallies of eight different countries, including Australia and Monte Carlo. If you're interested in a different kind of racing, try Colin McRae Rally.

title: 4 Wheel Thunder
description: 4 Wheel Thunder is off road racing with flair that has been developed with the Sega Dreamcast in mind... full-bore, all-out action at a consistent 60 frames per second! With shortcuts, power ups, performance upgrades, Turbo boosts and Jumps, 4 Wheel Thunder packs as much gameplay as possible into each race. It's the latest worthy title in Midway's Thunder series designed to over-stimulate your driving senses.

title: Test Drive Le Mans
description: Players choose from over 50 cars and over 25 racing teams, each with multiple styles, individual engine sounds and set-up routines allowing players to maximize performance. With vintage Le Mans around-the-clock racing, day-to-night-to-day lighting conditions and realistic night time effects, Test Drive Le Mans promises intense racing action. Each car featured in "Test Drive Le Mans" was designed in collaboration with actual Le Mans race teams, ensuring detailed technical specifications and performance data to provide the most realistic race experience.

title: Chase Ace 2
description: Chase Ace II is the sequel to the original Chase Ace game, a freeware arcade and manga inspired action PC game. Three different styles are available to choose from: Mission, Course, Keep 'em coming. The game also includes an Extensive Level editor, which includes Double original soundtrack - Select Techno or Funky Much more!

title: Street Fighter Alpha 3
description: Capcom brings its arcade hit STREET FIGHTER ALPHA 3 to the Dreamcast. All of the characters from the previous games in the ALPHA series have returned, while many old favorites like Guile, E. Honda, Blanka, Balrog, Dee Jay, and Fei Long make their fist appearance in the ALPHA series. There are also four new characters: Karin Kanzuki, Rainbow Mika, Juli, and Juni, making 34 characters in all. Further, each character has three different fighting styles, meaning you'll have your hands full if you want to master this game. If you're looking for a perfect translation of the arcade version of the game, look no further than the Arcade mode. In order to earn new skills for each character's fighting style, play the World Tour mode. If you play the game well, you can unlock other modes including Team Battle, Survival, Dramatic Battle Plus, and Final Battle. Try to become the ultimate fighter with STREET FIGHTER ALPHA 3.
platforms: DC GBA PSP Arcade Arcade PSP PS PS3 Saturn

title: WCW Mayhem
description: Do you think you can take the WCW championship? Now you can try in WCW MAYHEM. There are 12 WCW superstars you can compete with or against including Sting, Goldberg, Hollywood Hogan, Kevin "Big Sexy" Nash, Randy "Macho Man" Savage, Diamond Dallas Page, Bret Hart, Bam Bam Bigelow, Ric Flair, Buff Bagwell, Booker T., and Lex Luger. All of the wrestlers have special characteristics and unique finishing moves. Take on any of the wrestlers in the Player vs. Computer mode, or you can try to win the championship in the Quest for the Best mode. You can also challenge your friends to a match in the Player vs. Player mode. In all of the modes, you can take the action outside of the ring, giving you the full WCW treatment. Are you tough enough to stay alive and win the WCW championship with WCW MAYHEM?

title: Driver
description: DRIVER slides onto Game Boy Color with all of the high-speed chase action of the PlayStation hit. You are Tanner, an undercover cop who must infiltrate a powerful crime syndicate by posing as an expert getaway driver. You'll hit the streets in three different cities: Miami, New York, and Los Angeles. Your job is to complete a variety of objectives as you speed, slide, and out-drive through more than 30 missions of overhead action. Be careful you don't wreck your ride or get caught by the police roaming the streets though, or it's Game Over. The overhead perspective gives you a large view of the area around you, so use it to your advantage to scope out what lies around the next turn. DRIVER offers a password system to save your progress through the game, and it is only compatible with Game Boy Color systems.
platforms: GBC PS PS Mac PSP PC iPhone PS3

title: Sammy Sosa High Heat Baseball 2001
description: Sammy Sosa High Heat Baseball 2001 offers a realistic 3D engine and gameplay that gives you the closest simulation of hard-hitting baseball you can get without picking up a bat. Features include over 750 Major League players from the 1999 and 2000 rosters, improved graphics, tons of new animations, all new Action Camera Mode and new training difficulty levels, internet/LAN play of Exhibition, Season, and Playoff games, custom leagues, Home Run Derby, and a full-featured career/season mode. A deep statistical tracking system and database are also at your disposal. In the TV-style presentation, you'll see every player's stats as he steps up to the plate, and you can also check career stats as well as numbers from last year's real season. Everything is included from fielding percentage to hitting patterns to ground ball percentage.

title: Silent Bomber
description: Humanity has colonized other planets. Now, a huge corporation backed by a gigantic military force wants to establish Earth rule over the colonies. Planet after planet has fallen to the corporation. A giant warship sits poised to take over the planet Hornet. You take the role of Jutah Fate, a member of a special-forces unit. His mission is to infiltrate the warship and sabotage it from the inside. Jutah must plant bombs throughout the ship; after a bomb is planted, it remains dormant until Jutah detonates it. He must also contend with a large number of guards. Luckily, bombs can be thrown onto the bodies of the guards and detonated to eliminate them. You can score combination points by planting bombs on more than one enemy, or by planting bombs on one enemy and destroying others with the blast. Help save Hornet from Earth rule in SILENT BOMBER.

title: Speed Punks
description: PlayStation-exclusive kart racer. Uses an advanced physics model which gives a realistic racing feel to the karts, six main characters to choose from (plus three hidden ones who become available as the game progresses), and 12 tracks over three leagues, including a raceway, volcanic island, theme park and city track. True to the genre, there are plenty of shortcuts, hidden areas, water pools, oil spills, lava pits and dirt patches to mix things up. The game also uses a turbo system and a free-form combat system that lets players use weapons to fight whoever they like in whatever way they can think of. Known as Speed Freaks in Europe and Speed Punks in the US, the game supports four-player split-screen combat.

title: Winnie The Pooh: Adventures in the 100 Acre Woods
description: Join Winnie the Pooh and his friends as they come to the Game Boy Color in WINNIE THE POOH: Adventures in the 100 Acre Wood.  You must help Pooh get to a certain place on the game board within a specified number of dice rolls. Along the way, he will encounter his friends Tigger, Piglet, Rabbit, and Eeyore, who will play along with Pooh and open mini-games for the loveable bear to store in his cupboard. The mini-games will have the player helping Pooh look for honey, exercise, fish, get unstuck from Rabbit's hole, bounce with Tigger, and catch acorns. The more you play WINNIE THE POOH: Adventures in the 100 Acre Wood, the greater the chances of finding a new path or mini-game.

title: Pocket Fighter
description: Super Gem Fighter Mini Mix plays up the fan frenzy for Capcom's best-loved characters in the fighting franchise with miniature versions of popular Capcom fighters engaged in fierce battles.  Combatants vie to collect power-up gems as they perform an array of special attacks and powerful combos.
platforms: WS Arcade Arcade PS Saturn PS3

title: Urban Chaos
description: Urban Chaos is a third-person action-adventure that takes you into the under life of crime and turmoil in Union City, a thin guise for life in any big metropolitan area. The game is set at the turn of the millennium and Union City is experiencing a phenomenal new wave of violence and crime, and new gangs have sprung up with more power and aggression than ever. As D'arci Stern, you must complete the menial tasks of being a cop, such as tackling petty crimes and such, but in the larger scope of things, you find out that a much bigger set of crimes and conspiracies are coming at you like a freight train.
rating_content: Animated Blood, Animated Violence, Strong Language

title: Allegiance
description: Allegiance is an online-only space-combat sim that incorporates elements of real-time strategy games like none before it. In 2140, a runaway asteroid slammed into the Earth, destroying 8000 years of civilization. The remnants of humanity then split into warring factions, and began a fierce battle of attrition over the remaining sparse resources scattered among the cold, hard asteroids. Dogfight with your friends in this ever-expanding universe or choose to command your team to victory. Join one of four factions as you battle it out with hundreds of players online to determine the fate of the universe as we know it!

title: Safecracker [2000]
description: Inside an eccentric millionaire's opulent mansion, thirty-five different safes are hidden and as an aspirant for the position of Security Development Chief, you must prove your mettle by locating and cracking every one of the mansion's safes without getting caught. Can you do it?
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older

title: F1 2000
description: Choose your favorite Formula One Championship driver from the 2000 season and race to glory! Enjoy taking your laps at the US Grand Prix, Indianapolis, or any of the other tracks from the 2000 season. The game's full collection of unique modes includes Weekend, Championship, Time Trial, Quick Race, and many more. You can set your car up any way you'd like, customizing your gearbox, tire compound, and cockpit. Racing fans and gamers alike will love this impeccable 3D simulation from EA Sports.

title: Imperium Galactica II: Alliances
description: Set in the distant future, Imperium Galactica 2 allows you to play as one of three races, each of which has its own campaign, goals, strengths and weaknesses. The human-based Solarians are on the lookout for a long-lost artifact that promises to unleash the secret of immortality, while the Kra'hen, a ruthless band of alien warriors, want nothing more than to expand their empire as far as possible. Finally, the Shinari are the true capitalists of the game, an empire built upon trade, merchant ships and occasional piracy.

title: MLB 2001
description: MLB 2001 is here and you?ve never seen anything like it! Vin Scully and Dave Campbell in the booth along with tons of camera angels, zoom-ins and cut-aways means that you?ll be treated to the most authentic TV style presentation ever seen. New stadium graphics means all of the new stadiums like Safeco Field in Seattle, PacBell Park in San Francisco and Comerica Park in Detroit. New player models are scaled to their actual height, weight and body styles and feature the actual player faces, right down to their facial hair. All new franchise mode gives you the chance to build your team into a powerhouse. All new Artificial Intelligence developed with consultation from Tony Gwynn, Trevor Hoffman and Davey Johnson. All this and more than 250 personalized batting stances and pitching motions work together to make MLB 2001 the PlayStation Baseball video game for the next millennium.

title: Heroes of Might and Magic III: Shadow of Death
description: This second expansion pack to Might & Magic III provides 38 new single scenario maps and 7 new campaigns.

title: Super Scattergories
description: Based on the popular game, players must find members of particular categories; each answer must start with the same letter. The computer version adds some complexity--there's now five different games, including picture identification, category matching, and simple word listing.

title: Eagle One: Harrier Attack
description: Terrorists have take over Hawaii. It is up to you, the commander of Eagle One, to defuse the situation and reclaim the islands. Jump into six of the most advance fighter plane in the world: Harrier Jump Jet, F-15 Eagle, A-10 Warthog bomber, the Raven stealth fighter, and others, each faithfully recreated. Use the Harrier's hover capabilities to gain a tactical advantage over the enemy. Engage in air-to-air, air-to-land, and air-to-sea combat in 25 missions across five different islands. To make the game as realistic as possible, you will have to contend with carrier landings and mid-air refueling. If the going gets too tough, have a friend help you with the terrorists in the cooperative multiplayer mode. For those with a violent streak, you can also blow your friends out of the sky in the versus mode. Take out the terrorists and reclaim Hawaii in EAGLE ONE: Harrier Attack.

title: Twinkle Star Sprites
description: Twinkle Star Sprites is a unique side-by-side competitive top-down shooter featuring colorful anime designs, cute girl characters and a head-to-head challenge across split screens for two players (or a player and an AI opponent) to try beating a stage before the other. Master your shots, and aim for the magical Twinkle Star”!
platforms: DC Saturn Arcade PC NGCD NG

title: EverQuest: Ruins of Kunark
description: The continent of Kunark was ruled by the lizardman Empire of Ik. Sailors and citizens from Norrath avoided the continent and it faded from memory. The Empire subsequently declined and ruins of their cities are inhabited by exotic races and monsters. The kidnapping of an important High Elf though has resulted in an invasion of Kunark by elves, bringing with them those that seek to explore and exploit. The Ruins of Kunark is an expansion pack for EverQuest.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence, Suggestive Themes

title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
description: Jotaru Kujo, the star of the JOJO'S VENTURE comic book series, has a problem. His mother is sick, afflicted with a strange illness related to a spirit called a Stand. The cause of all this trouble is the evil Dio, whom JoJo sets out to defeat in order to save his mother. As JoJo travels towards Egypt and a showdown with Dio, he must challenge Dio's minions whose sole purpose is to keep JoJo from succeeding. Playing as one of 16 characters, you'll kick, punch, and pummel your way closer to Dio with each victory. A unique addition to this 2D fighter is the Stand, a guardian spirit that can aid the player during a fight. Unlike mortal beings, Stands can reanimate quickly after being defeated, which is something the player can use to his advantage in battle. Help JoJo save his mom and defeat the diabolical Dio in the saga of JOJO'S BIZARRE ADVENTURE.
platforms: DC Arcade PS PS3 PS3 Xbox 360

title: Monster Rancher Battle Card GB
description: Your goal in life is to become the world's greatest monster breeder. In order to do this, you must travel around the world, challenging other breeders to card matches. If you win, you will collect more cards. If you can pass all of the license matches and collect all 100 cards, you will join the ranks of the master breeders. Before every match starts, each contestant presents a team of monsters and draws five cards (the cards are used to attack the team of monsters). However, if you don't like the cards you've drawn, you can discard some but that will award your opponent Guts Points. Every card requires a certain number of Guts Points to use, so discarding too many cards will give your opponent an advantage. Try to keep all of this in mind as you fight to become a master breeder in MONSTER RANCHER BATTLE CARD GB.

title: Roadsters
description: Which do you like more: racing or gambling? There's no need to decide in this intense 3D racing game that puts an emphasis on betting. You begin the game with $50,000, but you're going to have to spend a chunk of that on a car. Choose from over 30 vehicles (only from within your price range, of course), then use whatever cash you can scrounge together to make modifications. You can win cash by placing high enough in races, but the real dough lies in betting on yourself. Each race lets you put up however much of your hard-earned green as you'd like, and if you win the bet you double that amount. Don't like to gamble? Tough luck. There's no way to stay competitive without the right parts, and no way to get those parts without income from wagering. In order to win the Roadsters Trophy, you'll need to rise through three divisions on your way to glory. If you're looking for a quick fix, there's a Quick Race mode that lets you get in and race the computer in a one-time event on any of the game's 10 tracks. Time Trial lets you race against your own best time, while Multiplayer lets you battle a friend for bragging rights. Think you've got what it takes to win the cup? Then put your money where your mouth is in ROADSTERS.

title: Expendable
description: The world has been consumed by a conflict with a technologically advanced race of aliens know as the Charva. The Charva have only two goals: take over the Earth and destroy the human race. Before the Charva get their chance, the government creates genetically altered superhuman killing machines that are incubated and hatched from eggs. Called Expendables, their only purpose is to kill and die. You take the role of an Expendable and travel through 20 levels blasting every Charva in sight. Luckily, you have over 15 different weapons at your disposal including flamethrowers, laser guided missiles, pulse cannons, and rocket launchers. If the going gets too tough, have a friend come along for the ride with the two-player cooperative mode. When things get really bad, don't expect help because you are EXPENDABLE.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

title: Gunship!
description: Fly low and strike deep in the re-invention of the Gunship flight combat franchise. In Gunship!, you are the point main for WWIII -- Russian forces have amassed on one side, NATO on the other in a flashpoint conflict in Eastern Europe. You are about to deploy the most devastating weapon in the inventory of war: the helicopter Gunship! Finesse, raw power, stealth and speed blend in a high-wire balancing act of exacting proportions. In the 21st century, the fate of war can turn on one micro0engagement in the epicenter of action.

title: Metal Slug: 2nd Mission
description: The second portable installment in the Metal Slug series hasn't strayed at all from the original formula: it's still a guns-blazing weaponfest where you control a lone soldier out to blow up stuff and rescue prisoners. Your soldier has the ability to run, jump, crouch, and fire weapons, and you'll need to use these skills to get through each of the game's 38 missions. The whole idea is to blast your way through the rounds, taking out the enemy soldiers and picking up power-ups. Weapons include a heavy machine gun, a shotgun, missiles, grenades, and a whole bunch more. The other task is to find all the POW soldiers lost in each of the levels -- when you free a prisoner, he'll leave you a weapon power-up after disappearing offering a hearty salute. But you're not only on your feet. Some missions allow you to jump behind the controls of a kick-ass jet plane, tank, and submarine.

title: NHL Blades of Steel 2000
description: Try to win Lord Stanley's Cup in NHL BLADES OF STEEL 2000. You can play with or against any NHL team and use the Exhibition mode to learn the controls and practice your skills. When you want to test your tactics, enter the race for the Stanley Cup in the Season mode. If getting through a Season is a bigger time investment than you want, just skip it and go straight to the Playoffs. When a friend challenges your domination of the rink, put him in his place with the link cable Two-Player mode. No matter what mode you play, you will have to win the game in a shootout if it's tied at the end of regulation. And if you get into a fight and lose, you will have to sit in the penalty box. Try to become the greatest hockey player in the world with NHL BLADES OF STEEL 2000.

title: Championship Bass
description: Electronic Arts enters the world of competitive fishing with Championship Bass. Pick your gear and try to best the competition in the Bass Challenge, Career, and Tournament modes. If you are looking for a more relaxing experience, then choose from six lakes and take a casual afternoon fishing trip to your favorite spot. No matter how you choose to play, you won't miss a second of the action thanks to unique above- and below-water camera angles. Championship Bass takes fishing to new levels.
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older

title: Earth 2150
description: The first all-terrain, 3D real-time strategy game has landed on American shores. More than eye candy, its revolutionary 3D engine takes the genre in a new direction. Water levels rise and wash out a once passable area. Meteor showers rain down from above. Volcanoes erupt and destroy once fertile land. And full warfare occurs beneath the surface of the earth.

title: Tomb Raider -- Featuring Lara Croft
description: Now you can put Lara Croft in the palm of your hand with TOMB RAIDER for the Game Boy Color. The Aztecs, Mayas, and Incas worked together to trap an evil deity known as Quaxet in a stone that has remained undisturbed for centuries. Now, someone sinister is after the stone, and it is up to world-famous archeologist Lara Croft to find it before it falls into the wrong hands. You must guide Lara through 14 levels of action. Luckily, she can perform 25 different moves to help her get through any situation including running, jumping, crawling, and back flips. Naturally, there are people out to stop her, but they can be dispatched with a few well-placed shots from her pistols. Help Lara save the world from the power of Quaxet in TOMB RAIDER.
platforms: GBC PS3 iPhone PSP NNG TAP Saturn PC PS

title: The Legend of Dragoon
description: A peaceful beginning.The legend was born 10,000 years ago. A violent uprising. A civilization of flying creatures enslave the human race. A bloody war. In a bid for freedom, the humans harness the spiritual forces of Dragons and triumph. Tranquility and harmony exist between all. But the past and the future are about to collide...Unveil a fantasy of magnificence, deception, magical combat and retribution. The journey that seeks the past ends. And the journey to discover today begins. Unleash the spirit of the Dragoons. And discover your destiny.

title: Nightmare Creatures II
description: The nightmare continues with NIGHTMARE CREATURES II for the Dreamcast. It's London, 1934, and you're Herbert Wallace, the wary subject of Dr. Adam Crowley. The evil doctor is conducting DNA experiments, and he's altered your genetic code to create a horde of monsters. When an explosion at the doctor's hospital releases his creatures, the responsibility of taking these beasts out falls on your shoulders. In this survival horror adventure, you'll have a dozen weapons at your disposal as you make your way through the nine expansive levels of terror, mayhem, and violence. As you wander through Crowley's world, you'll have your hands full with his legion of zombies and monsters, which will stop at nothing to take a bite out of you. If you're a fan of survival horror, then NIGHTMARE CREATURES II might be just what the doctor ordered.

title: Ground Control
description: Innovative real-time strategy/war game with major action component, complete lack of resource-management and strong story. Set in the future, the game revolves around the conflict between two forces competing for domination of space as colonization of new planets becomes increasingly attractive, following a Third World War on Earth. The game consists of a series of thirty single-player missions, fifteen for each side in the conflict. There is also a strong multi-player mode. There are numerous high-tech unit types featured in the game. You control your units in teams. The aim of the game is to win the various well-designed battle scenarios with special attention being given to protecting your 'Armed People Carrier', which carries repair crews, fresh infantry and General. It is possible to upgrade and, therefore, specialize units. A notable feature of the game are the exceptionally good fully-3D graphics. The game's control system is highly effective.

title: PGA European Tour
description: Be sure to press your plaid slacks, because you're invited to rub elbows with some international swingers in the first-ever game to feature the PGA European license.PGA European tour is a hard-core golf sim featuring four authentic European courses. Over 60 pros appear in the game, including Colin Montgomerie and Jose Maria Olazabal of recent Ryder Cup infamy. A complete list of available golfers is displayed on the right.

title: Final Fantasy Legend
description: The long-running FINAL FANTASY series hits the Game Boy with FINAL FANTASY LEGEND. Create your party by choosing four warriors from eight different character classes including humans, mutants, and monsters. Humans specialize in hand-to-hand combat and have access to most weapons, mutants wield magic like no other, and monsters can evolve themselves by feasting on the meat of fallen opponents to become new monsters! Venture your way through four different lands each with a unique fantasy theme to stop the wicked Ashura Devils from destroying the world. A beautiful fantasy soundtrack adds atmosphere to the experience and puts you in the right mood. This single-player RPG features battery backup to save your progress, and is compatible with both Game Boy and Game Boy Color. RPG fans on the go should check out FINAL FANTASY LEGEND.

title: Industrial Spy: Operation Espionage
description: By the year 2000, huge corporations had overrun the government, controlling everything from politics to the economy. Many of their operations involve corporate spy teams. You're the leader of the best agency, the Blitzstahl. Your squad consists of seven agents, but each assignment only requires four to get the job done. Your agents specialize in skills like hacking, fighting, mechanics, and stealth, so you'll have to pick the best combination for each job. Be careful though, because there are plenty of traps that could spell the difference between success and failure. There are 10 missions in all that will push your team to the limit. As you give commands, watch as your squad carries out your orders and hopefully avoids a confrontation. Earn money for completing your assignments and upgrade your team's abilities as you fight to retain your title as the best spy agency in the nation.

title: Final Fantasy Adventure
description: Final Fantasy Adventure takes the popular action/RPG genre and gives it top treatment by the masters at Square. Players assume the role of a gladiator who escapes his captors and sets out on a quest to find the Pendant of Mana, a talisman rumored to have the power to save his injured best friend's life. This single-player game spans a wide variety of terrains loaded with puzzles, enemies, and treasure, as you battle through forests, deserts, and snow-covered tundra. Search out a massive assortment of weapons and magical items to aid you in your quest swords, spears, axes, bows, and more. The dungeons you'll explore are packed with puzzles that will require sharp wits, and enemies that require a sharp weapon to defeat.Fans of Square's classic Secret of Mana (of which this game is a cousin of in the Mana franchise -- the title was changed from its Japanese title of Seiken Densetsu to capitalize on the Final Fantasy namesake) are sure to enjoy this action-packed tale of swords and sorcery.

title: Virtual-On: Oratorio Tangram
description: Virtual-On was a critical and popular hit in Japan, and something of a cult classic in America. The game is best known for it's controllers, two large twin sticks with a single fire button on each. Oratorio Tangram is an update to Virtual-On and features two new mechs and revised play mechanics. Although the arcade version saw limited distribution in the U.S., it was an instant classic on both sides of the Pacific.Virtual-On Oratorio Tangram isn't the typical fighting game by any stretch of the imagination. You pilot a giant Gundam-like machine in a 3-D arena armed with three different weapons which can have altering effects depending on the situation their employed and the movement of your mecha.
